GSP29vytrkt3u:24: yadvā pramāṇāntarānugrāhaka 3 manuktvā vedānugrāhakoktiḥ kuta ityato vedarūpaḥ śabdaḥ pradhānamityuktatvāditi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:25: “yāthārthameva mānatvaṃ tanmukhyaṃ jñānaśabdayoḥ“iti yuktipādīyānuvyākhyāne“yāthārthyameva prāmāṇyaṃ tanmukhyaṃ jñānaśabdayoḥ“iti brahmatarke
GSP29vytrkt3u:26: tadyāyārthyaṃ jñāne kevalapramāṇe vedarūpapramāṇe ca mukhyamityasya tātparyaṃ - pradhānamityuktatvāditi //
GSP29vytrkt3u:27: vedānugrāhakatvaṃ ca-- vede āropitāni yāni aprāmāṇyakāraṇāni anṛtavyāghātapunaruktyaśakyārthābhidhāyitvagurūpāyabodhakatvārthabodhopāyaśūnyatvādīni
GSP29vytrkt3u:32: niṣkrāntā doṣebhyaḥ nirdeṣā sā ca sā upapattiśca nirdeṣopapattiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:34: atropapattipadaṃ arthavādopapattī cetyādāviva hetvābhāsaviviktayuktiparaṃ cet nirdeṣeti vyarthamityata āha --
GSP29vytrkt3u:41: atropapattirvyāpyamityetāvataiva pūrtāvapi yuktiliṅgagrahaṇaṃ bhagavatpādaiḥ“ranumā yuktirevokte“ti“liṅgaṃ heturi“ti coktatvena 2 tadvirodha iti śaṅkānirāsāya/
GSP29vytrkt3u:42: pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāntu -- sāhacaryeṇārthagamakaṃ liṅgamiti sāhacaryaniyamarūpavyāptau niyamāṃśatyāgena sāhacaryamātramuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:46: tatkathamityataḥ paryāyatvānna doṣa iti bhāvenāha-- uktaṃ hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:56: eva tatphalasya viśeṣaṇāntaralabhyatvāttadanuktiritibhāvena virodhaṃ nirāha-- pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ tviti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:70: nanu vyāpteḥ karma vyāpyamiti vyāpyasvarūpaṃ vyāptijñānādhīnajñānamiti kā vyāptiriti jijñāsāyāṃ paddhatyuktalakṣaṇamāha -- avinābhāva iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:80: sādhyena vinābhāva ityasya sādhyābhāve sādhanābhāve ityarthakatayā asya vyatirekavyāptitvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:83: “avinābhāvo vyāptiḥ sāhacaryaniyama iti yāvadi“ti paddhatyukterāha-- sādhyasāhityeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:90: etena sāhacaryaniyamo vānopādhika 1 saṃbandho vā svābhāvikasaṃbandho vā sādhyābhāvavadavṛttitvaṃ vā vyāptiriti nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:91: vyadhikaraṇayoḥ pūravṛṣṭyordeśataḥ kālato vā sāhacaryasya saṃbandhasya 2 cābhavāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:93: ucyate/ yaddeśakālasaṃbaddhasya yasya yaddeśakālasaṃbaddhe yena vinānupapattistasya tena sā vyāptiḥ/ @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:99: pūrvamavinābhāva ityasyābhipretatvamupetya sāhityaniyamo dūṣito 'tra tu pṛthagvyā 3 ptilakṣaṇatvena sākṣādukta 4 tvamupetya punarupanyāsa iti na punaruktidoṣaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:109: anupapattervyāptitvaṃ ca - pramāṇalakṣaṇe pariśeṣorthāpattiranumānamityaviśeṣa itya 1 rthāpattirivānumānamapyāvaśyakānupapattyai gamakamityuktatvāt;
GSP29vytrkt3u:110: upamānepi na hi svasadṛṣenādṛśaṃ kva 2 cciddṛṣṭamityanena gavayaniṣṭhagosādṛśyasya goniṣṭhagavayasādṛśyaṃ vinānupapatterevoktatvāt;
GSP29vytrkt3u:111: paddhatau ca nirdeṣopapattiranumeti pramāṇalakṣaṇastho 3 papattiśabdo na paryāyāntaramātram
GSP29vytrkt3u:112: kiṃ tu sādhye satyupapadyate anyathā tu ne 4 tyupapattiriti bhāvenopapattirvyāpyamati vyākhyātatvāt;
GSP29vytrkt3u:113: pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāmapi jīvanavatve sati gṛhe asatvarūpe vyāpye anupapadyamānārthapramitirarthāpattirityanupapadyamānapadayogāt
GSP29vytrkt3u:114: pariśeṣāderanumānatvānaṅgīkāre dhūmopyanupapatyā gamayannānumānaṃ syā 5 diti coktatvāt; -- @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:130: yattu -- vimato gaurgavayasadṛśaḥ gavayagatasādṛśyapratiyogitvāditi pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ hetusādhyayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyasaṃpādanaṃ tatparamatamāśritya/
GSP29vytrkt3u:132: ata eva 1 paddhatau ca asau gauretadgavayasadṛśaḥ asya gavayasya 2 tadgosadṛśatvāditi vaiyidhikaraṇyenaiva prayuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:138: nanvevaṃ śābarokta 6 pramāṇāntarbhāvaprastāve gaurgavayasadṛśī gavayasya gosadṛśatvāditi
GSP29vytrkt3u:139: prayoge vaiyadhikaraṇyamāśaṅkya sāmānādhaikaraṇyena prayogoktiḥ katham tayā vyadhikaraṇasya
GSP29vytrkt3u:147: yā tu -- pareṇa vyāptyā gamakamanumānam anupapatyā gamikārthāpattirityanumānārthāpatyorbhede śaṅkite taṃ prati ṭīkākārīyā,
GSP29vytrkt3u:148: kena cidvinā kasya cidanupapattirhi tayorvyāptiṃ vinā nopapadyata ityanupapattivyāptyorbhedoktiḥ sānupapattiniyāmakordhvādharībhāvakāryakāraṇabhāvādyabhiprāyā,
GSP29vytrkt3u:150: iyameva ca vyāptiḥ sādhyena vinā sādhanasyābhāvo 'nupapattiriti bhāvenāvinābhāva iti sāhacaryaniyama iti cocyate/ @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:152: yena vinā yasya sattā pramāṇaviruddhā sā tena tasya vyāptirityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:153: upapatteśca vyāptyapekṣā 2 sarvathāṅgīkāryeti pramāṇalakṣaṇavākyaṭīkoktivirodhaṃ nirāha -- yātviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:157: sāhacaryaniyama iti yāvat iti paddhatyuktivirodha ityata āha-- iyameveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:164: iyaṃ ca vyāptiḥ prasiddheṣu dhūmādyanumāneṣu adhodeśe 1 na dīpūrādyanumāneṣvarthāpatyādirūpānumāneṣu
GSP29vytrkt3u:165: ātmāśrayānyonyāśrayacakrakānavasthāvyāghātā 2 pādakeṣu tarkeṣu kevalavyatirekiṣu kevalānvayiṣu ca sarvatrānugatā āvaśyakī ca /
GSP29vytrkt3u:172: anopādhikasaṃbandhādirūpavyāptiṃ hitvaitadupādāne ko viśeṣa ityata āha-- iyaṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:186: nanu -- dhūmasyānupapattiḥ kiṃ vahnisāmānyaṃ vinā kiṃ vā parvatīyavanhiṃ vinā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:191: siddhau ca tasyā evānumitirūpaphalatvena tatkāraṇatvāyogāt iti1 /
GSP29vytrkt3u:192: uktaṃ hi khaṇḍane -- yato 'nyatvaṃ tatsiddheragre tadasiddherita 2 iti cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:193: 3 dhūmasya sāmānādhikaraṇyamapi kiṃ vahnisāmānyena kiṃ vā parvatīyavahnineti vikalpya taddūṣaṇayoḥ sāmyāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:202: na ca sāmānyasiddhyā tatsiddhiḥ yato 'nyatvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣayo 5 rityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:204: yattu -- asya vyatirekavyāptitvena tvanmate 'numānānaṅgatvācceti tadāśaṅkya nirāha-- @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:210: vṛṣṭirūpasādhyābhāvavatyadhodeśe pūrarūpasādhanābhāvasyābhāvena vyatirekavyāptyabhāve 'pi pūre vṛṣṭiṃ vināpapatti 1 darśanāt 2 /
GSP29vytrkt3u:214: sā ca vahnyabhāvena dhūmābhāve sādhye vyāpyagatatvādanvayavyāptitvenaivāṅgam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:217: sāmānādhikaraṇyagarbhā 4 vyatirekavyāptiriyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vādinaṃ pratyāhaṃ -- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:218: nanvastviyaṃ sarvānvayyanumāneṣu vahnyabhāvādinā dhūmābhāvādyanumānumānasthalenyaiva vyāptirvācyeti tadanugateyaṃ na bhavatītyata āha-- vahnyabhāvasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:219: iyameva 5 dhūmānumāne 'pyaṅgaṃ kathaṃ na vyatirekavyāptirityata āha -- dhūmeneti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:222: kevalānvayini sādhyā 6 bhāvāprasiddhyāvyāptirityuktadoṣaṃ nirāha--na ca kevalānvayinīti// @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:226: tatra sādhyābhāvā 1 satvenaiva sādhyābhāve sati sādhanasya yopapattiḥ tadabhāvarūpānupapatteḥ satvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:228: tathā ca -- rasasya samānadeśakālena rūpeṇa vineva,
GSP29vytrkt3u:229: pākajarūpādeḥ samānadeśena bhinnakālena pākena vineva 2 ca,
GSP29vytrkt3u:234: na hyūrdhvadeśagato nadīpūraḥ 6 ūrdhvadeśagatāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ vinānupapannaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:240: yathā tatra nyāyamate kathañcitsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ saṃpādya vyāptirupapādyate tathā kleśena vinaiva yathāsthitaliṅgaliṅganorvaiyadhikaraṇye satyapītyarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:241: nanu tvanmatepi tatra sāmānādhikaraṇyamādāyaiva vyāptirucyatāmityata āha-- pratyuteti 7 //
GSP29vytrkt3u:247: nanu sādhyābhāvenaiva saṃbandhasya nadīpūrasya vṛṣṭirūpasādhyena kathaṃ vyāptiriticet sādhyābhāvena niyamena saṃbanddhasya dravyatvasya saṃyogarūpasādhyena kathaṃ vyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:248: yaditu tatra phalabalena vyāptilakṣaṇe pratiyogyasamānādhikaraṇeti viśeṣaṇāvdyāptisiddhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:250: nanu vaiyadhikaraṇye sādhyasya deśaniyamaḥ kathamiti cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:262: pratiyogyasāmānādhikaraṇasādhyapratiyogiko yoḥ'bhāvaḥ tadasaṃbaddhatve sati sādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptiriti viśeṣaṇādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:263: tathāca saṃyogābhāvasya pratiyogisāmānādhikaraṇyānna doṣa iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:269: ata eva paddhatau tulonnamanādīnāmanekeṣāmapi liṅgaliṅgibhāvo darśitaḥ/ @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:271: kathaṃ ca samānakālatvepi kādācitkena patanena sthāyigurutvasya,
GSP29vytrkt3u:275: yatra yadā rasastatra tadā rūpamiti samānadeśakālatveneva,
GSP29vytrkt3u:276: yatra pākajaṃ 1 tatra pāka iti samānadeśatvasātreṇeva,
GSP29vytrkt3u:278: yadāyatra nadīpūrastatpūrvakāle tadūrdhvadeśe vṛṣṭiriti bhinnadeśakālatvenaiva vyāptigrahāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:279: nanu -- deśathaḥ kālataśca vaiyidhikaraṇye kathaṃ vyāptigahaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:280: yatredaṃ tatredamiti vā yadaivaṃ 3 tadaivamiti vā deśataḥ kālato vā sāmānādhikaraṇyenaiva vyāptergrāhgatvāditi cenna 4 /
GSP29vytrkt3u:282: “vyāptiprakāramapekṣyaliṅgasya liṅjñānajanakatvaniyamādi“ti paddhatyuktadiśā pareṇa samādhānaṃ vācayitvā samamityāha -- vyāptīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:286: nanu vaiyidhikaraṇyepi vyāpyavyāpakabhāve hetutadābhāsavyavasthā na syādityata āha-- atraceti// @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:290: atra ca yaddeśakālasaṃbaddhasya hetoranupapattiḥ taddeśakāle hetorabhāva evāsiddhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:292: evaṃ yaddeśakālasaṃbaddhasya hetoranupapattiḥ taddeśakālayoranyatrāpi bhāvo vyabhicāraḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:295: na tu niyamena sādhyābhāvavati vartamāna iti na kaścitkṣudropadravaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:300: 2 ata eva vyadhikaraṇāsiddhirna doṣa iti vakṣyate//
GSP29vytrkt3u:323: tatrāpi dhūmajātīyasya vahnijātīyena vyāptiriti matāśritāni pratiyogyasamānādhikaraṇayatsamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakānavacchinnaṃ yattena samaṃ --- @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:336: yadvahnyādi tena yena kenāpi saha tasya dhūmādeḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ saṃyogasaṃbandhenaikādhikaṇavṛttitvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:346: abhāvepi parvatīyavahnirapi mahānasīyavahniriva vahnitvenāvacchinna iti tatsāmānādhikaraṇyamādāya
GSP29vytrkt3u:350: tathā ca na sarvadhūmasya sarveṇa vahninā vyāptiḥ sidhyati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:351: tathāpi pratiyogitānavacchedakāvacchinnaṃ yaditi nañvyatyāsena pakṣadharādyuktadiśā vyākhyeyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:357: evaṃ tenetyatra tadavacchinnena samaṃ tadavacchinnasyetyapi vyākhyeyam /
GSP29vytrkt3u:358: ata evādipadaprayogaḥ evaṃrūpāṇāṃ ṭīkākṛdādyutprekṣitānāṃ parigrahāya kṛtaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:374: tatpratiyogi yanna bhavati parvatīyavahnyādirna bhavati tena samaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:386: -- viśeṣaṇā 1 dānālladhūnyanyonyābhāvagarbhāṇi yatsamānādhikaraṇānyonyābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakaṃ yanna bhavati tena samaṃ tasya 2 sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:387: tathā yatsamānādhikaraṇānyonyābhāvapratiyogi yadvanna bhavati tena samaṃ tasya 3 sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptirityādīni; @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:397: tena vahninā samaṃ dhūmasya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptirityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:398: asya lakṣaṇasya maṇāvanaktatvepi atyantābhāvagarbhalakṣaṇe avacchedakaghaṭitasyoktyā anyonyābhāvagarbhalakṣaṇepyuktaprāyatayā tadabhipretatvādupanyāsaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:400: yadvā yatsamānādhikaraṇānyonyābhāvapratiyogi yadvanna bhavati tena samaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:401: tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vā svasamānādhikarānyonyābhāvapratiyogi yadvanna bhavati tatkatvaṃ veta maṇyuktalakṣaṇadvayasyāpaunaruktyāya pariṣkārapūrvaṃ evaṃ dvedhānuvādo bodhyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:403: tadavacchinnena yena yasya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tayorvyāptirityevaṃ rūpāṇāṃ saṃbhāvitānāṃ grahaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt3u:407: 1 anaupādhikasaṃbandha ityasya vivaraṇarūpāṇi tatrāpi sādhyavyāpakeṣu sādhanāvyāpukatvaniṣedhaparyavasitāni
GSP29vytrkt3u:413: vā sādhanāvyāpakānāṃ sādhyāvyāpakatvena veti dvedheti hṛdi kṛtvā pakṣadharādyuktarītyāha-- tatrāpīti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:427: tathā svābhāvika 1 sambandho vyāptirityasya vivaraṇarūpāṇi yatsāmānādhikaraṇyāvacchedakarūpavatvaṃ yasya tasya sā vyāptirityādīni ca;
GSP29vytrkt3u:431: maṇau paścāduktasya pūrvamanuvādaḥ pūrvamuktasya paścādanuvādastu sādhyavyāpakatvasya
GSP29vytrkt3u:432: bhāvarūpatayā pūrvabhāvitvācca paścāttanasādhanāvyāpakatvābhāva eva pūrvaṃ vācyamityabhiprāya ityeke /
GSP29vytrkt3u:438: dhūme vahnisāmānādhikaraṇyāvacchedakaṃ rūpaṃ dhūmatvaṃ tadvatvaṃ dhūmasya vyāptirityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:439: yatsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ yasya tasya sāvyāptirityuktau vyabhicāriṇo 'pi vyāpyatāpatteravacchedaketyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:476: na kvāpyuktarūpābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakānavacchinnasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dhūmasya labhyata ityasaṃbhava iti tātparyāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:477: navyañtyāsena pratiyogitānavacchedakāvacchinnatvamartha iti pakṣadharoktamanūdya nirāha-- pratiyogiteti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:485: kiñca yasya yadatyantābhāvāsamānādhikaraṇatve sati yena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tena tasya sā vyāptirityevāstu/
GSP29vytrkt3u:494: vahnau nāstīti vaktāraṃ pratyāha-- kiṃ ca yasyeti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:514: kiñcātrādhikaraṇaṃ deśa eva vā kāla eva vā ubhayaṃ vā ubhayānugatamadhikaraṇasāmānyaṃ vā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:517: asti hi tayorapi yadā gotvaṃ tadāśvatvamiti vyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:520: asti hi tayorapi 1 yatrapākajaṃ rūpaṃ tatra pāka iti vyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:525: dvaiśikyāṃ vyāptau deśodhikaraṇaṃ kālikyāṃ kāla iti cet na/
GSP29vytrkt3u:541: kiñca tvanmatepi nityadravyāṇāṃ niradhikaraṇatvātteṣāṃ yadākāśaḥ tadā 1 nityadravyamiti vyāptirna syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:542: nanu kāla ākāśāderadhikaraṇaṃ ākāśaḥ sadā 2 stītyabādhitapratīterapi cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:544: kiṃ ca sarvatrākāśa ityapi pratatīterdeśopyākāśādhikaraṇaṃ syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:545: nanu -- svarūpasaṃbandhenākāśaḥ sadā sarvatrāsti samavāyavṛttyā tu nāstīti tayā vṛtyā 3 rūpādeḥ prameyatvādeścātyantābhāvopi kevalānvayī syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:549: kevalānvayyabhāpratiyogitvaṃ sadā sarvatra satvaṃ ca saṃbandhabhedena yuktimityāśaṅkya pratibandyā nirāha-- nanvityādinā// @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:550: 1.kālīdiriti vyā-ṭa. digiti vyā-ga.rā. 2.api padaṃ madhikam-ga.ṭa. 3.tyā gaganātyantābhāvaḥ kevalānvayīti cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:551: tarhi rūpādikaṃ prameyatvādikaṃ ca saṃyogavṛtyā kutrāpi neti tayā vṛtyā rūpādeḥ prameyatvādeścātyantābhāvopi kevalānvayī syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:556: gaganātyantābhāvopi svarūpasaṃbandhenaiva sarvatrāsti na tu saṃyogādivṛttyeti gaganātyantābhāvātyantābhāvarūpaṃ gaganamapi kevalānvayi syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:560: api caivaṃ samānādhikaraṇasādhāyasādhanavyaktiviśeṣayoreva vyāptiriti mate pṛthivītvasya gandhaṃ prati vyāpyatvaṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:566: prathamalakṣaṇaṃ nirasya dvitīyalakṣaṃ ca nirāha-- apicaivamiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:567: nanu tādṛśātyantābhāvapratiyogitāvacchedakaṃ yanna bhavati tadavacchinnasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ lakṣaṇārthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:568: bhavati ca gandhatvamanavacchedakaṃ pṛthivīgandhavatī netyapratīteriticettarhi pūrvalakṣaṇābheda eva//
GSP29vytrkt3u:569: kathañcidbhedabhimāne tu tuṣyatu durjana iti nyāyena doṣāntaramāha-- api ca gotvasyeti// @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:571: api ca gotvasya govyaktiṃ prati kālikī vyāptiḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:573: evaṃ pṛthivītvasya gandhena saha kālikī vyāptiḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:579: tathātve hi gotvasyāśvatvaṃ pratyapi kālikī vyāptirna syāt/ @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:587: tasya govyaktya 4 ntarābhāvasamānādhaikaraṇatvādityāśaṅkya nirāha-- na ca govyakteriti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:597: na ca sādhyasya vyāptiśarīrāntargatayā vṛtyā sādhanasamānādhikaraṇātyantābhāvā 2 pratiyogitvaṃ vivakṣitam,
GSP29vytrkt3u:600: na ca samavāyavṛtyā vahnyatyantābhāvasya saṃyogavṛtyā vahnisamānādhikaraṇatayā pratiyogivyadhikaraṇapadenaiva tannirāsa iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:601: yena hi sambandhena yatra hi 3 pratiyogino bhāvaḥ tenaiva sambandhena tatra pratiyogino 'vṛttireva hi pratiyogivaiyadhikaraṇyam/ @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:602: yattu tadāśvatthātyantābhāvasya kāle satvepi tasya pratiyogisamānādhikaraṇatvāt pratiyogivyadhikaraṇapadena tannirāsa iti tanna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:603: yena hi saṃbandhenetyādivakṣyamāṇadiśā tasyāpi pratiyogivyadhikaraṇatvādvya 4 ktyantarābhāvasyāpi vyaktidaśāyāṃ pratiyogisamānādhikaraṇatvenoktadoṣāparihārācca
GSP29vytrkt3u:606: 5 athāpi samavāyavatṛtyā vahnyabhāvasamānādhikaraṇyena dhūmasyāvyāpyatāpattirnetyāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ca samavāyeti// @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:610: anyathā kāle sarvābhāvānāṃ pratiyogisamānādhikaraṇatayā pratiyogivyadhikaraṇā 1 siddheḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:623: samavāyasaṃbandhena ca vahneravartanāt prāguktadoṣaḥ sustha eveti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:628: mūle kapisaṃyogo netivat mūle vṛkṣaḥ kapisaṃyukto netyabādhitapratīteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:633: nanu -- yaḥ saṃyogābhāvavānvṛkṣaḥ sa eva saṃyukta iti pratyabhijñāvirodha iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:634: pratyabhijñā hi kimabhedaṃ vidhatte kiṃ vā bhedaṃ niṣedhati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:645: nanvekasminneva vṛkṣe saṃyuktābhedaḥ saṃyuktabhedaśca kathaṃ virodhādityata āha-- virodhasya ceti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:646: yathāgrāvacchedena vṛkṣe kapisaṃyogo mūlāvacchedena tadatyantābhāvaḥ evamagrāvacchedena saṃyuktavṛkṣābhedo mūlāvacchedena bheda ityupapatterityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:651: anumitijñānaparyālocanayāpyasmaduktavyāptijñānameva kāraṇaṃ na tvaduktamatopi na tvaduktavyāptilakṣaṇaṃ yuktamityāha -- kiñcānumatīti// @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:654: -- na cenmūle saṃyuktānyonyābhāvātyantābhāvarūpo yaḥ 1 saṃyogastaddhīśca syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:657: kiṃ cānumitihetuḥ kimatyantābhāvādigarbhāṇāmuktasarvavyāptīnāṃ jñānaṃ kiṃ vā ladhvyā anyonyābhāvagarbhāyā eva jñānaṃ yadvā kadācitka 2 syacijjñānam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:669: anaupādhika 3 saṃbandhatvasya dvedhā vivaraṇaṃ yatkṛtaṃ tatra sādhyavyāpakavyāpyatvaparyavasitānaupādhikaratvajñānamanumitiheturuta @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:670: 1.yaḥ iti nāsti-ka.ṭa.rā. 2.syāści-ga.ka.ṭa.rā. 3.dhikatvasya dvedhā- ḍa. kasaṃbandhatvasya dve -ṭha. @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:683: naca niyāmakatvaṃ saṃsargavidhayaiva saṃbandhaviśeṣyakaṃ saṃbandhaviśeṣaṇakaṃ vā vyāptijñānaheturiti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:685: tathā ca saṃbandhatvaṃ prakāra evetyavaśyaṃ vācyatvenātmāśrayāparihārāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:686: yattu viśiṣṭadhīniyāmakatvarūpasaṃbandhatvasya prakāratvena bhānāvaśyaṃbhāvastadāpi saṃyogatvādinā rūpeṇaiva bhānamiti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:693: tasmāditi// doṣāṇāṃ samyagupapāditatvāditi vā aparihāryatvāditi vārthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:720: nanu tarkaṃ vinā vyāptyagrahāttarkasya ca vyāptidhīsāpekṣatvādanavastheti cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:721: atra kecit -- yatrāptavākyena vyāptirna tatra tarkāpekṣā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:735: atrārucibījaṃ tu śraddhayā siddhatvepi nyāyatonupapāditatve nyāyāsādhye niḥśaṅkapravṛtterayogāt tadarthaṃ nyāyānusaṃdhāne syādevānavasthetyevaṃ jñeyam// anādīti// @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:739: na cātra dehātmatvādāviva bādhostīti na tatra tarkā 2 pekṣā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:742: kiñca yā nirdeṣaśrutyā nardeṣajñānarūpasākṣiṇā vā siddhāvyāptirna tatra tarkāpekṣā/ @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:743: anādisiddhatvena jñātā niḥśaṅkamavagamyamānāḥ ye kāryakāraṇabhāvāḥ tanmūlāḥ kecana tarkā bījābhāve aṅkurābhāva ityādayaḥ ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:745: tatra yuktyādibādho yathā na tathānādisiddhakāryakāraṇabhāvamūlatarkeṣvastīti na tatra tarkāpekṣetyarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:746: nanvayaṃ pakṣaḥ maṇāveva kāryakāraṇabhāvāderanādisiddhatvepi tatra pramāṇānusāraṇe 'numāna eva paryavasānādanavasthaiveti dūṣita ityataḥ pakṣāntaramāha--
GSP29vytrkt3u:753: nanvayamapi pakṣaḥ stanyapānādāvanavasthoddhāropi bahvanidhūmayorvyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyāmanavastheti pakṣadharādau dūṣita iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:759: gauḥ na padā spṛṣṭavyetyādau yo brāhmaṇaḥ sa na hantavya ityādivyāptiḥ śrutisiddhā/ @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:763: anyāpi vyāptidhīratraiva viśrāmyatīti nānavasthā/ uktaṃ hi --
GSP29vytrkt3u:768: sahakāriṇa iti paddhatau upādhyabhāvaniścayasya sahakāritvoktiḥ sopādhiśaṅkāsthalābhiprāyā
GSP29vytrkt3u:777: sarvavyāptidhiyastatraiva paryavasānaṃ vivādinaṃ prati bhūyodarśanavāde maṇau siddhāntitaṃ pakṣamupetyāha-- api ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:785: pārthivatvalohalekhyatvayostu vajra eva vyabhicāradarśanāttadagrahaḥ/ uktaṃ hi --
GSP29vytrkt3u:790: sā ca kvicitkena 1 tarkeṇa nirasyata iti na 2 tatra tarkāpekṣā /
GSP29vytrkt3u:794: nanvevaṃ yatpārthivaṃ tallohalekhyamiti bahuṣu sthaleṣu sahacāradarśanāvdyabhicārādarśanācca vyāptigrahaḥ syādityata āha -- pārthivatveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:799: talliṅgaṃ dhūmādikaṃ vahnyādisādhyavyabhicāreddhā sarvathāpyadṛṣṭa eva sati tasya vahneḥ sādhakaṃ vyāpyaṃ na tu vyabhicāradarśane 3 pramāṇabādhe tu sādhakaṃ na bhavedityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:802: viśeṣādarśanasya vyabhicārivyāvṛttaviśeṣādarśanasya 4 sarvatra satvādityata śaṅkā sārvatrikī syādityanvayaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:803: vyāghātāvadhirāśaṅketi vakṣyamāṇodayanavākyaṃ vakṣyamāṇāvdyāghātāvadhitvācchaṅkāyā iti bhaktipādīyachalalakṣaṇoktiprastāvagatasudhāvākyaṃ hradi kṛtvā vyāghātabhiyā evaṃ śaṅkā
GSP29vytrkt3u:809: iti nyāyena śaṅkā sārvatrikī syāditi cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:810: kimiyaṃ śaṅkā svārthānumāne syāt parārthānumāne vā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:813: evaṃ śaṅkāyāṃ cārvākasya pratyakṣepi karacaraṇādiviśeṣadarśane 'dvaitinopi vedanirdeṣatvajñāne upakramādiliṅganāṃ tātparyāvyabhicārajñāne ca
GSP29vytrkt3u:814: śaṅkāviṣakajñānopi svārthasya vyabhicāraśaṅkyā tvadukta 1 vyabhicāraśaṅkāyā eva siddhyāpatteśca/
GSP29vytrkt3u:815: yadi ca tatra tricatura 2 kakṣyānantaraṃ koṭismaraṇādyabhāvānna śaṅkā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:818: tathā ca katipayakakṣyānantaraṃ kutracitkoṭyasmaraṇasya kutracidutkaṭaviṣayāntarasaṃcāras kutracijjijñāsābhāvasya kutracit --“3 yatvādau śraddhayā siddhaṃ punarnyāyena sādhitam”/
GSP29vytrkt3u:819: iti nyāyena svārasikaviśvāsasyā 4 vaśyakatvānna sarvatra śaṅkā/ @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:827: na hi kaścidapi yāvajjīvaṃ koṭismaraṇa 1 dhārāyāmeva vyāpriyamāṇonubhūyate/
GSP29vytrkt3u:830: anyathā pratyakṣepi viśeṣadarśanadhārāyāṃ vedepa vedanirdeṣatva 2 jñānadhārāyāṃ ca vyāpriyeta/ uktaṃ hi --
GSP29vytrkt3u:833: iti/ dvitīyepi svārthānumāne śaṅkādhāyakaṃ na tāvtaprativādivākyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:842: viśvāsādinā pramāṇatvena siddhasya śaṅkanāspadatvaṃ jñānapādīyānuvyākhyāne uktamityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:847: nanu upajīvyaṃ kathaṃ bādhyamityata āha-- upajīvyatvamastvalamiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:863: ata eva paddhatau“soyaṃ kaścitpramāṇāntarānugrāhako bhavatī“ti tarkasya kvacitkatvamevoktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:866: sādhakhasabasraṃ nirdeṣatvena tvadabhimate 1 tvadvākye doṣasahasraṃ ca bhaviṣyatītyādyatiprasaṅgahetutvāt
GSP29vytrkt3u:888: iti / kathaṃ ca pratyakṣasiddhe annādau niḥśaṅkasya pratyakṣasiddhāyāṃ vyāptau śaṅkā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:893: nanu-- pratyakṣa 2 vyāptau śaṅkānudayepyanvayavyāptau sā bhaviṣyati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:894: paricitapratyakṣasthaleṣu hetoḥ sādhyavyabhicārajñānapyatītādau tacchaṅkayā 2 sāsyādevetyata āha-- uktaṃ ceti// yadvā
GSP29vytrkt3u:895: sannikṛṣṭakatipayadhūmādivyaktivyāptigrahepyatītadivyaktiṣu tadgrahopāyābhāvātkathaṃ sarvatra vyāptigraha ityata āha-- uktaṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:897: sarvatra satvādityā 3 dinā pūrvapakṣiṇoktaṃ viśeṣādarśanamabhyupetya svārthānumāne
GSP29vytrkt3u:900: atraiva bhaṅge kiñca vyabhicārivyāvṛttiviśeṣasyādarśana ityādigrantheneti bhāvaḥ// @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:904: vācayiṣyate ca paramukhenaiva vyāptidhīkāle vyabhicara 1 vyāvṛttaviśeṣadarśanamapyastīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:906: tatra prati vādinā mayedaṃ sādhyaṃ vyabhicāriṣyatīti sarvatra śaṅkotthāpanāditi dvitīyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:907: 2 tathāpi tṛptyarthaṃ bhojane parabodhanārthaṃ śabdoccāraṇe evaṃ tattatkāryoddeśena tattatkāraṇe ca pravṛttirūpasvakriyāvyāghātena śaṅkānudayāt/ atra -- @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:908: parārthānumāne veti prāgvikalpitaṃ dvitīpakṣaṃ vivṛṇvanneti nirāha-- nāpīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:910: mayā cārvākeṇa khaṇḍanakāreṇa vā svakriyāvyāghātena vyāghāto virodho hānirvā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:911: yadi sarvatra śaṅkā tvayotthāpyate tarhi bhojanamapi 3 tṛptiṃ vyabhicariṣyati śabdoccāraṇamapi parabodhaṃ vyabhicariṣyatīti bhojanādau na pravṛttiḥ
GSP29vytrkt3u:914: evaṃ vyāghātāvadhirāśaṅketyetadvṛdi kṛtvā vyāghātadaṇḍabhayena sarvatra śaṅkā notpattumarhatītyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:928: kālāntare deśāntare vā ayaṃ hetuḥ sādhyaṃ vyabhicāriṣyatīti śaṅkā cedutpannā tadānumānaṃ pramāṇamastyeva/
GSP29vytrkt3u:930: na cedevaṃ śaṅkā tadā sutarāṃ niḥsandehamanumānaṃ pramāṇamastyeva/
GSP29vytrkt3u:931: nanva 3 numānaṃ pramāṇaṃ śaṅkā tu kathaṃ nivartyeti suhṛdbhāvena pṛcchantaṃ pratyāha-- tarkaḥ śaṅkāvadhirmataḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:933: nanu tarkepi vyāpterāvaśyakatvāttatrāpi śaṅkāyāṃ tarkāntarānveṣaṇenavastheti cettatrottaraṃ -- vyāghātāvadhirāśaṅketi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:935: yatra śaṅkāyāṃ kriyaṇāyāṃ svakriyāvyāghātādirbhavati tatra na śaṅkotpattumarhatīti tṛtīyaparicchede kusumāḍhjalyuktaślokārthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:941: tathā ca śaṅkā pratiyogitayā vyāghātanirūpakatvena tannirvāhiketi kathaṃ śaṅkāṃ vinā vyāghātaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:943: kimanumānaprāmāṇyepi vyāptiniścayo na saṃbhavatītyucyate na saṃbhavatītyucyate kiṃ vānumānamātramapramāṇamiti/ nādyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:953: evaṃ ca vyāghātāvadhirāśaṅketi tarkaḥ śaṅkāvadhiriti ca kuta ityuttarārdhasya svaṣṭatvādartho noktaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:954: vyāptini 1 ścayo na saṃbhavatīti tatsaṃbhavasya tarkādhīnatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:959: nanu tarkādhīnavyāptiniśca 3 hetukaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na prāptamevetyata āha-- na hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:960: anumānaprāmāṇyaṃ svīkurvatā vyāptiniścaya 4 saṃbhavovaśyaṃ vācyonyathātiprasaṅgāditi bhāvenāha-- vyabhicāriṇāmapīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:962: kaścidapi mama sthāpyaḥ pakṣo neti vadataḥ khaṇḍanakārasyetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:972: anumānasyeva tarkasyāpi vyāptiniścayaṃ vinaiva sādhakhatvasaṃbhāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:973: yadvā tatprāmāṇyanirvāhakopāyāntarābhāvāt asmaduktanirvāhasyaiva tvayāpi vācyatvāttaddūṣaṇoktirayuktetyāha-- vyāptīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:975: paramārthādvaitadṛṣṭyā nāsti samayabandhādivyavahāra ityata āha-- vyāpteriti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:976: yadvā vyāptiniścayo na saṃbhavatītyetatsva 2 vyāhatamityāha-- vyāpteriti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:979: lakṣaṇayādvaitajñānamastu kiṃ śaktigrahaṇenetyata āha-- lakṣaṇāyā iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:989: advaite ṣaḍvidhatātparyaliṅgānāṃ prapañcamithyātvānubhūtasvaprakāśatvādau dṛśya 1 mānatvānubhūtitvādiliṅgānāṃ coktyayogācca/
GSP29vytrkt3u:998: kālānta 3 rādau sādhyaṃ vyabhicariṣyati kimiti śaṅkāspada
GSP29vytrkt3u:999: ityarthaḥ/ tātvikaprāmāṇyameva dṛśyatvādi hetūnāṃ upeyaṃ tadbodhya 4 mithyātvādestātvikatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt3u:1005: pratyakṣepi netrameva pramāṇaṃ na tu śrotrādi vedepi dvaitavākyameva pramāṇaṃ natvadvaitavākyamiti ca syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1006: etenānumānātsaṃbhāvanāmātreṇa pravṛtyādikaṃ saṃvādācca prāmāṇyābhimāna iti nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1007: anumānājjñānaṃ jāyate tacca 1 saṃvādītita vadatā tvayaiva tatpāmāṇyayopagamāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1017: saṃbhāvanamātreṇa pravṛttau sakampaiva pravṛttiḥ syāt na tu niṣkampetayāha-- niṣkampeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1018: nanu mayopetā saṃbhāvanā niṣkampa 4 pravṛttijanikaivetyata āha -- evamiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1022: ato na tatra saṃbhāvanāmātropagamena pratyakṣāderaprāmāṇyāpāta ityata āha-- autsargiketi// @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1028: darśane tu yaddarśane tava saṃbhāvanā taddarśanenaiva mama niścayostu/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1029: sa viśeṣaḥ ka iti cedātmānameva pṛccha/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1031: yadi tava samakoṭi 1 śahkāsāmagrīviraho saṃbhāvanā hetuḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1033: yadi ca tavānveṣaṇepi vyabhicārādarśanasahakṛtamupādhyadarśanaṃ vā upādhya 2 darśanasaṃbhāvanā vā yāvacchaktiparīkṣā
GSP29vytrkt3u:1036: evaṃ ca yaduktaṃ vyāghāto yadītyādi tadaparāddhoṣerdhānuṣksayeva valgitamātram/ @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1041: paramukhenaiva viśeṣasvarūpaṃ vācayan samaṃ mamāpītyāha -- yadi taveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1043: aparāddhaḥ lakṣyādanyatra gataḥ iṣuḥ śaro yasya tasyetyarthaḥ/ @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1046: nahi mayā 1 niṣpanna bhojana 2 kriyā vā kriyāyāḥ śaṅkāyāḥ śaṅkayā saha virodho vā tajjñānaṃ vā śaṅkānivartakamityucyate/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1047: yena kriyāyāṃ satyāṃ śaṅkānivṛtya tṛptikāraṇatvanirṇayaḥ tasmiṃśca sati kriyeti tvaduktonyonyāśrayaḥ tvaduktavirodhi 3 pratiyogiśaṅkāvaśyaṃbhāvaśca 4 syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1048: kintu tvamapi 5 kriyāmūlabhūtena śaṅkāviruddhakoṭyālambana 6 viśeṣadarśanena nivṛttaśaṅkaḥ san manasā vyāptiṃ niścinuṣe/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1051: na hi tatarthaṃ tatra niṣkampaṃ pravartate tacca tatkāraṇaṃ neti śaṅkate ceti saṃbhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1056: kiñca śaṅkānivartakena vyāghātena 1 nivartyāyāḥ śaṅkāyāḥ svasmātpūrvasatvamevāpekṣyate/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1059: tathātve hi virodha eva na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1060: nahi viśeṣadarśananivartyā śaṅkā bādha nivartyā bhrāntiḥ brahmajñānanivartyāvidyā tejonivartyaṃ timiraṃ ca nivartakasamakālaṃ dṛṣṭam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1061: bhinnakālīnā ca śaṅkā vyāghātena nivartitatvānna vyāghātakālesti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1064: etena --“vyāghātasya svarūpasataḥ śaṅkānivartakatve śaṅkā nityanivṛttā syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1067: śaṅkāyāḥ satvamupetyāpi na doṣa ityāha-- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1070: nājāta ekonyaṃ hanti nāpyanyādhāra iti nyāyena vadhyaghātakasthale sahāvasthānamāvaśyakamityato deśatastathātvepi na kālatastathātvaṃ kintu paurvāparyameveti bhāvenāha-- na hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1072: nanu yadāṅkaḍhācicchaṅkāyāḥ satve syādeva tannivṛtyarthaṃ tarkāpekṣetyanavasthāpattirevetyata āha-- bhinneti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1076: vyāghātarūpavirodhasya tadabhāvavyāpyatvātmakatayā vyāptigarbhitatvena tajjñānāya punastakrāpekṣeti“khaṇḍanaślokasya vyākhyānāntaramapyapāstam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1080: na tu tatprayojyā kriyā na ca kriyājñānaṃ śaṅkānivartakam yenānyonyāśrayaḥ syāt ityāhuḥ //
GSP29vytrkt3u:1085: vyāghāto yadi svarūpasan śaṅkānivartakastarhi śaṅkānitya 1 nivṛttā syāt iti śeṣaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1087: na caita 2 tsvarūpasannivartakona cettajjñānāya vyāptijñānāpekṣāyāṃ vyabhicāraśaṅkāstyevetyevaṃ vyākhyānāntaramityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1095: mityetavdyākhyānasudhāyā api nahi mayetyādinokta evābhiprāya ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1108: tathāca sarvāntargatāśeṣaviśeṣāṇāṃ jñātatvādayaṃ ghaṭo ne 2 ti saṃśayādikaṃ na syāt/ @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1118: na ca prameyamiti jñānaṃ sarvaviṣakamapi prameyatvaprakārameva na tu ghaṭatvādiprakārakaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:1122: atra 2 kecidāhuḥ -- yadyapi prameyamiti jñānaṃ 1 ghaṭatvādivaiśiṣṭyaviṣayakatvam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1123: tathāpi na ghaṭatvādiviśeṣaṇajñānajanyaṃ prameyamiti jñānātpūrvaṃ ghaṭatvādijñānaniyame mānābhāvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1124: janyajñānasya saṃśayādivirodhitve ca tadviśeṣaṇajñānajanyatvaṃ tantramiti saṃśayādikaṃ yuktamiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1125: yadvā yathā jñānasya svābhāvena svaviṣayeṇa ca saha saṃbandhe 3 viśiṣṭepyabhāvādvyāvṛtto viṣayeṇa saha saṃbandhaviśeṣo 'ntya eva,
GSP29vytrkt3u:1126: yathā vā ghaṭayamityatra ghaṭaghaṭatvayorviṣayatve 'viśiṣṭepi ghaṭatvāṃśe viśeṣyavyāvṛttaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1130: ayaṃ ghaṭo na vetyādisaṃdehasya ghaṭa evāyamiti ghaṭatvādiprakārakaniścayanivartyatvāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1131: ghaṭatvādiprakārakamapi bhavati prameyatvena jñānamityāha-- tatprakārakatvaṃ hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1140: tathā ghaṭoyaṃ prameyamiti jñānadvayepi ghaṭatvasya bhāsamānavaiśiṣṭyapratiyogitvarūpa
GSP29vytrkt3u:1143: tena ca svarūpasatā saṃbandhena ghaṭatvaviṣayakatvaṃ saṃśayavirodhitvena tantram/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1150: śe ghaṭatvena 6 saha jñānasya viśeṣyavyāvṛtto 'nya evetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1158: śaṅkhaḥ śveta iti sākṣātkārasya śaṅkhatvādi 7 hetujanyānumiteścetyarthaḥ// @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1173: na hi śvaityāṃśe dvayoḥ kaścidapi viśeṣostīti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1180: 1.kāraṇe vai- ka kāraṇavai- ga.rā. 2.tve gha-ka.rā. 3.tvaṃ gha-ga. 3.yathākramamanvayaḥ cākṣuṣeti nirdeṣacākṣuṣetyarthaḥ na tu tajjanyamiti ityasti-ṭha. @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1188: nanvevaṃ cet-- prameyatvaviśiṣṭaghaṭatvānayaṃ iti jñānamapi saṃśayavirodhi na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1189: tatra ghaṭatvasya virodhisādhāraṇaprameyatvāliṅgitatvenaiva prakāratvā1 diti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1191: prameyamitijñāne tu svasminbhāsamānasya sarvasyāpi prameyatvāliṅgitatvena pratīteḥ// @----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1195: yadvā sāmānyaṃ tu samānānāṃ sadṛśānāṃ bhāvaḥ sāmānyamiti sādṛśyamevetyanugatajātibhaṅgoktidiśā
GSP29vytrkt3u:1201: viruddhā yā koṭiḥ tadavyāvṛttaṃ tasyāṃ vidyamānaṃ yadrūpaṃ yo dharmaḥ tadanāliṅgitetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1210: ghaṭasya prameyatvenaiva saha guṇapradhānabhāvalakṣaṇasaṃbandhaṃ gṛhṇāti na tu ghaṭatvādinā saha tadā tadagrahepi anyadā tadgrahasaṃbhavena hānyabhāvāditi na saṃśayavirodhi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1213: yadvā vyāptijñānaṃ viprakṛṣṭavyāpyāṃśe na niścayarūpaṃ kintu saṃbhāvanārūpam vyāptyaṃśe tu niścayarūpamiti narasiṃhākāramiti na kopi doṣaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1214: ata eva paddhatau“yadyanyatrāpi dhūmaḥ syāttarhi tasyāpyevamityevaṃ vyāptigraho bhavatītyataḥ
GSP29vytrkt3u:1229: dṛśyate hi yadyatithirāgacche 1 ttarhi bhojayitavyaḥ yadi rathaṃrasāmā somaḥ syādaindravāyavāgrāt
GSP29vytrkt3u:1230: gṛhṇīyādi 2ti vākyajanya 3 jñānasya nimittāṃśe saṃbhāvanātvepi tasminsati naimittikaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:1234: anyathā tavāpi sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahmetyādivākyārthadīrna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1240: jyotiṣṭome hi rathantaraṃ pṛṣṭaṃ bṛhatpṛṣṭaṃ bhavatīti vaikalpike rathantarākhyabṛhadākhyasāmanī
GSP29vytrkt3u:1243: tatra somo jyotiṣṭomo yadi rathantarākhyasomayuktaḥ syāt tadā aindravāyava evāgraḥ prāthamiko yeṣāṃ tānaindravāyavāgrāngṛhṇīyādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1258: evamanumānavakṣaṇaṃ tadaṅga 1 vyāptisvarūpaṃ tanniścayopāya 2 muktvā tatra bādhakaṃ ca nirasyedānīmanumānasahakārisaṃpattirūpāvasaraprāptā pakṣatā nirūpyata ityāha-- atheti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1259: yadvānumānasya dvayaṃ sāmarthyaṃ vyāptiḥ samucitadeśavṛttitvaṃ ca/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1263: tathā ca kvācitkapakṣadharmatāsāpekṣatvātsā nirūpyata ityāha -- atheti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1269: sādhanetivyāptivāraṇāya dharmipadam 1 dharmitvaṃ ca sādhyāpekṣayā dhyeyamiti prekṣāvantaḥ// @--------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1277: atra saṃdigdhaṃ ca tat sādhyaṃ ca saṃdigdhasādhyaṃ saṃdigdhasādhyaṃ dharmo yasyeti bahuvrīhau sati“dharmādanickevalādi“tyanicpratyayaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1280: tena pūrvapadībhavataḥ kevalādanyanirapekṣātparo yo dharmaśabdastadantādityartho bhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1281: tathā ca saṃdigdhasādhyapadasya bahuvrīhau pūrvapadībhavato 'nyanirapekṣatvādbhavatyanijiti 2 dhyeyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1285: parāmarśātpūrvaṃ liṅgadarśanavyāpti 4 smaraṇādinā tasya nāśāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1292: yadvā sādhyasādhakamānābhāvo yatra parvatādipradeśe sa ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1294: śrotavyo gurūpadeśena jñātavyo mantavyo yuktyanusaṃdhānarūpamananotpannānumitirūpajñānena viṣayīkartavya ityarthaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1295: 1.yadātu dhātu vṛtyuktadiśā kevalāditi na dharmaviśeṣaṇaṃ kintu ityastu -ṭha. 2.dhyeyamiti
GSP29vytrkt3u:1296: na -ṭa.ḍa. 3.yadā tu 'vṛttau pañcamāntyapāde kevalātpūrvapadāt na padasamudāyāt ityuktadiśāthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt3u:1300: śrotavyo mantavya ityādau sādhake satyapi pakṣatvadarśanāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1306: nāpi sādhāyavattayā viṣādhayiṣāviṣayo yaḥ sa pakṣaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1310: śravaṇaśabditaṃ upadeśajanyaṃ yajjñānaṃ tasminsatyeva tatsamānaviṣayaśravaṇānantarabhāvimanana 3 rūpānumānena śravaṇaviṣayārthānumityanudayena mananavaiyarthyāpatteriti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1318: sādhyavatvena sādhayitumicchā sādhyavattayā siṣādhayiṣā tadviṣaya ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1322: 1.yaḥ sa iti nāsti-ṭa.rā. 2.cchayānumitida-ka. ṣṭāyā-ga.ṭa.rā. 3.“śravaṇaviṣayārthasyānumānena tatra pakṣatābhāve anumityanudayena“ityasti-ṭa.ḍa. nena śra ityasti-ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1325: evaṃ ca mantavya ityatar siṣādhayiṣāviraharūpaviśeṣaṇābhāvāt ghanagarjitena madhānumāne
GSP29vytrkt3u:1326: sādhakamānarūpaviśeṣyābhāvāt siṣādhayiṣoḥ puṃso dhūmānumāne ubhayābhāvādvi 1 śiṣṭābhāvādviśiṣṭābhāvo
GSP29vytrkt3u:1328: yatra tu siṣādhayiṣā 3 virahayute spaṣṭadṛṣṭe ghaṭādau viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ cāsti na tatra pakṣateti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1329: asiṣādhayiṣordhūmānumāne ghanagarjitena meghānumāne cānumiteḥ pūrvaṃ liṅgaparāmarśarūpasadhakhamānasya satvenāpakṣatvāpātāt// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1340: ca tatra viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayordvayorapi satvenānyatarābhāvena vobhayābhāvena vā na viśiṣṭābhāvastatrāstītyavyāptiriti bhāvaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1341: 1.viśiṣṭābhāvāditi nāsti-ṭa.ka.ga.rā. 2.punaḥ tatreti nāsti-ka.ga.ṭa. prathamatopi nāsti-rā. 3.rahite-ka.ga.ṭa. 4.ṣopa-ṭa. ṣābhāvo-ḍa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1345: anumiteḥ pūrvaṃ ca sādhakamānatvepi na sādhyasya siddhirastīti tatra pakṣatā yuktā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1346: nanu -- evaṃ sati saṃśayānanatrapratyakṣasthale pakṣatā syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1348: tasmātsiṣādhayiṣāvirahasaharakṛtasiddhitatkaraṇānyāntatvā 1 vacchinnābhāvo yatra sa 2 eva ca pakṣaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1351: sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti saṃśayānantaraṃ puruṣatvavyāpyakarādirūpaviśeṣadarśanānantaraṃ puruṣa evāyamiti jāyamānapratyakṣasthala ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1352: saṃśayānantarapratyakṣasthale doṣaparihārāya yajñapitanokta samādhiṃ pakṣadharādyuktadoṣeṇa pūrvapakṣimukhenaiva nirasitumāha-- tasmātsiṣādhayiṣeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1354: siddhitatkaraṇābhyāṃ yadanyat jagat tadanyat siddhistatkaraṇaṃ ca tatvenetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1358: nanvevaṃ 4 dhūmādisthepyuktadiśā liṅgaparāmarśasatvātpakṣatā nasyādityata āha-- dhūmeti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1362: evaṃ ca saṃśayānantarapratyakṣasthale ca siddherabhāvepi puruṣatvavyāpyakara 1 caraṇādirūpasiddhikaraṇasya satvānna pakṣatā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1368: anyathā dhūmānumānepi liṅgaparāmarśānantaraṃ tadanuvyavasāya eva syanna tvanumitiriti vācyam/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1370: evaṃ cedapi saṃśayottarapratyakṣasthale puruṣatvavyāpyakarādidarśanarūpaparāmarśasatvepi taditarapatyakṣarūpasiddhikaraṇasyāpi satvān 4 tatra pakṣatāpattiriti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1373: tathā ca tadarthaṃ siddhitatkaraṇānyānayatvetyādi na vaktavyamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1374: etena tatra pakṣatāvirahadarśanā 5 tpakṣatāsatvasya tatra 6 kenāpyakathanāditi maṇikaṇṭhoktaṃ nādartavyamityuktaṃ bhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1376: parāmarśotpatyanantaraṃ parāmarśānuvyavasāyaṃ pratibadhyānumiterevotpādobhyupagato 'numitisāmagryā balavatvayuktimāśritya tanna syāt ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1379: parāmarśasya caramakāraṇatvaṃ ca 7 svasya jñātaikasatvena svapratyakṣājanakatveneti dhyeyam/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1391: ayaṃ ca karādimānityeva tatra dhīrnatu puruṣatvavyāpyakarādimānayamitita dhīrityanumitisāmagryabhāvādeva nānumitirna tu pakṣatāvirahāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1392: tatrāpyastu parāmarśa iti vādinaṃ pratyāha-- sākṣāditi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1395: samāne viṣaye pratyakṣasāmagryā balavatvepi bhinne viṣaye 'numitisāmagrībalavatvasaṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1407: tvayāca pakṣatāyāṃ satyāmapi pratyakṣasāmagrībalavatīti 1 kalpanāditi cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1411: tvayā ceti// saṃśayottarapratyakṣasthale pakṣatāstīti vādinā cetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1419: anumitsādaśāyāṃ anumitirna syāditi doṣo neti yejyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1422: siṣādhayiṣāvirahasahakṛtasiddhītyādivadatā siṣādhayiṣāvirahe sita siddhiḥ pratibandhikā tasyāṃ tu satyāṃ neti kṛtvā tādṛśasiddhyādyabhāvaḥ pakṣatetyuktatvāditi
GSP29vytrkt3u:1426: 1.tyuktamiti cenna -ga.ṭa.rā. 2.tathācānumitsāviraha sahakṛtapratyakṣasāmagrībalavatīti kalpanāt -ga.ṭa.rā. 3.anumitsāvati tadabhāvavati cetyarthaḥ ityadhikam -- ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1431: niścitavatopi giriśikhare abhraṃlihāṃ dhūmarekhāṃ paśyato daivāvdyāptismaraṇe sati ananumitsoranumitiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1436: asti cātra na kevalaṃ vahniḥ śrutaḥ kiṃ tvanumitopītyanubhavaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1440: maṇyādisthalepi mantrānyānyābhāvatvenāpi hetutāpatyā pratibandhakābhāvakūṭaḥ kāraṇamiti siddhāntabhaṅgāpatteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1446: na ca 2. pakṣataiva neti vācyam anumitirūpaphaladarśanena tatra pakṣatāyā āvaśyakatvādityāha-- dṛśyate hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1451: atrānumitsākalpane ca ghaṭanagarjitena medhānumānepi sā kalpyatām/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1453: na ca chinne chidāntaramiva paricchine piracchedāntaramaśakyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1459: nanu tatra phalabalenānumitsaiva kalpyatāṃ evaṃ cānumitsāviraharūpaviśeṣaṇābhāvaprayuktaviśiṣṭābhāvarūpapakṣatāsatvānnadoṣa ityata āha-- atreti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1461: evaṃ ca 3 tatra viśeṣaṇasatvamupetya sādhakamānarūpaviśeṣyābhāvaprayuktaviśiṣṭābhāvoktyā pakṣatvopapādanamasaṅgataṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1464: paricchedāntaraṃ kasyāpi nāstīti atha paricchettureva neti asminpakṣepi kālāntare
GSP29vytrkt3u:1465: 4 nāstyuta tadā tadetyatrāpi pramāṇāntareṇa nāsti uta pūrvaparicchedajanakapramāṇena
GSP29vytrkt3u:1466: śabdaliṅgābhyāṃ paricchinne punastābhyāmeva paricchedāntare neti kalpānkrameṇa nirāha--
GSP29vytrkt3u:1468: 1.dhastū bha-ṭa.ga. 2.ghaṭapadaṃ na- ṭha.ṭa. 3.evaṃ ca iti na -ṭa. tatretyapi na -ḍaḥ. 4.ropi na -ḍa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1470: kiñca maṇimantrādivatsiddheḥ pratibandhakatve siddhe viśiṣṭābhāvasya kāraṇatvaṃ siddhyet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1475: api ca yadi virodhyaviṣayiṇyapi siddhiḥ siṣādhayiṣāvirahasahakārisaṃpatyā samānaviṣayā 1 numitipratibandhikā
GSP29vytrkt3u:1478: na ca siddheravirodhitve 'numitidhārā na vicchidyeneti vācyam/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1480: anyathā pratibandhake sati kāryodayasya durghaṭatvādityata āha-- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1481: pratibandhakatvaṃ siddheḥ kiṃ grāhyābhāvāvagāhitvenota siddhyantara 2 vighaṭakatvenānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vā na 3 trayamapīti krameṇa nirāha--
GSP29vytrkt3u:1482: siddheḥ 4 pratibandhakatve sādhakaṃ netyuktvā bādhakamapyāha-- api ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1485: siddherapratibandhakatve 'numityavicchedo vā siddhasādhanatvasyādoṣatvaṃ vā syādityata ādyaṃ bādhakaṃ tāvadāśaṅkya nirāha-- na ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1492: na ca liṅgaparāmarśasya sthitikṣaṇe caikā tannāsakṣaṇe cānyetyanumitidvayaṃ niyameva syāt taddhetoḥ satvāditi vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1495: kathaṃ hi vijñātaṃ bhavatā kadāpyanumitidvayaṃ nāstīti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1497: kāraṇībhūtasya śābdagocarajñānasya vināśena kāraṇābhāvānna śābdabodhaparaṃpareti cetsamamihāpītyāha-- liṅgaparāmarśasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1506: siddhasādhanaṃ tu parārthānumāna eva doṣo na svārthānumāne iti vakṣyate//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1511: etena siddhyabhāvasya pakṣatātvakhaṇḍanenaiva siṣādhayiṣāvirahasahakṛtasādhyaniścayābhāvaḥ pakṣateti śiromaṇipakṣopi pratyukto dhyeyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1516: liṅgābhimatas yatra yadā yaṃ prati yadvijananānukūlasahakārisaṃpattistatra tadā taṃ prati tatsādhyam -- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1519: vivakṣuḥ“liṅgena yatpratītirjanayitavyā sa sādhyadharma“iti ṭīkoktaṃ pariṣkṛrvansādhyasvarūpaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:1521: 1.“tasmātparoktavakrapakṣalakṣaṇeṣu satyāṃ siddhau asatyāmapi siṣādhayiṣāyāṃ yā anupapattistatrāvyāptiḥ
GSP29vytrkt3u:1522: siddheranumitipratibandhakatve bījābhāvaḥ liṅgajñānasyāpi liṅgaparāmarśapratibandhakatvāpātaḥ iti doṣatrayam /
GSP29vytrkt3u:1526: -- tādṛśasādhyaviśiṣṭasya tadā taṃ prati tasyānumitau pakṣaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1527: na ca pakṣatāyā apyanumitihetutvena sahakārirūpāyāḥ kathaṃ sahakārisaṃpattirūpateti vācyam/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1531: deśāntare kalāntare puruṣāntaraṃ prati vastvantarajñāne cānukūlasahakārisaṃpattimādāya deśāntarādau sādhyatāpattidoṣanirāsāya yattacchabdacatuṣṭayam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1534: etena sādhyaśabdena kiṃ saṃdigdho dharmo vivakṣitaḥ kiṃ vā prajñāpanīyaḥ yadvā pramitsitaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt3u:1543: evaṃ ca parvataniṣṭhadhūmena parvatīyavahnyanumityutpādanadaśāyāṃ vahneḥ sādhyatvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:1546: astu sādhyamevaṃ rūpaṃ tataḥ kimityata āha-- tādṛśeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1557: nanvevaṃ sati liṅgaparāmarśadaśāyāmeva pakṣatā na tu tataḥ prāk/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1560: atrāpi kālāntare puruṣāntaraṃ prati vastvantarānumitau vastvantaraviśiṣṭasya pakṣatāvyudāsāya tadā taṃ prati tasyetyuktiḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1565: sādhyaviśiṣṭaḥ pakṣa ityevokte vastutogniviśiṣṭaparvatasyāpi sādhyatvāttadviśiṣṭānyasya pakṣatvaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1567: na ca vahnireva sādhyo na parvata iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1569: parvatasaṃbandhitvenāsiddhatvāttadrūpeṇa vahniḥ sādhyate iti cettarhi yathā parvata
GSP29vytrkt3u:1570: saṃbandhitvena vahniḥ sādhyaḥ tathā parvatopyagnisaṃbandhitvena sādhya eva svarūpamātrasiddhāvapi
GSP29vytrkt3u:1572: nanu nyāyamate sarakārisaṃpattirūpatvaṃ pakṣatālakṣaṇasaṃbhavatītyata āha- tvanmata iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1575: tathāca tava matepi pakṣatāyā na sahakāritvamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1582: liṅgaparāmarśasya pakṣadharmatāviṣayakatvaṃ hi na svapūrvakāle svakāle ca vidyamānā yā pakṣatā tadāśraye vyāpyavatvaviṣayakatvam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1583: kiṃ tu svakāle vastugatyā vidyamānā yā pakṣatā tadaśraye vyāpyavatvaviṣayakatvam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1589: etadevābhipretya mithyātvānumānakhaṇḍanaṭīkāyāṃ“sādhyadharmaviśiṣṭaḥ pakṣa“iti mūlavyākhyāvasare“yatpratītirliṅgena janayitavyā sa sādhyadharma“ityuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1591: pakṣatādhikaraṇavṛttiryo dharmaḥ ta 2 dviṣayakatvasya 3 pakṣadharmatāviṣayakatvena pakṣatāyāḥ parāmarśakālatāvaśyaṃ bhāvāditi bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1592: nanvevaṃ pakṣatāyāḥ parāmarśakālīnatvena parāmarśasya tadaviṣayakatvāttasya caramakālatvena
GSP29vytrkt3u:1598: nanvevaṃ sapakṣādāvapi kadāciduktasahakārisaṃpatteḥ saṃbhavātpakṣepi kadācittadasaṃbhavādativyāptyavyāptī syātāmityata āha-- sapakṣeti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1602: tatra hi tavyapratyayena viṣayaśabdena coktasahakārisaṃpattirūpānumitiviṣayatva 1 yogyataivābhipretā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1604: vyāpakavatvena viśeṣaṇe 2 na tadanumitiviṣayorapi 3 vyāpake vyāpakatāvacchedakādau ca nātivyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1608: asminpakṣe liṅgaparāmarśasya pakṣadharmatāviṣayakatvaṃ tu svajanyaphalasamānakālīnapakṣatāśraye vyāpyavatvaviṣayakatvam// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1616: nanūktapakṣadvaye kadācideva pakṣatā prāptā na tu parāmarśātpūrvaṃ paścāccetyatastvanmatepi tathaiva pratyutāvaśyakānumitivelāyāmeva nāstītyāha--
GSP29vytrkt3u:1622: yogyatā ca samānādhikaraṇāpramātvenābhimatā yā sādhyābhāvaviṣayā dhīstadabhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1623: evaṃ ca jagatyakṣaṇikatvavā 1 dini vyadhikaraṇāyāṃ pramātvenābhimatāyāṃ kṣiṇikatva
GSP29vytrkt3u:1625: 3 ca satyāmapi kṣaṇika 4 vādinaḥ kṣaṇikatvānumāne jagataḥ pakṣatā yuktā / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1632: pramārūpetyuktau vādiprativādiniṣṭhaparasparasādhyābhāvabuddheḥ pramārūpatvaniyamābhāvena tādṛśabuddhau satyāmapi pakṣatā syātsā mābhūdityabhimatetyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1636: kṣaṇikavādinaḥ yatsattatkṣaṇikaṃ yathā dīpādi saccedaṃ jagadityeva rūpakṣaṇikatvānumāne jagataḥ pakṣatāyuktetyanvayaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1641: dhūmānumāne mahānase sapakṣa 1 vyavahārastu niścitavyāpakavattayā sapakṣatvasyāpi satvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1643: tatra pakṣatāyāṃ satyāmapi kadācidanumityabhāvāśca tvanmate 2 saṃśayottarapratyakṣasthala iva liṅgaparāmarśāditatsāmagryabhāvādityāhuḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1659: daivānmahānasādau satyapi parāmarśe pratyakṣasāmagryāmasatyāṃ cānumityāpatyā pakṣatvavyavahārādyāpāta ityanye//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1672: etena yanmaṇau pakṣatokteḥ prāgevopādhainirūpaṇaṃ tadanavasaradusthamityuktaṃ bhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1679: atra sādhyapadena pūrvoktadiśā na liṅgajanyadhīviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitam/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1682: nanu -- vāyuḥ spārśanaḥ anudbhūtarūpānadhikaraṇatve sati pratyakṣasparśāśrayatvāt
GSP29vytrkt3u:1684: samavāyaḥ samavetaḥ saṃbandhatvāt saṃyogavat ityādau sādhanena saṃbandhatvenāvacchinna -- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1697: yatra spārśanatvaṃ tatra cākṣuṣatvamiti sparśaguṇa eva vyabhicāreṇa śuddhasādhyavyāpakatvasyā
GSP29vytrkt3u:1698: 3 bhāvepi dravyatve sati spārśanatvaṃ yatra tatra cākṣuṣatvamiti ghaṭādau vyāptidarśanena
GSP29vytrkt3u:1706: tathā yatra samavetatvaṃ tatra kṛtakatvamityasya jātyādau vyabhicāreṇa kṛtakatvasya
GSP29vytrkt3u:1707: śuddhasādhyāvyāpakatvepi saṃbandhatve sati samavetatvaṃ yatra tatra kṛtakatvamiti
GSP29vytrkt3u:1718: yadyapi samavāyasyāprāmāṇikatvena tatra sādhyahetvorbādhā 1 dinaiva tadanumānasya duṣṭatayā tatropādheranaṅgīkārepi na kṣatiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1719: tathāpi nodāharaṇamādaraṇīyamiti nyāyena dhvaṃso vināśī janyatvādityādau sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakasya
GSP29vytrkt3u:1725: ārdrendhanādyupādhau vaidhī hiṃsā adharmasādhanaṃ hiṃsātvādityādau niṣiddhatvādyupādhau
GSP29vytrkt3u:1727: sādhyapadena hi vyāpakatāvacchedakadharmādhikaraṇatvamātre vivakṣitam na tu tadatiriktadharmā 1 vacchinnatvamapi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1750: yathā viśeṣaṇāsiddho viśiṣṭahetvasiddhau paryavasyanhetudoṣo bhavati tatheti nārthāntarādikaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:1753: ca saṃbhavādvahnimātrasādhakadhūmānumānadūṣaṇe na śakta iti na tatra doṣa iti bhedaḥ // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1755: syādityāśaṅkāmanūdya śuddhasādhyaprayogadūṣakatvasyāpi satvānnadoṣa iti bhāvena pariharati // yadyapīti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:1762: athavā yo yaddharmāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpakaḥ sa tatropādhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1763: sādhyavyāpakatvesati sādhanāvyāpaka upādhiriti sudhāyāmapi sādhyavyāpakapadenedameva vivakṣitam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1768: yadvā sādhya 2 padasthāne yatpadaprakṣepeṇa yo yavdyāpakatve sati yadavyāpakaḥ sa svāvyāpye tasminhetāvupādhirityastu/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1769: evaṃ ca dravyatvāvacchinnaspārśanatvasya dūṣyānumānasādhyatvābhāvepi tatra cākṣuṣa 3 tvopādhitāsiddhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1771: ata eva sudhāyāṃ vastutastu yo dharmo yavdyāpakāvyā 4 pakastasya tenāvyāptiriti sādhyapadasthāne yatpadameva prayuktam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1782: kecittu spārśanatvādirūpaśuddhasādhya eva dravyatvādiviśi 1 ṣṭacākṣuṣatvābhāvasyābhāva upādhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1783: ayaṃ ca viśiṣṭābhāvarūpa upādhiḥ sadhyavati sparśādau dravyatvarūpaviśeṣaṇasyābhāvena ghaṭādau 2
GSP29vytrkt3u:1787: pakṣāṇāṃ viveka svayamevāha -- atra cādya iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1794: sādhye spārśanatvarūpasādhye dravyatvarūpayadviṣaṇayuktai 3 tasya dravyatvaviśiṣṭacākṣuṣatvābhāvasyābhāvaḥ kevale sādhye vyāpaka eva sa upādhirbhavatītyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1795: evaṃ 4 tarhi śāsre śuddha sādhyavyāpakarūpaikarūpopādhimanuktvāvacchinnasādhyavyāpako 5 ktiḥ kimarthetyata āha-- śāstre tviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1800: iti/ śāstre tu vyatirekavyāptyādinānvayavyāptyādi 2 mivāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakopādhinokta 3 śuddhasādhyavyāpakopādhirākṣipyata ityāhuḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1801: ayaṃ 1 prakāro vāyuḥ spārśanaḥ sparśatvāditya 5 siddhisaṃkīrṇe dravyatvāvacchinnasādhyavyāpake cākṣuṣatvopādhau na saṃbhavatītyasārvatrikaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1805: ata eva sudhāyāṃ“kvicitsādhyāvacchedakāvacchinnasyopādhyabhāvasya hetutvādyathā vāyuḥ spārśano na dravyatve satyacākṣuṣatvā“diti kvacitpadaṃ pratyuktam// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:1810: yattu sādhanavyāpakopi kvacidupādhiryatra pakṣāvṛttirhetuḥ yathā karakā pṛthivī kaṭhinasaṃyogava 1 tvādityādāvanuṣṇāśītasparśavatvamiti/ tanna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1815: etadabhāvaśca pratipakṣaprayoge hetūkṛtya kvacitpadaṃ prayuktaṃ cetprāguktaviśiṣṭābhāvarūpopādhiprakāraśca kvacidevetyaktaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1820: kaṭhinasaṃyogavatvaṃ pāṣāṇādeva na tu karakakāyāṃ alpakāla eva dravībhāvadarśanāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1822: hetoḥ pakṣavṛttitve tavdyāpakasyopādherapi pakṣavṛttitayā tavdyatirekasya svarūpāsiddhatvena
GSP29vytrkt3u:1834: na hi sa eva dharmastasminneva sādhye pakṣabhedamātreṇopādhiranupādhiśca bhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1840: nanvekatropādhitve 'nyatrāpi kuta ityata āha-- na hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1841: nanu bhavatyaṃ 2 pakṣavṛttihetāvapyupādhiḥ anukūlatarkeṇa tannirāso bhaviṣyatīti cettarhi karakā pṛthivītyādāvapi tathāstu/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1843: tarhi tata eva tasya duṣṭatve kimanenālaukikena sadanumānaduṣṭatāpādakena sādanavyāpakasyāpyupādhitvakalpanena /
GSP29vytrkt3u:1844: nanvasya 3 pakṣavṛttihetāvapyupādhitve ghaṭo na pṛthivī anuṣṇāśītasparśavatvābhāvājjalavaditi svābhāvena sādhyābhāvasādhanaṃ na syādityata āha--
GSP29vytrkt3u:1854: anuvyākhyāne sādhyavyāpakavailomyaṃ sādhanasyetyupādhilakṣaṇoktiḥ sādhyasamavyāpakatva 1 lakṣaṇanirāsāyetyuktvā sudhāyāṃ 2 dūṣitam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1859: uta dūṣakatābījasya samavyāpta eva saṃbhavena viṣamavyāptopādherabhāvāt/ atha --
GSP29vytrkt3u:1871: sādhyavyāpyatvarūpasvadharmasya sādhane pratibimbajanakatvarūpāvayavārthābhāvepi lābhādyupādhinā kṛtamityādāviva rūḍhyopādhipadaprayogopatteśca//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1876: yatra nityatvaṃ tatra pārthivaviśeṣaṇaguṇatvābhāvo jalaparamāṇvādāveti sādhyavyāpakatvamiva yatra pārthivaviśeṣaṇaguṇatvābhāvastatra nityatvamiti
GSP29vytrkt3u:1884: adṛṣṭāṃ samudāyasya kaḥ śaktiṃ jātu kalpayet”//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1885: iti nyāyenāvayavārthasaṃbhave rūḍhikalpanā na yuktetyataḥ maṇyuktadoṣāntaraṃ cāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1892: nanu viṣamavyāpta 2 syopādhitve bādhānunnītapakṣetaropyupādhiḥ syāditi cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1895: anyathā tavāpi śabdobhidheyaḥ prameyatvādityādāvaśabdatvādeḥ samavyāpta 3 pakṣetarasya nirāso na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1896: ata evānuvyākhyāne sādhya 4 vyāpakatvamevoktam na tu samavyāptiḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1901: bādhasthale sarvaṃ tejo 'nuṣṇaṃ padārthatvādityādau atejastvādirūpasya pakṣetara 6
GSP29vytrkt3u:1917: evaṃ ca śabdaḥ svasvetarāvṛttitvarahitanityāvṛttidhmādhikaraṇam meyatvādityādau paryavite 'nityatve kṛtakatvamupādhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1920: yadavacchinnaviṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ anumitipratibandhakaṃ tādṛśaṃ hyupādhikatvamanumānadūṣaṇārthamiha nirūpaṇīyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1921: tādṛśaṃ ca sādhyavyāpakatvādikameva na tūktarūpamiti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1928: tādṛśo nitye ' 1 vidyamānaśya yo dharmaḥ tadadhikaraṇityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1942: tanna / tathātve hi dvyaṇukasya sāvayavatve siddhe dvyaṇukamanityadravyāsamavetam
GSP29vytrkt3u:1955: nanvatra pakṣa eva sādhyāvyāpakatvātparyavasitasādhyavyāpakatvaṃ nāstyeveti nātivyāptirityarucerāha -- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1962: maṇau tu -- paryavasitasādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpaka upādhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1963: yaddharmāvacchedena sādhyaṃ prasiddhaṃ tatparyavasitaṃ sa ca dharmaḥ kvacitsādhanameva
GSP29vytrkt3u:1964: kvaciddravyatvādiḥ kvacinmahānasatvādiḥ evaṃ ca vahninā dhūṃme sādhye vastugatyā
GSP29vytrkt3u:1967: tatra 1 dhūmena vahnisādhanepi mahānasatvādyavacchinnaprasiddhavahnivyāpakasya vcañjaḍana 2 vatvādervahnirūpaśuddhasādhya evopādhitvāpātāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1971: pakṣadharmatābalalabhyatvaṃ cetparyavasitatvaṃ tadā prāgukto doṣa ityata āha-- yaddharmeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:1975: vāyurbahirindriyapratyakṣaḥ prameyatvādityādau rūpavatvādyupādhau dravyatvādiḥ ayaṃ dhūmavānvahniḥmatvādityādau vyañjanavatvādyupādhau mahānasatvādityādiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1983: yadi ca vahniprasiddhiṃ prati mahānasatvaṃ nyūnavṛttīti navācchedakam tarhi spārśanatvaprasiddhiṃ pratyapi dravyatvaṃ nyūnavṛttīti nāvacchedakaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:1984: atra kecidāhuḥ -- yaddharmāvacchinnetyatrāvacchetako 1 dharmaḥ sādhanavyāpakībhūto vivakṣitaḥ mahānasatvaṃ ca sādhanasya
GSP29vytrkt3u:1985: dhūmasya na vyāpakamiti na vahnau sādhye
GSP29vytrkt3u:1988: nanu -- sādhyaprasiddhyacchedakadharme yāvatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ ato vyañjanavatvādau nātivyāptiriti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:1996: vāyuḥ spārśanaḥ anudbhūtarūpānadhikaraṇatve sati pratyakṣasparśāśrayatvādityatra cākṣuṣatvādyupādhāvityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2000: nanu dhvaṃso vināśī janyatvādityādau sādhanāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakaṃ bhāvatvamupādhirna syāt/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2006: kiñcaiva sa śyāmo mitrāpṛṣṭatvādityādau mitrātanayatvāvacchinnaśyāmatvavyāpakaṃ śākapākajatvamupādhirna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2008: evaṃ vāyuḥ spārśanaḥ prameyatvādityādau dravyatvāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakaṃ sādhanasya prameyatvasya cāvyāpakaṃ cākṣuṣatvamupādhirna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2011: sādhanavanniṣṭhā 5 tyantābhāvāpratiyogitvarūpavyāpakatvasya sādhyāderiva sādhanasyāpi 6 sādhanavati sādhanātyantābhāvābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2012: nanu śuddhasādhyavyāpakatvajñānamātreṇānumitipratibandhādau satyapyuktalakṣaṇaṃ saṃgrāhakamātramityato na saṃgrāhakamapyetadavyāpakatvamityāha -- kiñceti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2021: prameyatvaṃ spārśanatvavyabhicāri dravye spārśanatva 3 vyāpakodbhūtarūpavatvavyabhicāritvāt dravyatvavadityapi vyabhicārānumānasambhavāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2022: atra ca dravyaiti viśeṣaṇaṃ mahatvasamānādhikaraṇodbhūtasparśanatve 4 vyabhicāravāraṇārtham/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2025: kutoyamanumādhiriti cet hetoḥ sādhyavyabhicāritvonnāyakatvenopādherdūṣa 5 katvamiti mate śuddhasādhyavyabhicārānumānāsaṃbhavādityāha-- prameyatveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2031: 1.rūpapadaṃ na-ga.ṭa. 2.'dravyatvarūpaviśeṣaṇasya' ityadhikam-ka. 3.tvaprayojakodbhū -ka-ga.ṭa.rār. 4.śavatve iti śodhitam-ṭar. 5.deṣatvamiti mate-ṭar. deṣitvamate-ḍa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2035: kiñca 3 vyañjanavatvāderapi mahānasatvādyavacchinnavahnivyāpakatvena tatropādhitvepi na doṣa ityuktatvāttavdyāvṛtyarthaṃ sādhanavyāpakatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:2040: nanu mitrā 4 putratvaprameyatvādihetāvupādhe 5 revamastvityata āha-- tvanmate ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2045: yena dharmeṇa sādhyavyāpakatvaṃ tenaiva dharmeṇa sādhanāvyāpakatvamādyalakṣaṇārthaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2046: 1.pihidra--ga.ṭa.rā. 2.re upādhirvi-ga.ṭa.rā. 3.kiñceti nāsti-ga.ṭa.rā. 4.pṛṣṭatva-ṭha. tratveti śodhitam-ḍa. 5.dhireva māstvi-ṭa.ṭha. dhereva māstvi-ḍa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2049: evaṃ ca dhūmānumāne vyañḍanavatvādikaṃ nopādhiḥ/ 1 tasya
GSP29vytrkt3u:2050: mahānasatvādyavacchinnavahniṃ pratīva tadavacchinnadhūmaṃ pratyapi vyāpakatvena taddharmāvacchinnadhūmaṃ pratyapi vyāpakatvena taddharmāvacchinnasādhanāvyāpakatvābhāvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2060: etacca lakṣaṇatrayaṃ dhūmena vahnisādhanasthale vyañjanavatvādyupādhau nāstīti nātivyāptirita tāvatkrameṇopapādayati evaṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2076: ghaṭaḥ pṛthivī dravyatvādityatra ghaṭānyatvāvacchinnapṛthivītvavyāpake pakṣa eva sādhanāvyāpake ghaṭāvṛttiguṇavatvarūpopādhāvuktalakṣaṇānyavyāptāni/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2077: nanvevamapi gandhaprāgabhāvāvacchinno ghaṭo gandhavānpṛthivītvāditi sādhya 1 vyabhicāriṇi
GSP29vytrkt3u:2082: na caivaṃ sa śyāmo mitrā 4 tanaya(pṛṣṭa)
GSP29vytrkt3u:2090: ghaṭāvṛttiguṇavatvasya ghaṭānyatvāvacchinnapṛthivītvaṃ pratīva tadavacchinnadravyatvaṃ pratyapi vyāpakatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2091: gha 1 ṭātmapakṣe sādhanāvyāpakasya tasya ghaṭavṛttinā ghaṭatvena vā dravyatvādinā vāvacchinnapṛthivītvavyāpakatvābhāvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2095: tatra lakṣaṇatrayāsatvaṃ krameṇa vyanakti-- ghaṭāvṛtti guṇa 2 vatvasyetyādinā //
GSP29vytrkt3u:2097: ghaṭānyasminpṛthivītvavati dravyatvavati ca ghaṭāvṛttiguṇavatvasatvena yaddharmeṇa sādhyavyāpakatvaṃ taddharmeṇa sādhanāvyāpakatvābhāvādādyamavyāptam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2101: dravyatvaṃ pṛthivītvavyabhicāri dravyatvaghaṭatvaprameyatvānīti pratītiviśeṣyatve sati ghaṭāvṛttiguṇavatvavyabhicāritvāt prameyatvādivadityādikrameṇa
GSP29vytrkt3u:2111: api ca vyañjanavatvāderapi mahānasatvādyavacchinnavahni 3 vyāpakatvenopādhitvepi na doṣa ityuktatvāttadvyāvṛttarthyaṃ tredhā viśeṣaṇaṃ vyarthameva//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2114: nacaivaṃ vyañjanavatvādirapi vahnirūpaśuddhasādhya evopādhiḥ syāditi 4 vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2135: na hi vyañjanavatvena dhūmaḥ sakalavahnivyāpakarahite parityajyate /
GSP29vytrkt3u:2136: dhūmasya sadanumānatvena dhūmavati yatkiñcidvahnisatvena tatra vahnivyāpakasyāvaśyakatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2139: cākṣuṣatvena ca sakalāni dravyaguṇādigatāni yāni 1 spārśanatvāni tavdyāpakāni yānyudbhūtarūpādhikaraṇatvodbhūtarūpa
GSP29vytrkt3u:2145: tathāhi-- sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhyasamānādhikaraṇatve sati vā sādhyavyabhicārisādhanāvyāpakatvamupādhilakṣaṇam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2152: etena-- yavdyabhicāritvena sādhanatvasya sādhyavyabhicāritvaṃ sa upādhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2158: astādṛśasyaiva sarvasaṃgrāhakasya granthakṛduktarītyā tredhā vaktuṃ śyakyatvenānyādṛśasyāpya 1 nādaraṇīyatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2159: evaṃ sādhyavyāpakatāsthalātirikte sādhanasamānādhikaraṇo yo dharmastadavacchinnasādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpakamityādyapi nirastamityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2163: vāyuḥ pratyakṣaḥ pratyakṣasparśāśrayatvādityatrodbhūtarūpavatvādiḥ dhvaṃso vināśī janyatvādityādau bhāvatvādiścāvacchinnasādhyavyāpakaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2176: kiñca yavdyabhicāratvenetyanenopādhivyabhicārasya kiṃ sādhyavyabhicārānumitinakatvamabhipretaṃ kiṃ vā janakatvaprayojakarūpavatvam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2184: upādhirityukte sādhyavyabhicāronnāyaka iti prāptatvena vyabhicāronnāyakovyabhicāronnāyaka ityasyāsaṃbhavena maṇikṛtsiddhāntavirodhādityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2191: kiñcānumitijanakatvamityatrānumitiḥ kiṃ bhramasādhāraṇī vivakṣitā pramārūpaiva vā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2192: ādye dhūmena vahnyanumāne ghaṭa upādhiḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2193: saṃbhavati hi ghaṭavyabhicāritvena dhūmasya bhramarūpā vahnivyabhicārānumitiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2197: antyepyupādhivyabhicārasya sādhyavyabhicāraṃ prati prayojakatvaṃ kiṃ svasya sādhyavyabhicāravyāpyatvaṃ sādhanasya sādhyavyāpakavyabhicāritvameva
GSP29vytrkt3u:2202: tathācākāśāsāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dhūme nāstīti na doṣa iti vādinaṃ pratyāha -- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2214: asmābhirapi sādhyavyāpakatve sati sādhanāvyāpaka upādhirityanena sādhyavyāpakāvyāpyatvameva hetoḥ sopādhikatatvamityabhipretatvāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2227: upādheḥ kintvena dūṣakatvamityataḥ“sādhyavyāpakavailomya'miti yuktipādīyānuvyākhyānasudhoktiṃ vivṛṇvāna āha -- upādhiśceti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2242: tāvatā sādhyatyāgonnāyakatvameva prāptaṃ na tvavyāpyunnāyakatvamityata āha -- sādhyapiratyāgasyaiveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2245: vyāptijñānādhīnamupādhijñānaṃ 5 tadadhīnaṃ ca 6 nirupādhikatvajñānaṃ tadāyattaṃ ca vyāptijñānamiti cakrakaprasaṅgena tasya vyāptilakṣaṇatvāyogāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2252: nanu sādhyavyāpakaṃ parityajato hetoḥ sādhyaparityāgasyāvaśyakatve sādhyavyabhicāra
GSP29vytrkt3u:2253: eva prāptaḥ kathaṃ pratipakṣatetyato 'nyatra sādhyaparityāge hi tathā pakṣa eva sādhyaparityāge
GSP29vytrkt3u:2254: tu pratipakṣataivetibhāvenānyatra parityāgapakṣaṃ dūṣayannāha -- hetoḥ sādhyaparityāgo hīti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2258: hetoḥ sādhyaparityāgo hi pakṣādanyatra vā pakṣa eva vā nādyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2260: dvitīye sādhyavyāpakavyāvṛttiḥ pakṣe 1 sādhāyamapi vyāvartayatīti pratipakṣonnāyakataiva//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2262: upādhivyāvṛttyā sādhyarahite pakṣe vartamānasya hetorvyabhicārāvaśyaṃbhāvāditi cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2264: tatra tābhyāmevānumāne duṣṭe kiṃ tadupajīvinā vyabhicāreṇeti cettarhyatrāpi vyāpakavyāvṛttirūpapratipakṣeṇaivānumāne duṣṭa kiṃ tadupajīvinā vyabhicāreṇa// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2267: paramukhenaiva samādhiṃ vācayitvā sama ityāha-- tatra tābhyāmiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2275: iti doṣasaptakabhāvātkathaṃ pratipakṣonnāyakatvamityata ādyaṃ nirāha --na copādhyabhāvasyeti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2278: na copādhyabhāvasya pratipakṣatvena doṣatve upādherdeṣatvaṃ na syāt na hi yatra yadabhāvo doṣastatra sopi doṣa iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2281: na caivaṃ satpratipakṣe upādhyudbhāvanaṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2289: upādhyabhāvasya sādhyavyabhicāronnāyakatvena dūṣakatve upādhirdeṣo na syāditi codyasya tatrāpi tulyatvāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2293: pratipakṣatvena dūṣaka iti vaktavyaṃ 2 vādinā prāgupanyasta hetoreva pratikṣasya satvena punarupādhyabhāvarūpapratipakṣasya kṛtyābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2294: pūrvaṃ prayuktahetoḥ paścāduktopādhyabhāvarūpahetośca dvayorapi sārthakyamāha -- svapakṣeti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2304: uktaṃ hi pramāṇatorthapratipattāviti nyāyabhāṣyavyākhyā 1 nāvasare nyāyavārtikepi“pramāṇābhyāṃ pramāṇairiti saṃplavo gamyata“iti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2307: na ca bādhonnītapakṣetara 3 tvopādherdeṣatvaṃ nasyāt pratipakṣe 'sādhāraṇyāditi vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2309: na ca kṣitivdyaṇukādipakṣakeśvarānumāne pakṣaikadeśavartino 'naṇutvasyopādhitvaṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2322: īśvarānumāne uddeśyā yā dhīḥ sarvakartṛviṣayiṇī tadvirodhitvenetyarthaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2325: nacānthakārodravyaṃ svātantryeṇa pratīyamānatvādityatrāśrāvaṇatvasya parvato dhūmavānvahnimatvādityatrārdrendhanādeścopādhitvaṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2328: vyabhicāronnayanapakṣepi śabde taptāyaḥpiṇḍe ca vyabhicārasya sphuṭatayopādhyanapekṣaṇāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2329: śabdāderapi pakṣatvena vyabhicārasya sphuṭatvaṃ 1 copādhivyatirekeṇāpi tatraiva sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhyatām//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2330: na ca sa śyāmo mitrātanayatvādityatra śākapākajatvādeḥ saṃdigdhopādherdeṣatvaṃ na syāt tadvyatirekasya saṃdigdhatvena pratipakṣasaṃbhavāditi
GSP29vytrkt3u:2332: pañcamaṃ pakṣamanūdya nirāha-- na cāndhakāra iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2334: vyabhicāronnayanapakṣepītyapipadena na kevalamasmatpakṣe kiṃ tu tvatpakṣepyupādhirnāpekṣitaḥ aspaṣṭavyabhicārasthale eva vyabhicārānumānayopādhyapakṣeti
GSP29vytrkt3u:2335: tathā ca tatropādherevābhāvena na tatra pratipakṣodbhāvanaṃ yenāsiddhidoṣaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2338: tathāca tatra vyabhicāraḥ sujñāna iti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2339: ṣaṣṭhamāśaṅkya nirāha-- na ca saśyāma iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2348: na ca pakṣe sādhyasaṃdeho 'numānāṅgatvādupādhiṃ vināpi siddha iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2350: upādhyāyatto vyabhicārasaṃdehastaṃ vinā neti cettadāyattaḥ sādhyasaṃdehopi taṃ vinā neti samam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2373: kiñca vahnirūpo hetuḥ dhūmarūpasādhyavyabhicārī tavdyāpakārdrendhanarūpopādhyabhāvavadvṛttitvāditi tvadīyaṃ vyabhicārānumānameva pakṣe sādhyābhāvasādhakatvātpratipakṣaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2375: yatra mahānasādau hetusādhyayoḥ satvaṃ tatra vyabhicārasya bādhitatvāt/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2377: nanu -- prācāṃ rītyābhyupetya satpratikṣotthāpakatvamupādhereti ābhāsānirūpitāḥ vastutastu
GSP29vytrkt3u:2379: pakṣādanyatra vyabhicārānumānāsaṃbhavena pakṣa eva tadanumānasyāvaśyakatvāditi bhāvenāha -- kiṃ ceti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:2386: tatra ca vahnervṛttimatvaṃ siddhamiti hetumati pakṣe sādhyābhāvasādhana eva paryavasānāditi bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2387: nanu vyabhicārānumāne bhavedevaṃ pakṣānyatra mahānasādāvayogolakādau vā tadanumāne tu na pratipakṣatvāvakāśā 4 dityato nirāha -- na hīti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2391: yatra cāyogolakādau hetusādhyayoḥ satvāsatve tasyopasthitau vyabhicārasya spaṣṭatvenopādhyanapekṣaṇāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2393: tasmātpariśeṣānniścitahetukatvena sandigdhasādhyakatvena copasthite pakṣa eva sādhyābhāvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:2394: jñātvā tatra hetoḥ satvaṃ jñeyamiti vyabhicārānumitiḥ pūrvaṃ pakṣe sādhyābhāvaṃ spṛśantī
GSP29vytrkt3u:2399: upādhestadanugrahe tvanumānasya bādhaṃ eveti kadā pratipakṣāvasara iti cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2419: yasya hi yadānukūlatarkāvatāraḥ sa tadā bādhakonyastu bādhya eva bhavati//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2426: na ca ā ihi ehi ava ehīti sthite“vṛddhirecīti“vṛddhau avaihīti yuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2434: nacaivaṃ nityadoṣatānāpatterityataḥ iṣṭāpattimuttaramāha -- nahi pratipakṣa iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2436: śuddhasādhyavyāpake iti kartavyaḥ avacchinnasādhyavyāpake tu iti kartavyaḥ ityevakartavya iti cānvayaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2438: 1.kṣapratiyogo -ga.rā. kṣayogo-ka. etītis-ṭha.ḍa. 3.eṅi pararūpamiti pararūpatvānna vṛddhiḥ ityadhikam -ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2443: caturthapakṣe vāyuḥ spārśano na dravyatve satyacākṣuṣatvādākāśavadatyeva kartavyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2444: na tu sarvatrāpi vimataṃ vyāpāra 2 rahitaṃ vyāpakarahitatvāditi sāmānyena/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2449: hetoḥ pakṣadharmabalādviśiṣṭa 6 rāhityaṃ sidhyat viśeṣaṇarāhitye bādhādviśeṣyarāhityamādāya paryavasyati dṛṣṭāntepyevameveti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2452: ca pratipakṣaprakāraṃ krameṇa pradarśya kecitvityādinoktopādhailakṣaṇepi taṃ prakāramāha -- avacchinneti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:2455: evakāraḥ sarvatrānvetavya iti bhāvena tavdyāvartyamāha -- na tu sarvatrāpīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2460: anukūlatarkādinā nirdhāritatve satyupādhyabhāvasya prabalatayā bādhakatvena pratipakṣatvāyogāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2466: nanu -- vipakṣe bādha 1 tarkajñāne upādheranavatāraḥ 2 tadajñāne tata eva
GSP29vytrkt3u:2475: ayāvaddravyabhāvitvasyātmaviśeṣaguṇe jñānādau bhāvena hetovyabhicāranirāsāya sparśavaditi sādhyaviśeṣaṇam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2476: tathā cākṣuṣatvasya pratyakṣasparśe satvena hetorvyabhicāravāraṇāyaiva dravyatve satīti viśeṣaṇam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2477: dvitīyaprayogopi akṛtakatvasya samavete satvena vyabhicāravāraṇāya saṃbandhatve satīti viśeṣaṇamityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2478: nanu -- tarkājñānameva vyāpti 5 pratibandhakamastu kimupādhijñānenetyata āha-- na hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2481: nanu tarkājñāna eva tarkābhāvajñānaṃ bhavatīti tarkājñānameva pratibandhakamityāgatamityupādhirvyarthaṃ evetyata āha -- na ceti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2491: pramāṇalakṣaṇe tu 1 sa evopādhidoṣopīti pratirodhāntarbhāvasyoktatvādvirodha iti nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2493: ata evasudhāyāmavyāptiḥ sādhanasya cetyanuvyākhyānastha caśabdena pratirodhopi saṃgṛhīta ityuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2494: etadevābhipretya paddhatau upādhirvipratipatteḥ prāgavyāptyunnāyakaḥ vipratipatyuttarakālaṃ 2 pratipakṣonnāyako bhavatītyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2496: sa eveti mūlasthaivakārasya vyabhicāra 3 vārakatvena vyākhyānaṃ tadapi -- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2499: vyabhicārasyaiva 4 vyāptitvena pratipakṣa evopādhidoṣo na tvavyāptariti prāptatvādvirodha iti śaṅkābhiprāyaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2509: atra kecit -- dhūmāgnyormahānasādau vyāptiṃ gṛhītavataḥ ādau pakṣe dhūmajñānam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2512: “anumā yuktirevoktā vyāptireva tu sāsmṛtā“iti yuktipādīyānuvyākhyānasudhoktiṃ 3 vivṛṇvāna āha -- atheti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2515: pakṣadharme vyāptiviśiṣṭajñānaṃ tadanantaraṃ viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyajñānaṃ veti parāmarśavāde 4 maṇyukterāha -- aṃ dhūmovahnivyāpya iti vetyādi //
GSP29vytrkt3u:2520: vahnivyāpyadhūmavānayamiti vā vyāptipakṣadharmatāviśiṣṭadhūmaviṣayakaṃ pratisandhānātmakaṃ liṅgaparāmarśasaṃjñakaṃ tṛtīyaṃ jñānaṃ tadevānumitijanakamityāhuḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2523: yatra tu liṅgadarśanaṃ vinaivādṛṣṭādihetvantareṇātpavacanena vā vyāptismṛtistatra dvitīyameva liṅgadarśanaṃ vyāptismṛtisahitātsannikarṣādevoktapratisandhānātkamudeṣyati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2528: vyāptigrahadaśāyāṃ liṅgadarśanaṃ prathamaṃ paścātparvatādau liṅgadarśanaṃ dvitīyaṃ vyāptiviśiṣṭaliṅgajñānaṃ tṛtīyamiti tṛtīyajñānamityuktam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2531: tathā ca kadāciddvitīyamapi parāmarśarūpaṃ jātamiti kiṃ tṛtīyaniyamenetyarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2536: prābhākarāstu -- dhūmo vahnivyāpya iti smṛtiḥ parvataścadhūmavā 1 niti jñānadvayamevānumitihetuḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2538: jñānadvayasya 2 svarūpaṃ pūrvabhāvitvaṃ niyamaśca kḷpta eva/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2543: vyāptireva tu sā smṛtetyetavdyākhyānasudhāyāṃ tadanyo na manyata ityādinokte prābhākaramatataddūṣaṇe vivṛṇvāna āha -- prābhākarāstviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2547: nanu jñānadvayānantarabhāvino 'nutipūrvabhāvino vyāptiviśiṣṭapakṣadharmatājñānasya kuto na hetutvamityatastatsvarūpameva nabhonalināyitamityāha -- jñānadvayeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2548: jñānadvayasya kāraṇatve gauravaṃ viśiṣṭajñānasya hetutve lāghavamityato viparītameva lāghavamityāha -- jñānadvayasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2557: etena jñānadvayādapyekasya viśiṣṭajñānasya kāraṇatvaṃ laghviti nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2571: viśiṣṭavyāvahārānyathānupapatyā pratyabhijñāderekatvaṃ siddhamityata āha -- saṃbhavati hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2574: 1.nāvyā -ga.rā. 2.agṛhītāsaṃsargagrahaṇasma -ga.ṭa.rā. 3.'dvayena' ityādhikaḥ 'soyamitivyavahā' iti paryanto granthaḥ nāsti- ga.rā. 4.tovahnimā -rā. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2578: evaṃ ca kiñcitprameyaṃ vahnivyāpyaṃ parvataśca prameyavāniti jñānadvayamiva kaściddūmo
GSP29vytrkt3u:2579: vyāpyaḥ parvataśca dhūmavāniti viśiṣṭakalitaṃ parasparavārtānabhijñaṃ jñānadvayamapi nānumitihetuḥ //
GSP29vytrkt3u:2580: na ca prameyatvaṃ vahnivyāpyatāvacchedakatvena na gṛhītaṃ dhūmatvaṃ tu tadavacchedakatvena gṛhītamiti vaiṣamyamiti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2584: na tu bhamasthala iti vadantaṃ pratyāha -- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2585: yadvā viśiṣṭajñānāstitvaṃ samarthya parābhipreta 3 jñānadvayahetutvaṃ nirāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2595: na ca vyāptigrahaṇakāle dhūmasyāgnineva dhūmatvasya dhūmaniṣṭhayā vahnivyāptyā saha vyāptirgṛhītā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2596: evaṃ ca pakṣadharme dhūme vyāptigrahaprastāvoktarītyā vyāptigrahasāmagrīsatvepi vyāptiṃ na paśyasi,
GSP29vytrkt3u:2597: paśyasi tu vyāptidhūmatvayorvyāptigrahasāmagrīvirahe 1 vyāptimiti nūnaṃ te 2 tu ceravilocane//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2612: 1.hepi- vyā- ṭa.rā. 2. te rucire vi-ka. te cature vi -ga.ṭa.rā. 3.vāttada -ṭha. 4.tvanadhika -ḍa. 5.dītaratajjñā -ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2614: kiñca viśiṣṭajñānābhāve vyāptijñānasya 1 karaṇatvaṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2626: evaṃ ca tvanmate pratyajñasāmagryā atrākḷpta 4 sāmagrīto balavatvaṃ ca na kalpyam// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2627: tvadaṅgīkṛtavyāptijñānakaraṇatvabalādapi viśiṣṭajñānaṃ madhye kāraṇatvenopeyamityāha-- kiñca viśiṣṭajñānābhāva iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2633: viśiṣṭajñānasya hetutve tu na vyābhicāra iti bhāvenāha -- api ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2640: kiṃ ca tvadukte jñānadvaye satyapi pakṣaniṣṭhadhūmo 1 vahnivyāpto neti viparyaye
GSP29vytrkt3u:2651: tathā ca tādṛśe vyāptismṛtipakṣadharmatājñāne bhāvayato nānumitiriti samagravākyārtha iti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2652: vyāpyabhedaviṣayakaviparyayādeḥ pratibandhakatvānyathānupapatyāpi viśiṣṭajñānahetutvasiddhiri 4 tyāha-- kiṃ ca tvadukte iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2656: vyāpye dhūme vyāpyo neti vyāpyo vā na vetīti vyāpyabhedabhramasyetyarthaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2659: yadi ca virodhyaviṣayakamapi jñānaṃ maṇyādivadvirodhi tarhyupādhinā vyabhicāro nonnīyate/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2660: kintu maṇyādyabhāvo dāha iva upādhijñānābhāva evānumito hetuḥ syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2662: na tu pratyakṣo vyapyabhedabhrama iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2665: yatra 3 dhūmo vahnivyāpyaḥ parvatīyadhūmaśca vahnyavyāpya iti 4 pakṣadharmatājñānameva bhedaviṣayaṃ tvanmate vyāptyavyāptyorbhinna 5 viṣayatvenāvirodhāt tatra bhedajñānātpūrvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:2667: prakā 6 rāntarema pratibandhakatvacodyamanūdya nirāha-- yadi ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2668: nanu -- vyāpyabhedabhrama eva nāsti yasya pratibandhakatvabalena viśiṣṭajñānahetutvasiddhirityāśaṅkāṃ nirāha-- na cānumitīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2674: virodhātkathamevaṃ bhrama ityata āha-- tvanmata iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2675: sāmānyapratyāsatteranaṅgīkāreṇa parvataniṣṭhadhūme vyāptegraheṇa tatra vyāpye 7 bhedabhrame bādhakābhāvāt// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2680: na ca dhūmatvajñānarūpasya vā dhūmo vahnivyāpya iti jñānarūpasya vā viśeṣadarśanasya satvānna vyāpyabhedabhrama iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2682: vyāptivyāpyatvena jñānasya tu virodhitve 2 tasyāyaṃ dhūmavāniti pakṣadharmatājñāne 'bhāvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2683: dhūmo vahnivyāpya iti jñānasya ca tvanmate bhinnaviṣayakatvenāpratibandhakatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2685: prameyaṃ ghaṭavaditi jñānena prameye gṛhe ghaṭo neti dhīpratibandhāpātāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2688: sāmagryabhāvepi viśeṣadarśanameva bhramapratibandhakamityāśaṅkya nirāha-- na ca dhūmatveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2695: kvacidviśiṣṭajñānasya hetutāyāḥ kḷptatvādanyatrāpi tathetibhāvena tasya kviciddhetutvamāha-- api ceti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2698: api ca yatra dhūmadarśanaṃ vināpi śabdādinā vyaptismṛtimataḥ puṃsaḥ smṛtavyāptisannikṛṣṭadhūmatva
GSP29vytrkt3u:2699: 1 yorvaiśiṣṭyaṃ pratyakṣajñānena vahnivyāpyadhūmavānayamiti śābdajñānena ca yugapadeva
GSP29vytrkt3u:2710: nanu tatrāpyanumitidhaśāyāṃ tāvatā viśiṣṭajñānatvena na hetutā kintu
GSP29vytrkt3u:2712: tathāca jñānadvayasthala ivāsmadabhimatakāraṇatāvacchedakaṃ tatrāpyakṣatamevetyata āha-- tatra ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2722: 1 tvaprakārakatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ vyāptayāprakārakatvaṃ tu viśeṣaḥ na ca sāmānyasya prayojakatvasambhave
GSP29vytrkt3u:2724: vyāpyau tu 2 tvaduktasya vyāpyatāvacchedakatvasya satvepi vyāptitvena 3 jñānamātreṇānimitidarśanena vyāpyatāvacchedakatvena vyāptijñānasyānumityahetutvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2725: tvayau 1 pādhikadharma 5 rūpasya vyāpāratvasya sāmānyatvepi tadvihāya lāghavena jātirūpakṛtitvasyaivākhyātaśakyatāvacchedakatvasvīkārācca//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2735: sāmānyaviśeṣābhāve satyapi lāghavādviśeṣasyaiva prayojakatvaṃ vācyamiti bhāvenāha-- tvayeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2741: nana yatra liṅgapakṣādikamasannikṛṣṭamatīndriyaṃ vā tatra kathaṃ parāmarśaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:2742: pratyakṣasyāsambhavāt ānumānikatve cānavasthānāditi cettavāpi kathaṃ tatra pakṣatājñānam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2743: kathaṃ ca sa parvato vahnivyāpyadhūmavān paramāṇurnityatvavyāpyaniravayavadravyatvavāniti jñānaṃ tathā vyavahāraśca//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2756: kaveḥ kāvyanirmāṇahetubhūtajñānaṃ yathā mānasaṃ tathā mānāntaropanīte parvate mānāntaropanītadhūmasaṃsargarūpapakṣadharmatājñānaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:2758: vyāpyadhūmavānitijñānaṃ nityatvasmṛtimato niravayavatvopanāyakena tadupanaye ca paramāṇūpanāyakena paramāṇau copanīte manasā nityatvavyāpyaniravayavatvavānitijñānamastvityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2762: yadvānumānikatvepi kvacit smṛtau kvacicchabde kvacitpratyakṣe paryavasānānnānavastheti cetsamaṃ parāmarśopi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2765: nanvevaṃ manaso bahirthapramāhetutve 1 tadupanāyakajñānasya pramāṇāntaratvaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2766: yadasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇamāsādya mano bahirgocarapramāṃ janayati tatpramāṇāntaramiti niyamāditi cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2770: tajjanakānumāne pakṣadharmatādijñānasya smṛtirūpatvena 3 vāptavākyarūpaśabdajanyatvena vā pratyakṣajanyatvena vopapatterityāha-- ānumānikatvepīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2772: ata evapaddhatau na ca 4 tathāpyanumānasya vyāptyapekṣayānavasthā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2775: 1.taditi nāsti-ṭa.ṭha.ḍa. 2.nāyakasya- ḍa. 3.vā iti na -ḍa. 4.caitasyāpya -ṭha. na ca tasyāpya -ṭa.ḍa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2778: maṇau tvaṃyamāloko 1 dhūmo vā ubhayathāpi vahnivyāpya iti jñānāttāvadanumitirdṛśyate/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2785: anyataratve ca gauravādau satyapi vyāptirnaiyatyarūpasya vyāptyavacchedakatvasyānapāyāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2797: nīladhūmādau dhūmānyā 1 nyādau ca vaiyarthyameva doṣaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2801: kiṃ tvanyataratvasya vyāptivyāpyatayā taddarśanatvenaiveti kathamanyataratvasya vyāptivyāpyatvāgrahaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2809: gurorapyanyānyatvajñānasya viśeṣadarśanatvena pratyakṣasahakāritvādanyānyatvajñānaṃ tatra vyāpyatājñānopakṣīṇamiti maṇāvukteti bhāvaḥ//
