GSP29vytrkt3u:2810: ata eva maṇāvetadarucyāpicetyādinā prāgasmaduktapakṣa eva kiñca vahnivyāpyavānayamiti śābdajñāna ityādinopanyastaiti dhyeyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2814: kecittu -- dhūma 1 tvālokatvābhyāṃ sandhigdhe vastuni dhūmālokānyebhyonyatvameva durgraham/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2815: na hi sādhanāśrayayoranyataratvamityādau sādhanāśrayayoḥ sādhanatvāśrayatvā 2 jñāne tadanyebhyonyatvaṃ gṛhyata ityāhuḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2823: tacca vyāpakatvagarbhitamiti lāghavātparvatavṛttidhūmavyāpako vahniriti vyāpakatvaparāmarśa evānumitihetuḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2830: na tu vahnivyāpyadhūmavānaparvata iti vyāpya 1 tva parāmarśa iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2831: manmate sādhyarahitāvṛttitvarūpāyā anyathānupapattirūpāyā vā vyāptervyāpakatvāgarbhitatvena gauravābhāvāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2832: yadyapi sādhyarahitāvṛttitvajñānaṃ sādhyaṃ vinānupapattijñānaṃ 2 vā sādhyatvarūpavyāpakatvena jñānaṃ vinānupapannam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2833: tathāpi dhūmajātīyasya vahnijātīyarahitāvṛttitvajñānaṃ ca 3 vahnijātīyaṃ vinānupapattijñānaṃ ca vahnitvena vahnijñānamevāpekṣate/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2846: yattu maṇau liṅgakaraṇatāvāde liṅgaparāmarśaḥ karaṇaṃ na tu parāmṛśyamānaṃ liṅgamityuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2848: kiṃ tu parāmarśa ityatra tṛtīyajñānatvameva nābhimatamiti bhāvenāha -- liṅgajñānameveti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:2852: sa tadā vahnimān tadā dhūmavatvādityādau dhūmābhāve 'pi tajjñānenaivānumatidarśanāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2853: na ca tatra 1 dhūmadhvaṃsādikaṃ liṅgāntaramastīti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2856: ata evoktaṃ sudhāyām--“na ca dhūmādikamevānumitirna kiṃ nāma tajjñāna“miti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2858: pratyakṣeṇānumānena śabdena vā jātaṃ yalliṅgajñānaṃ tadityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2866: yattu paddhatau liṅgasya samyagjñānaṃ vā samyagjñānataṃ vā liṅgamityuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2869: janayatītyatraiva tātparyādanā 3 sthayaktāvapi sudhānurodhā 4 lliṅgajñāna 5 eva tātparyamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2874: na cānumitermānasapratyakṣatvāpattiḥ saṃskāravyāpārakatva eva tathātvāt vyāpāraprādhānyavivakṣayā liṅgajñānaṃ karaṇamityuktirityapare//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2876: 1.tathā dhū-ga.ṭa.rā. 2.ti yuktira-ḍa. 3.navasthayobhayoktā -ṭa. 4.dholiṃ -ṭa. dhena liṃ -ṭha. 5.naṃ e - ṭa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2878: anumānaṃ dvividhaṃ sādhanānumānaṃ dūṣaṇānumānaṃ dūṣaṇānumānaṃ ceti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2882: yadi niragnikaḥ syāt tarhi nirdhūmaḥ syāditatyādi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2886: vaktuṃ punardvividhaṃ sādhanānumānaṃ dūṣaṇānumānaṃ cetyādipaddhatyuktaṃ vivṛṇvāna
GSP29vytrkt3u:2888: nanu paroktanirāsakasyaiva dūṣaṇānumānatvena tarkasya kathaṃ tathātvamityata āha-- asyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2900: na ca vyāpakābhāvavavattayā jñāte vyāpyāro 1 pādvyāpakāropastarkaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2903: tarkasya vyāpakībhūtanirdhūmatvābhāvavattayā jñāta eva bhavatīti vācyam/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2907: tatra 5 kiṃ vyāpya 6 bhramajanya vyāpakabhrama 7 starka ityabhimataṃ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:2912: avya 9 vasthitābhyupagamyamānako 10 ṭhyupādhikaniṣṭatvapratisaṃdhānaṃ veti 1 ṣaṭkalpān krameṇa maṇikaṇṭhoktadiśā nirāha -- bāṣpa ityādinā /
GSP29vytrkt3u:2914: 1. pe vyāpa- ga.ṭa.rā. 2. ca nānu -ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 3.na iti na-ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 4.tatra
GSP29vytrkt3u:2919: yatrāśaṅkhaṃ śaṅkhatayāvagamya pītoyaṃ śaṅkho na śukla iti pratyakṣabhramānantaraṃ śaṅkhatvācchukla ityanuminoti tasyāmanumitāvativyāpteḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2929: niragnikatvasyāvyavasthitatvaṃ hi saṃśayo viparyayo vā na dvayamapi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2939: evaṃ pratisandhānamapi saṃśayo viparyayo vā na dvayamapi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2944: manmate tvaṅgīkṛtena sādhyābhāvena sahānaṅgīkṛtasya sādhanābhāvasya vyāpakatvapramā 1 vā sādhyābhāvāṅgīkāranimittakā sādhanābhāvasyāṅgīkartavyatvapramā vā @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2953: nanvevaṃ yatra sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti saṃśayānantaraṃ puruṣatvavyāpyakarādimānayamiti
GSP29vytrkt3u:2954: viśeṣadarśane sati 2 puruṣa eveti pratyakṣaṃ tadapyanumānaṃ prasajyate ityata āha-- saṃśayeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2955: atra pratyakṣapadena vyāpyadarśanaṃ puruṣa eveti phalūbhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ ca 3 gṛhyate /
GSP29vytrkt3u:2956: tatrādyaṃ yatra karādi tatra puruṣatvamiti vyāptibalena puruṣatvagamakamapi puruṣatvapratyakṣaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:2957: na vyāptijñānakaraṇakaṃ kiṃ tu cakṣurādikaraṇakameva ato na tasyānumāna 4 tvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt3u:2958: sādhyābhāvena niragnikatvādirūpeṇa nirdhūmatvādirūpasādhanābhāvasya vyāpakatvapramā tarka ityucyate/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2959: 1.itaḥ 'tarkyate' iti paryantaṃ nāsti- ga.ṭa.rā. 2.yat ityādhikam -ṭha. 3.grāhyam-ṭha. 4. phalapadamadhikam -ṭa.ṭha.ḍa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2962: tatkaraṇikā sādhanasya sādhyena saha vyāptyanumitistu tarkaṇa 2 miti vyutpatyā tarkaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2963: etadevābhipretya paddhatau kasyacidarthasyāṅgīkārer'thāntarāpādanaṃ tarka iti pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ ca vyāpyāṅgīkāre 'niṣṭavyāpakaprasañjanaṃ tarka ityuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2968: yadi ghaṭa upe 3 yate tarhi paṭopyaṅgīkārya ityādāvativyāptivāraṇāya sādhyābhāvasādhanābhāvapadoktiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2969: sa kiṃ prati karaṇamityata āha -- tatkaraṇiketi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2973: paddhatāvāpādanamityasya 4 lakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ prasañjanamityasya ca sādhanābhāvasya vyāpakatvapramai 5 vetyarthaḥ iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:2976: 6 kathaṃ vyāptyanumitijanakatvamasya tarkasyetyato vā kathaṃ vyāpyāṅgīkāreṇāniṣṭasya vyāpakatvapramā 7 prakāra ityato vāha-- spaṣṭayiṣyata iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:2981: 'spaṣṭayiṣyata iti' ityataḥ - paramasti- ḍa. tatrāpyevamevārthaḥ ityadhikam -ṭa.ṭha. 7.mākāra-ṭha.ḍa. 8.netyarthaḥ -ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:2983: nanu tarkasyānumānatve āpādakaṃ niragnikatvaṃ liṅgam āpādyaṃ nardhūmatvaṃ liṅgīti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3000: vyāpyasya niragnikatvādirūpavyāpyasya parvatādiniṣṭhatvena yaḥ parābhyupagamaḥ tannimittakaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:3001: yajjñānaṃ nirdhūmatvajñānaṃ tadviṣaya 5 tvasya nirdhūmatvāderyo vyatirekaḥ dhūmavatvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:3005: 1.siddhāntineti nāsti-ṭa. 2.rābhyu- ga.rā. 3. svasū-ga.rā. 4.pramāpadaṃ na-ṭa.ṭha. 5. yasya-ṭa.ṭha.ḍa. 6.vyāpyasyetyadhikam -- ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3009: bhajyate hi niragnikatvaṃ svābhyupagamanimittakajñānaṃ prati viṣayasya nirdhūmatvasya vyatirekarūpasadhūmatvasya jñānena/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3010: kathamanyathā na cāyaṃ nirdhūmaḥ tasmānna niragnika iti viṣaya 2 viparyavasānam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3013: tathātve hi yadīti syāditi ca na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3035: tathātve hi tarhīti syāditi ca na syāt/ kintu 1
GSP29vytrkt3u:3037: na ca nirdhūmoyamiti jñānasya yāvānviṣayastāvāneva tarhi nirdhūmaḥ syādityasyāpi viṣayaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3040: sa hi siddhānta viruddhasya sādhane natvāpādane/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3045: tadbhañjaka 2 bhūtaṃ yajjñānaṃ sadhūmatvajñānaṃ tadviṣayo yo vyatirekaḥ sadhūmatvaṃ tatpratiyogitvamityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3048: na cāyaṃ nirdhūmaḥ tasmānna niragnika iti viparyaye paryavasānāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3050: nanu nirdhūmatvasādhane kathaṃ na bādha ityata āha-- na cātreti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3051: apasiddhāntadoṣaṃ ca prāguktaṃ nirāha-- ata eveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3059: nanvevaṃ 2 bādhāderadoṣatvaṃ kathaṃ tasya prāmāṇyamiti cecchṛṣu/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3060: sadhūmopi niragnikostviti śaṅgā hi dvedhā sambhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3061: niragnikatvaṃ prati nirdhūmatve vyāpakatvasyaivābhāvena vā satyapi vyāpakatve pakṣe nirdhūmatvasyāpi satvena vā// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3071: kathaṃ bhramarūpasya ca pramāṇakaraṇatvarūpaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ kathamityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt3u:3074: tatra ca phalībhūtaṃ karaṇabhūtaṃ dvayamapi jñānaṃ pramārūpameveti lakṣaṇaṭīkāpaddhatisudhānusāreṇa
GSP29vytrkt3u:3075: tredhā parihāraṃ atra ca niragnikatvamityādinā vivakṣurupoddhātamāha-- śruṇvityāditanā //
GSP29vytrkt3u:3076: tarkaḥ śaṅkāvadhirityuktatvena tasya śaṅkānivartakatvāditi śaṅkā hītyuktam/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3078: tatrādyo nirdhūmatvasya vyāpakatvapradarśakena yadi niragnikastarhi nirdhūma ityanena nirasyate/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3079: yadi gavayo gosadṛśastarhi gaurapi gavayasadṛśī yadi jīvangṛhe nāsti tarhi bahirasti,
GSP29vytrkt3u:3080: yadi dhūmastarhi vahnirityādau yadi tarhyaiḥ svasamabhivyāhṛtapadārthe 'nyathānupapattirūpavyāptibodhakatvasya vyutpattisiddhatvāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3081: ata eva sudhāyāṃ yadīdaṃ tarhīdamityeva vyāptigraha uktaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3087: jīvitve satve gṛhe 'satvamanupapadyamānaṃ bahiḥsatvaṃ kalpayatītyarthāpattipramāṇasyodāharaṇam-- yadi jīvanniti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3089: ādipadena yadi caitramaitrayoranyataratve sati yadyaṃ caitrastarhyanyo maitra ityādigrahaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3093: ityukte sādhanaṃ 1 no kiṃ na hyājñaivātra sādhikā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3094: iti bhaktipādīyānuvyākhyānasudhāyāṃ yadītyeva vyāptigraha ukta ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3105: yadyatithirāgacchettarhi bhojayitavya iti tu viparyaya 2 paryavasānābhāvātsaṃbhāvanāmātraṃ na tu tarka iti tavāpi saṃmatam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3106: atra ca niragnikatvaṃ prati nirdhūmatvasya 3 vyāpakatvaṃ liṅgam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3108: niragnikatvābhāvaṃ prati nirdhūmatvābhāvasya vyāpyatvaṃ liṅgaṃ tajjñānaṃ phalam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3110: tenaiveti// tarhītiśabdayuktena syācchabdena nirdhūmatvasya pakṣe satvamiti pakṣo 'pi nirasta ityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3111: nanvevaṃ tarhi bhojayitavya ityādāvapyaniṣṭa 5 bodhaḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3112: syā 6 tparyāyasya tavyapratyayasya satvādityata āha-- yadyatithiriti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3117: astvevaṃ tāvatā kathaṃ prāmāṇyamityata āha-- atra ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3122: 1.tasya ni-ga.ṭa.rā. 2. ye pa -ga.ṭa.rā. 3.ca ityadhikam-ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 4.pi ca pra-ga.ṭa.rā. 5.ṣṭatva- bo-ṭa.ṭha. 6.ekameva syātpadam -ṭa.ṭha.
GSP29vytrkt3u:3126: ata eva prasaṅgāśenaiva nirdhūmatvābhāvasya niragnikatvābhāvena vyāpteḥ siddhatvādeva
GSP29vytrkt3u:3127: viparyaye paryavasānena 1 cāyaṃ nirdhūma ityanena tasya pakṣadharmatāmātraṃ pradarśya
GSP29vytrkt3u:3129: na tu tvayāśaṅkitaṃ pakṣe niragnikatvajñānam karaṇam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3134: na ca yadi niragnikastarhi nirdhūma ityanenāvyāpagakatvaśaṅkā nirasyata iti 2 vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3137: yadiniragnika ityādinā sā śaṅkā nirasyata iti nirdhūmatvasya vyāpakatvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ nāsiddhamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3138: nanu tāvatā vyāpyatva rūpaliṅgino jñānaṃ prameti kuto vyāpyatvasyāsiddherityata āha -- vyāpakābhāvasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3141: nanu yadyevamasiddhibādhādikamāśaṅkya tarke na doṣa ityuktaṃ tatkathamuktarītyāsiddhyāderabhāvādityata āha-- asiddhyādyuktistviti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3142: 1.ne nāyaṃ -ga.ṭa.rā. 2.iti tannahe -ṭa. 3.iti vācyam tatra ha- ṭha. 3.dhūmarūpyetyadhikam -ṭha.ḍa.ṭa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3145: nirdhūmatvasya ca 1 vyāpakatvapradarśanārthaṃ tarkavākyenopatte ye 2 niragnikatvanirdhūmatvarūpe vyāpyavyāpake tadabhaprāyā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3148: nāstīti tathāsati yadīti 3 syāditi ca na syāditi coktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3150: prasaṅgarūpānumāne ca na sādhyavadāpādyasya pramāṇavirodhādi dūṣaṇamiti pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ prasaṅgarūpānumāne bādhāpasiddhāntayoradūṣaṇatvāditi sudhāyāṃ coktaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3152: prasaṅgārthatayā proktā na siddhāntasya na dūṣakaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3160: 1. ca iti na-ga.ṭa.rā. 2.yena -ga.ṭa.rā. 3.yadīti iti na -syāditicoktam. ityevāsti-ga.ṭa.rā. 4.ca
GSP29vytrkt3u:3163: niragnikatvanirdhūmatvādayaḥ proktāḥ na tu pakṣaniṣṭhatayā proktāḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3165: yattu sudhāyāṃ prasaṅgaḥ aṅgīkārtavyatayā jñāpanamiti vyākhyānam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3167: yadvāpādagakarūpaliṅgas niragnikatvasya pakṣe parābhyupagatatvameva pakṣasaṃbandha iti nāsiddhiḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3175: bādhāsiddhī prakārāntareṇa nirākurvan paroktarītyā niragnikatvanirdhūmatvajñānayoḥ karaṇatvaphalatve 'bhyupetya
GSP29vytrkt3u:3178: yakṣasyogratve tadanurodha 1 baliḥ atyugratve atibaliḥ mṛdutve alpabaliriti nyāyenetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3190: nanu -- saṃyogasamavāyābhyāmanyasya kathaṃ pakṣadharma 1 tāghaṭakasaṃbandhatvaṃ kvāpyadarśanādityata āha -- dṛśyate ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3193: ūrdhvadeśo vṛṣṭimān adhodeśe nadīpūra 3 vatvāt ityādirūpānumānasyetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3196: ūrdhvadeśarūpapakṣanirūpyo yo adhodeśaḥ tatsthatvarūpapakṣasaṃbandho nadīpūrasya dṛśyate/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3201: nyāyamate śabdo 'bhidheyo jñeyatvādityatra jñeyatvaṃ nāma śabdasya paraṃparāsaṃbandhena jñānatvameva/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3205: jñānasyārthasya ca 5 svarūpasaṃbandhaḥ jñānādinā ca jñānatvādeḥ samavāya iti paraṃparāsambandho dṛśyata
GSP29vytrkt3u:3210: 1.tādi gha-ṭa. 2. petya-ṭa.ḍa. 3.ratvā-ṭa. rāditya-ṭha. 4.prameyatvaṃ cetyādikaṃ nāsti -ṭha. 5.ca iti na -ṭa.ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3213: ayaṃ ca pakṣaḥ parābhyupagamamātrasya tatra siddhipadārthatvāditi paddhatyuktaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3217: evaṃ tarhi nirdhūmaḥ syādityasya nirdhūmatvenāṅgīkartavya ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3220: yadi viṣaṃ bhakṣa 1 yiṣyasi tarhi mariṣyasītyādivat/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3222: nanvaṅgīkartavyatājñāpanepi kathaṃ bādhitatvanirāsa ityata āha-- na ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3229: pūrvaṃ dhūmostvityuktatvena nirdhūmatvāṅgīkāre svakriyāvirodharūpāṅgīkārāyogyatā na ca bādhitā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3234: evaṃ ca parvato nirdhūmatvenāṅgīkartavyaḥ niragnikatvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt hṛdavat ityanumānameva
GSP29vytrkt3u:3235: tarka iti sādhanānumāna iva tarkepyasiddhyādikaṃ doṣa eveti na tarkasya sādhanānumānādvaiṣamyamipi //
GSP29vytrkt3u:3236: atra ca dvitīye pakṣe niragnikatvameva liṅgam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3244: svasiddhaiḥ sādhanaṃ parasiddhairdūṣaṇamato na dūṣaṇe 'pasiddhāntādīte pramāṇalakṣaṇe ca, @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3250: yatra punaraṅgīkāro vyāpakābhāvasya siddhastādṛśasyaivāsiddhyādiśūnyasya prāmāṇyamupeyata iti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3251: nanu yadvetyuktadvitīyapakṣepi parābhyupagamenaivāsiddhyādiparihārāttṛtīyasya tataḥ ko bheda ityata āha-- atra ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3254: nanu tarkepyasiddhyāderdeṣatve tadadoṣatvoktirviruddhetyata āha -- yā tviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3263: yadvā tṛtīyoktāyā abhyupagamāyogyābhyupagamasya liṅgatāyā api sādhanānumāne kvāpyadarśanāt vyavasthoktiḥ pakṣatrayasādhāraṇīti jñeyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3264: etena viparyaya 2 paryavasānarūpānumananirapekṣasya tarkasya na prāmāṇyamiti nibandhādāvudayanādyuktaṃ nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3266: yātu aniṣṭāpādanaṃ viparyaye paryavasānaṃ cobhayaṃ militemevānumitisādhanaṃ bhavatīti tarkasya prāmāṇyamiti paddhatiḥ, @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3268: ata ityādi granthakāravākyam svasiddhe 3 rityādi vākyadvayā 4 bhiprāya vivaraṇam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3277: evaṃ hi paddhativirodha ityato dvedhā samādhimāha-- yātviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3285: ca 3 nirapekṣatvepi taduddeśyāyāṃ na niragnika iti pramāyāṃ paryavasānasāpekṣatvena veti jñeyam //
GSP29vytrkt3u:3286: kiñca tarkarūpaṃ hi jñānaṃ na tāvatsaṃśayaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3301: na dvayamapyato 'prāmāṇyāyogātprāmāṇyameva yuktamiti pariśeṣeṇāpi prāmāṇyamāha-- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3302: vipakṣabādhakenāpi tarkasya prāmāṇyamāha -- kiṃ ca tarkajñānasyeti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3305: yadi hariścandronṛtaṃ brūyāttarhyagnirapi śītaḥ syādityādismṛtiścāpramāṇaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3308: kiñca 2 pramātvenānāśaṅkite dhūmarūpaviśeṣyasya 3 sākṣātkāre sati kathaṃ nirdhūmatvasyāropaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3309: na ca tarkasya pratimāyāṃ nārāyaṇabuddhivadāhāryāroparūpatvādviśeṣadarśanaṃ na virodhīti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3314: etena -- tarkaḥ saṃśayātpracyuto nirṇayaṃ cāprāpta ityudayanoktamavyavasthitaniragnikatvābhyupagamopādhikāniṣṭapratisandhānarūpatvāttarkajñānasyāprāmāṇyamiti vardhamānādyuktaṃ; @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3315: na kevalamatiprasaṅgabhayāttarkasyābhramatvamupeyaṃ kiṃ tu viśeṣadarśanarūpavirodhisatvepyu 5 papannatvānna bhramatvaṃ tasyopetuṃ śakyamityāha
GSP29vytrkt3u:3319: kintvasmaduktadiśā pramārūpa eva vācya iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3331: tarkaḥ saṃdehaviparyayapramāvijātīyaṃ jñānāntaraṃ sāca jātiḥ tarkayāmi na tu niścinomi ityanuvyavasāyasākṣiketi maṇikaṇṭhoktaṃ ca nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3333: kiñca tarkatvasya jātitve tarkasya tvadaṅgīkṛtaṃ saṃśayanivartakatvaṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3335: kiñca jātyaiva nivartakatve ' 2 numānānugrāhakastarko niragnikatvānumānasya 3 ca pratibandhikāmapi śaṅkāṃ nivartayet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3345: nanu tarkarūpajñānasya jātyaiva saṃśayanivartakatvamastviti vaktāraṃ pratyāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3346: nanu -- jātyaiva nivartakatvepi maṇyādikaṃ jātyā pratibandhakamapi yathā dāhasyaiva
GSP29vytrkt3u:3347: na tvanyasya evaṃ tattadīyatarkastattadīya śaṅkānivartako na sarvasādhāraṇa ityāśaṅkya
GSP29vytrkt3u:3351: tatroddeśa 1 dāhatvasyevātra śaṅkātvasyaiva pratibadhyatāvacchedakatvaṃ 2 ceduktāti prasaṅgāt/ tarkaviṣa 3
GSP29vytrkt3u:3352: virodhiviṣayaśaṅkātvasya 4 tathātve tarkasyāpi kḷptena śaṅkāviṣayavirodhiviṣayatvenaiva pratibandhakatāyā nyāyyatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3356: parārthe tarke vādivākyāpekṣā tu parārthānumāna iva vyāptyādismārakatvena /
GSP29vytrkt3u:3366: tatra tarkaprayoktṛvākyasāpekṣatvāttarkarūpajñānasya śābdatve kuto netyata āha -- parārtha iti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:3368: 1.śya- ka.ga.rā. 2.tve uktā -ga.ṭa.rā. 3.yaka -ga.rā. punarviṣayetyadhikam -ka. 4. sya ca -ga.ṭa.rā. 5. vyāghātatvādi- ga.ṭa.rār. 6.kajñānaṃ pra-ga.ṭa.rā. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3375: pakṣādanyatra niyamepi pakṣe samabalasya prabalasya vā sādhyābhāvapramāṇasyābhimānena pakṣa eva sadhūmo niragnikostviti vā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3376: tatrādyā vyabhicāraśaṅkārūpā liṅgaparāmarśātprācīnā dvitīyā tu pratipramāṇaśaṅkārūpā tasmādarvācīnā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3381: dvitīyā tu pratipramāṇaśaṅkānimittakādheyā pakṣāsādhāraṇī ceti bhedaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3386: uktayoḥ pakṣayo 3 rabhedamāśaṅkya svārasikatvādheyatvābhyāṃ bhedaṃ sādhayati-- yadyapītyādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3390: bahuśaḥ sahacaritayorapi yatkiñcivdyabhicāradarśanaṃ tena nimittenātrāpi dhūmādau tatheti jñāyamānetyarthaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3394: anyathopapattiviṣayayā śaṅkayā pratipramāṇena ca 2 sākṣādanupapattipramāpakasya tarkasya viṣayakṛtavirodhasya satvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3400: sādhyābhāvāprasiddherevaṃ śaṅkāyāḥ evānudayāttatra tarkasyopayogāsaṃbhavo na śaṅkyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3402: nirāse ko heturityato na maṇikaṇṭhoktadiśā jātyā,
GSP29vytrkt3u:3404: sādhyena vinā yā upapattiḥ saṃbhavaḥ tadviṣayetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3405: pakṣataditarasādhāraṇyena vā pakṣa eva veti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3414: tatrādyo 'numitikaraṇaniṣpādako dvitīyastu niṣpannena karaṇena pratipramāṇaśaṅkānirāsārthamapekṣitatvena phalopakārakatvādanumānānugrāhakaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3416: 2 kvaciddaśāviśeṣe karaṇaniṣpatterarvāk pratipramāṇaśaṅkānirasanadvāreṇa karaṇaśa 3 rīraniṣpādakaśca bhavatītyarthaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3428: nanvatra vākye dvitīyapakṣe 5 dvitīyapakṣa eva pratibhāti na tvādya ityata āha -- apīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3431: tataḥ 'karaṇaśarīra' ityādikañcāsta -ka.ṭa.rā. 3.ṇasyānugrāhako bhavati--apiśabdāttataḥprāk vyabhicāra śaṅkānirasanadvāreṇa śarīraniṣpadakaśca(na)
GSP29vytrkt3u:3438: yadvā kvacivdyabhicārasya pratipramāṇasya vā śaṅkāyāmanugrāhakaḥ karaṇaniṣpādanena vā 2 niṣpannasya 3 karaṇasya sarakāritayā vopakārako bhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3459: adriragnimānna veti vipratipattau sādhanānumānaṃ vinaiva yadi niragnikaḥ syāttarhi nirdhūmaḥ syān cāyaṃ nirdhūma iti tarkarūpānumānenaivāgnisiddheḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3460: na hi vidhimukhena sādhayitvaiva niṣedhamukhena sādhanīyamiti kuladharma ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3463: yadvā kvaciduddeśyāyāṃ tasmānna niragnika iti pramāyāṃ sādhyāyāmanugrāhako bhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3464: apiśabdānnirdhūmatvenāṅgīkartavya iti pramāyāṃ vā 1 vyāptipramāyāṃ vā sādhyāyāṃ svatantraśca bhavatītyarthaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3468: nanvagnimāndhūmavatvāditi vidhimukhenāsādhayitvā kataṃ niṣedhamukhenaiva sādhanamityata āha-- na hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3477: 1.ādau 'vyāptipramāyāṃ vā' ityasti-ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 2.kyasyetiyojyam uktaṃ ce -ṭa.ṭha. syeti bhāvaḥ -ḍa. 3.'yāṃ' iti,
GSP29vytrkt3u:3478: tataḥ anugrāhaka ityādikamevāsti -ṭha. 4.yetyādivākyavyākhyāvasare -ṭa. śraya ityādivā-ḍa. 5.'aṅgīkartavya iti' ityasti -ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3482: sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vā pramāṇameva hi śaṅkānivartakam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3485: hi vyāptiyogyatādibhramajanyānumitiśābdajñānadiriva dhārāvāhikabhrame dvitīyānugṛhītasya prathamasyeva vā 1 pramāṇatarkānugṛhītānumiterevāpramātvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:3488: nanu dhūmavatvādisādhanāphalabhūtāgnimatvādipramāmeva paryavasānamukhena janayastarkasya kathaṃ prāmāṇyamityāśaṅkāṃ sadṛṣṭāntaṃ pariharannupasaṃharati -- tasmāditi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3490: tathātve 'nugrāhakatvameva na syādityāśaṅkāṃ sadṛṣṭāntaṃ 2 nirasyannupasaṃharati -- tasmāditi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3492: śaṅkānivartakatvānyathānupapatyā ca tarkasya prāmāṇyamityāha -- sādhakaṃ hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3499: kiñca paramate tarkasya kiṃ viṣaya 1 viśodhana upayogaḥ kiṃ vā vyāptigrahe,
GSP29vytrkt3u:3501: kiṃ vā vardhamānarītyā sādhyābhāvasaṃdehanivartanena yadvā tajjanyasādhyābhāvajijñāsānivartanena,
GSP29vytrkt3u:3514: tatra ca tarkasyāprāmāṇyepi na doṣa ityatastaduktopayogaṃ khaṇḍayitumāha -- kiṃñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3515: vyāptigrāhakasya viṣayapariśodhakasya veti parāmarśavādānte maṇyukterāha -- kiṃ viṣayeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3521: kiñca vahnivyapte 1 dhūme dṛṣṭe kathaṃ vahnyāvasaṃdehaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3522: na ca viśeṣadarśane sati svārasikasya vahnyabhāvasaṃdehasyāsaṃbhavepi pratipramāṇāhitā tacchaṅkā yakteti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3528: nirdhūmatvasyāyogolakādāviva sāgnikatvepi hṛdādāviva niragnikatvepi sambhavāt sādhāraṇyenetyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3529: bhavanmatepi tarhi nirdhūmatvajñānācchaṅkānivṛttirna syādityata āha-- manmatetviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3534: pratyuta tvanmata eva tannivṛttirayukteti bhāvenāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3545: anyathā prameyatvādiprakārakamapi viṣā 1 dijñānaṃ tannivartakaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3546: na ca nirdhūmatvajñānaṃ tvanmate nirdhūmatāṃ tadāpādakatvenāniṣṭaṃ niragnitāṃ vāniṣṭa 2 prāmāṇyāpātāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3547: kiṃ tu pakṣaniṣṭhatayaiveti kathaṃ tarkeṇa niragnikatvajijñānasānivṛttiḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3548: pratipramāṇaṃ-- sādhyābhāvaviṣayaṃ tarkajñānaṃ tu nirdhūmatvaviṣayamiti virodhiviṣayakatvaṃ neti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3549: sādhyābhāvajijñāsānivartaneneti pakṣaṃ nirāha-- na tṛtīya iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3551: nirdhūmatvajñānena jijñāsānivṛttau nivṛttiprayojakadharmābhāvānna sāmarthyamiti sāmānyanyāyoktipūrvamāha-- jñānasya hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3553: astvetadapi jñānaṃ tathetyata āha-- na ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3558: aniṣṭamaniṣṭatā 6 vacchedakenollekhe sati vahnitvādinā vahnyādyullekhijñānasyeva prāmāṇyaṃ syādityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3559: nanu dhūmaṃ paśyataḥ kathaṃ nirdhūmatvādijñāne pramāṇaviruddhatvādikaṃ na bhāyāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3563: kiñca pramāṇaviruddhanirdhūmatvāpādakatayā niragnikatvamevāniṣṭaṃ na tu tajjñānam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3565: tathā ca niragnikatvaviṣayecchāyā eva nivṛttiḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3568: āptavākyādinā svasya dāridrayaṃ niścitavatopi dhena autkaṇṭhyadarśanāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3570: cedevamapi nirdhūmanatvajñānena niragnikatvecchaiva nivartyā natu tajjñānecchārūpā jijñāsetyāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3581: yena nirdhūmatvamaprāmāṇikamiti niragnikatvaṃ ca tadāpādakamityubhayamaniṣṭaṃ syādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3595: duḥkhaṃ tatsādhanaṃ vā yathāniṣṭamucyate tathā 2 prāmāṇike tadāpadake vāṅgīkārānarhatvamātreṇāniṣṭapadamastīti śabdasāmyamātreṇetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3597: sādhyābhāvajijñāsā tu na pratibandhaketi tannirāsāyāso vyartha evetyāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3606: 1. va viṣayajñānenāpi -- ṭa. be jñānamiti jñānenā-rā. 2.thā a -ḍa. 3.ata evetyadhikam -ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3610: etena vyāptigrahe upayoga iti dvitīyopi nirastaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3611: nirdhūmatvajñānasya viṣayakṛtavirodhābhāvādāropa 1 tvena jñātatvācca niragnikostviti śaṅkāṃ pratyavirodhitvāditi dik//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3614: sādhyābhāvasaṃśayajanyasādhyajijñāsojjīvakatvena tarkasyopayoga iti pakṣaṃ nirāha-- nāpi caturtha iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3619: na ca nirdhūmatvajñānaṃ sādhyābhāvasāmānādhikaraṇyavirodhiviṣayakaṃ yena vyāptigrahopayogi syāditi bhāvenāha -- nirdhūmatvajñānasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3620: kiñca tvanmate kevalānvayisādhyakahetuprayogasthale sādhyābhāvāprasiddhyā māstu prameyatvamityādiśaṅkānudayena tatra tannivartanāsaṃbhavātkathaṃ tatra tarkasyopayogaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3621: api ca tarkasyāpi vyāptisāpekṣatvena tarkāṅgavyāptijñānepi tarkāpekṣāyāmanavasthāpātena na vyāptigrahopayogitvaṃ tarkasya syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3622: yadi kvacittarkeṇa vināpi vyāptigrahastarhi vyabhicārātkathaṃ tarkasya tadupayogitvam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3628: atra viparītaśabdena paramate svamata iva nivartyāyāḥ śaṅkāyā nivartakena tarkeṇa saha viṣayakṛto virodho neti darśitam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3631: anyathopapatyanyathānupapattirūpaviruddhaviṣayakatvaṃ yathā svamate tathā na paramata ityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3638: yattu paddhatau kevalānvayikevalavyatirekītyādinā paroktānumānatraividhyamanūdya nirastaṃ tadvivaritukāmaḥ taccānumānaṃ trividhamityādināmaṇyuktaṃ nirasitumāha --yacceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3654: bhāvābhāvayoranyonyaviraharūpatayā gaganātyantābhāvopi gaganarūpātyantābhāvapratiyogīti tatrāvyāptaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syādato vṛttimaditi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3655: gaganaṃ cāvṛttipadārthastanmata iti vṛttimadatyantābhāvo na gaganarūpaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3671: tvanmate vyāptigrahārthaṃ pratijñāvākyasyābodhakatvaparihārārthaṃ ca 1 viśiṣṭajñānaṃ viśeṣaṇajñānapūrvakamiti niyamārthaṃ 2 sādhyaprasiddherāvaśyakatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3675: yasya dharmasya kevalaṃ vyatireko abhāva eva prasiddhaḥ na tu bhāvaḥ sa dharmaḥ kevalavyatirekīti tādṛśadharmasādhyakamanumānamapi kevalavyatirekyanumānamityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3681: vyatirekihetunotpannasādhyaviśeṣaṇa 5 kapakṣaviśeṣyakaviśiṣṭajñānamanumiteḥ pūrvaṃ sādhyāprasiddhau viśeṣaṇajñānapūrvakaṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3682: tathā ca tatpūrvakatvaniyamaśca nirvikalpakajñānavādinā tvayāṅgīkṛta iti tadrakṣārthaṃ sādhyaprasiddhirāvaśyakītyarthaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3683: 1. ca iti nāsti- ṭa.rā. 2.ca ityadhikam-ṭa.rā. 3.kyapīti-ṭa. kyanumānamapīti -ṭha. 4.ṇyarū -ḍa. 5. ṇapa - ṭa.ḍa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3688: nāpi pakṣaikadeśe tena nāsādhāraṇyam pakṣādanyatra tadaprasiddheḥ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:3689: nāpi kevalavyatirekavaiyarthyam tasya kṛtsne pakṣe sādhyapratītyarthatvāditi vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3690: pṛthivītarabhinne 4 tyādau pakṣasyaikadeśasatvepi gaganamitara 5 bhinnamityādau tadabhāvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3694: kathamabhāva ityato bhaktipāde sādhyāprasiddhajheradoṣatvoktiprastāve sudhoktarītyāha-- tatreti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3696: vyatirekavāde maṇau siddhānte kathitaṃ nirāha-- nāpīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3703: nanu pakṣādanyatra niścitasādhyakatvameva dṛṣṭāntatve prayojakamityata āha -- pakṣeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3704: nanvastūktadiśā vyatirekiṇonvayitvaṃ tathāpi na kevalavyatirekitvabhaṅga ityāśaṅkya pratyāhahaha -- na cānvayeti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3712: naca yatrānitye vāṅmanase ityādau pakṣatāvacchedakanānātvaṃ tatraivāṃśe siddhasādhanam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3720: atraivottaratra kiñcābhāvagatayā vyatirekavyāptyā kathaṃ bhāvasya gamakatvamityādineti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3721: maṇyādyuktamevāṃśataḥ siddhasādhanatādoṣoddhāramāśaṅkya nirāha-- na ca yatreti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3731: na ca ghaṭasya ghaṭatvenetarabhedaniścayepi pṛthivītvena tatsaṃdehādikamiti 1 vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3733: anyathaitatparvatatvena vahnimattayā niścaye 2 pi parvate parvatatvena tatsaṃdehāpatyā tatra vahnyarthino niṣkampapravṛttirna syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3741: jñānayoḥ samānaprakārakatvenaiva nivartyanivartakabhāva iti nyāyasya sāmānyaviśeṣaprakārānyaparatvamiti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3743: maṇāvanūdya nirastamapi maṇyuktadoṣe tavdyākhyātṛṇāṃ vivādabhāvātsvayaṃ dṛḍhadoṣavivakṣayā
GSP29vytrkt3u:3749: evaṃ ca nānvayitvādikam pakṣaikadeśepi sādhyāniścayāt nāpyasādhāraṇyam sapakṣābhāvāt nāpi vyatirekivaiyarthyam tasya niścayārthatvāditi vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3751: na ca tejobhinnā pṛthivī jalādidvādaśabhinnā na veti tejobhinnadharmikajalādidvādaśabhinnatvakoṭikasaṃśayenārthāstrayodaśābhinnatvarūpasādhyaprasi ddhiryukteti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3754: śaśīyakarṇādau śaśīyamidaṃ śṛṅgaṃ na veti saṃdehena śaśaśraṅgasyāpi prasiddhiprasaṅgācca/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3756: pṛthivī tejobhinnā na veti saṃśayena pṛthivyāmeva vā prasiddhaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3758: evaṃ ca tatraikaṃ pakṣabhūtadharmiviśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtvānyakoṭikasaṃśayotpādi kimapi na bādhakamityāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ca tejobhinneti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3760: tathā ca yatra na saṃdehastatrāprasiddhirdurvāroti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3761: nanu saṃdigdhe nyāyapravṛtteḥ saṃśayaḥ sārvatrika iti cet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3768: tathā ca tādṛśaṃ prati niścayarūpasādhyaprasiddhireva vācyeti bhāvaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3772: na ca tarhi pakṣādanyatraiva trayodaśasu trayodaṣabhedānāṃ viśakalitānāṃ niścayarūpā prasiddhirastīti nāprasaddhaviśeṣaṇatvādīti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3779: athavetyādinā maṇyuktaṃ pakṣāntaramāśaṅkya nirāha -- na catarhīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3786: yadvā trayodasapadārthānāmanyonyābhāvānāṃ jalabhedastejasi tejobhedo jale ityevaṃrūpeṇa prasiddhirityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3790: ityadhikam-ga. 'śaśaśṛṅgollikhitā bhūrityādāvapi viśakalitānāṃ prasiddheḥ suvacatvāt' ityasti -ṭa. 2. sādhyateti iti na -ṭa.ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3793: kiñcaikenaiva liṅgenaikadā sādhyamānā api 1 trayodaśabhedāḥ pratyekanirūpitatrayogaśavyāptibhireva sādhanīyāḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3796: yatra trayodaśānāmanyonyābhāvanāmabhāvastatra pṛthivītvābhāva iti hi vyatirekavyāptirjalādau pradarśanīyā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3797: tatra jale jalānyonyābhāvābhāvasya satveti tejaḥpṛbhṛtipratiyogikānāṃ dvādaśabhedānāmabhāvasyāsatvena sādhyābhāvasyābhāvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3803: nanu -- yanmate tādṛśābhāvasvīkārastanmatarītyāyaṃ pakṣe maṇavukta iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3813: tathā ca pratyekameva sādhyatā viśrāntetyekaikabhedarūpasādhyavato jalādereva sapakṣatvena tato vyāvṛttatvena 1 hetorasādhāraṇyatādavasthyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3823: pratyekābhāvānāṃ pratyekanirūpitānvayavyāptibhireva tāvatāṃ bhedānāṃ sādhyatvāditi bhāvenāyaṃ granthaḥ pṛtta iti yathānyāsa eva granthaḥ sādhuriti 4 jñeyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3827: anumitiviṣayavato vyāvṛttatvameva pṛthivītvahetorastvityata āha-- na ca prakṛta iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3842: jalādau svasmādbhedābhāvepi teja ādidvādaśabhedānāṃ satvena trayodaśabhedābhāvarūpasādhyavyatirekagābhāvena vyatirekavyāptigrahānupapatteśca//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3843: nanu ghaṭasya satvepipaṭābhāvena ghaṭapaṭau na sta itivajjale dvādaśabhedeṣu satsvapi jalādbhedābhāvena vyāsajyavṛttipratiyogitākatrayodaśabhedābhāvostīti cenna/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3849: pṛthivyā jalātmakatve satyapi teja ādyanātmakatvamātreṇa trayodaśānyonyābhāvopapattyārthāntarāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3850: laghavena pratiyogisatvamātramabhāvavirodhī 1 ti vadatā tvayaiva vyāsajyavṛtti 2 pratiyogikābhāvānaṅgīkārācca/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3851: ghaṭe satyapi ghaṭapaṭau nasta iti dhīstu ghaṭe paṭasāhityābhāvaviṣayeti tvayevaiktam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3853: vyāsajyavṛttiḥ anugatavṛttimānyaḥ tādṛśadharmāvacchinnā pratiyogitā yasya tādṛśo yastrayodaśabhedānāmabhāva ityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3858: ato na tādṛśo 'bhāvo 'ṅgīkartṛṃ śakya iti prāguktavyāptigrahānupapattiḥ sustheti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3868: 1.ghaṭe satyapi ghaṭapaṭau nasta iti dhīstu ghaṭapaṭasāhityabhāva viṣayeti vadatātvayaiva
GSP29vytrkt3u:3873: na cāsādhāraṇyasya satpratipakṣavadvipakṣe bādhakābhāvadaśāyāmeva doṣatvātprakṛte ca vipakṣe bādhakasya satvā 1 ttasyādoṣatvamiti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3876: te ca pakṣaikadeśe ghaṭādau militā vā pakṣādanyatra
GSP29vytrkt3u:3877: viśakalitā vā ghaṭādau jalatvaṃ 3 netyādipratyakṣeṇa siddhā iti nistam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3883: tathāpi trayāṇāṃ madhye dvayame 4 kīkṛtya dvitvasaṃpādanenānyataraditi sādhviti dhyeyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3888: pratyekaṃ trayodaśābhāvānāṃ sādhyatvenābhimatānāṃ jalāditrayodaśasu prasiddhatvena teṣāmeva sapakṣatvāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3889: yopi maṇāvanyotvityādinā tattadasādhāraṇadharmātyantābhāvāḥ sādhyā ityantābhāvasādhyakapakṣa uktaḥ tamapi nirāha -- eteneti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3893: 1.tvānna tasya doṣatvabhi-ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 2.kṣasya sa -ṭa.rā. 3.tvādi-ṭa. 4.mekarāśī -ṭha.ḍa. 5.prakṛte ceti iti na -ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3896: vā vyāghātadaṇḍabhayena vā sāmānyataḥ 2 prasiddhaṃ trayodaśabhinnatvaṃ pṛthivyāṃ sādhyate /
GSP29vytrkt3u:3900: pratyekamevātyantābhāvānāṃ sādhyatvātteṣāṃ ca pratyekaṃ jalādāveva prasiddhestatra ca hetoravṛtteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3902: yadapi maṇau“yadvā jalaṃ tejaḥ prabhṛtidvādaśabhinnapratiyogikānyonyābhāvavadityā“dinā sāmānyataḥ 4 prasaddhisaṃpādakamanumuktam tadapyāśaṅkya nirāha -- nanu tarhītyādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3903: yadyapi maṇāvanyathaiva sādhyanirdeṣaḥ kṛtaḥ tathāpi tatra yathāśrute tejaḥprabhṛtidvādaśanirūpitabhedādhikaraṇe
GSP29vytrkt3u:3906: tejaḥprabhṛtayo ye dvādaśapadārthāstadvibhinnaṃ yadvastu tanniṣṭho yo bhedastatpratiyogīti sādhyārthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3907: tathā ca jalabhedastejaḥprabhṛtidvādaśapadārthabhedāścaikatraiva sāmānyataḥ siddhā iti anumānena vā siddhaṃ trayodaśabhinnatvamityanvayaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3908: prāmāṇyavāde prāmāṇyānumitisiddhyarthaṃ prāmāṇyaprasiddhisaṃpādakatayā maṇyādyuktaṃ tulyanyāyatvādihāpyāśaṅkate -- vyāghāteti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3914: sāṃmugdhyena sādhyaprasiddhāvapi pakṣo vā pakṣādanyo vāyaṃ sādhyavāniti vyaktiviśeṣa 1 niścayābhāvāditi cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3915: vyaktiviśeṣāniścayepi vyatirekipravṛtteḥ prā 2 kkaścitsādhyavāniti niścaye tasyaiva sapakṣatvena vyatirekitvabhaṅgāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3916: anyathopādhi 3 nā kvacidvyāptibhaṅga iti niścayepi atreti vyāptibhaṅgasthalaviśeṣasyāniścayāt sopādhikopi saddhetuḥ syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3918: cāniṣṭaprasakteḥ satvāt sādhyasya sāmānyena prāmāṇikatve sidde pramāṇaviśeṣajijñāsāyāṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:3922: anvayitvāsādhāraṇyayorabhāvepi yadasapakṣatvaṃ vyatirekyanumānasya lakṣaṇamuktaṃ tadbhagnamityāha -- vyaktiviśeṣeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3927: vyatirekavyāpteḥ prakṛtasādhyasiddhau anupayogā“nna hi bhāvena bhāvasādhane abhāvenābhāvasya vyāptirūpayujyate“ityādi paddhatyā-- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3930: prāmāṇikatvenaivārthe 1 niścite pramāṇaviśeṣajijñāsāyāḥ viśeṣagataviśeṣajijñāsāyā iva vaiyarthyāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3937: tathātve dhūmagatayā vahnivyāptyā kṛtakatvasyānityatvagamakatvāpatyā svaniṣṭhavyāptitvaṃ tantramiti vaktavyatvenābhāvaniṣṭhavyāptyā bhāvasya
GSP29vytrkt3u:3943: -dyu 2 ktaṃ hṛdikṛtvā prakāntareṇa vyatirekiṇaṃ nirāha -- kiṃ cābhāvagatayeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:3952: 1 na ca svanirūpitavyābhicāravirodhitvarūpaṃ vā svanirūpitavyabhicāradhīpratibandhakadhīviṣayatvarūpaṃ vā vyāptimatvamubhayānugatamiti vācyamā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3963: vyatirekanirūpito vyabhicāro hetvabhāvavati sādhyāsatvaṃ taddvirodhitva vyatirekavyāpterastīti svanirūpitavyabhicāravirodhitvamubhayavyāpterastiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3964: evaṃ dhīpakṣepītyanugatavyāptijñānarūpaṃ karaṇamubhayatrāstīti tadviśiṣṭaparāmarśo vyatirekiṇyapi yukta iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:3970: ityadhikam - ga.ṭa.rā. 2.svanirūpitetyādi nāsti- ga.ṭa.rā. 3.ca iti nāsti -ga.ṭa.rā. 4. ṇi sādhyābhāvavyāptipakṣadharmatayo -ka. 5.kiṇītaracedasā -ṭha. 6. tatretyadhikam -ṭha.ḍa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:3972: 1 na cānvayini liṅgaparāmarśo vyatirekiṇi sādhyābhāvavyāpakābhāvapratiyogitvajñānaṃ anumitimātre tu pakṣadharmatādhīr 2 heturiti vācyam/

GSP29vytrkt3u:4552: ata yo brāhmaṇāyāvaguret vadhodyogaṃ kuryāt taṃ śatayātanākhyanarakiṇaṃ vidyādityādau yoya iti vīpsāṃ vinā yathoktirityarthaḥ// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------

GSP29vytrkt3u:4865: tarhi pakṣaniṣṭhatvena pramitābhāvapratiyogisādha 1 katvamasiddhiḥ vyāptirāhitasādhaka 2 tvamavyāptirityasiddhyavyāptyerapi sādhyaniṣṭhatvena jñānaṃ kalpyatām//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4871: pratijñāvirodhaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ itarau tvasādhāraṇāviti lakṣaṇaṭīkāsūcitayuktyā ca hetudoṣatvaṃ nirāha-- api ca bādhādiriti//

GSP29vytrkt3u:4881: nanu pratyakṣādāvutpannasya jñānasya bādhenāpramāṇatvameva bodhyate diṅmohādau darśanāt 1 anumitau tūtpattireva pratibadhyate ityasādhāraṇyamiti

GSP29vytrkt3u:4883: viṣayabādhe 'viśiṣṭe 6 śabdābhāsa evāsadarthabodhako na tu liṅgābhāsa ityasya ca paribhāṣāmātratvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4885: kiṃ ca yaḥ karaṇasāmarthyarūpavyāptipakṣadharmatānyataravighaṭanarūpaḥ sa eva hetvābhāsaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4893: nanu tatra bādhāvatārānantaraṃ śabdādavagatamasa 8 devetyanubhavādastu śabdābhāsasyābodhakatvaṃ na tu liṅgābhāsasya/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4910: ityanuvyākhyānas pratyakṣabādhenānumānasya vyabhicāro bhavatīti vyākhyā sā vyāptigrahaṇadaśābhiprāyā/

GSP29vytrkt3u:4927: iti bādhapratirodhayorasiddhyādinā saha hetudoṣatvoktiḥ sāpi bādhādinaiva dūṣite viṣaye pravartamānasya hetorapyaviṣayavṛttitvaṃ nāma doṣostītyabhipretyaiva / na tu

GSP29vytrkt3u:4942: sādhyadharmavati dṛṣṭānte sādhanavikale heturvyāpyatvāsiddha iti dṛṣṭāntābhāso hetvābhāsāntargata eveti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4947: anyathā bādhe pakṣasyaiva vipakṣatvāt bādho vyabhicāre ' 1 ntarbhūtaḥ syāt/
