GSP29vytrkt3u:4952: nanu sādhyavaikalyādisthale vyabhicārāderapi sāmagrībalena spurasaṇasaṃbhavāt vyabhicārādirapyudbhāvya
GSP29vytrkt3u:4953: iti hetvābhāsatvena vyutpādanaṃ yuktamiti cettadāpyupajīvyatvāddṛṣṭāntadoṣa evetyāha-- kiñciti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:4955: 1.rānta -ga.ṭa.rā. 2.vyabhicā - ga.rā. 3.viruddhaucāvyāptyadhīnatvāt vyāpyatvāsiddhau antarbhū -ṭa. viruddhau ca vyā-rā. 4.ityādi
GSP29vytrkt3u:4958: anupasaṃhāriṇi ca dṛṣṭāntābhāva āvaśyaka iti sopi dṛṣṭāntābhāsentarbhūtaḥ syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4959: kiñca jīvaccharīrajātaṃ sātmakaṃ prāṇādimatvāt ghaṭavadityatra śabdo 'bhidheyaḥ prameyatvāvdyatirekeṇa
GSP29vytrkt3u:4960: ghaṭavadityatra ca krameṇa vyatirekavyāpteranvayavyāpteśca satvena hetudoṣābhāvepi
GSP29vytrkt3u:4961: dhūmānumānepi hṛde dṛṣṭāntite hetudoṣābhāvepi dṛṣṭānto duṣṭa iti taddoṣaḥ pṛthageva /
GSP29vytrkt3u:4965: hṛde dṛṣṭāntitepi yatra dhūmastatrāgniriti pūrvabhāgena vyāpterupadarśitatvācca// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:4970: sapakṣāntare vartamānasya sādhanasya dṛṣṭāntīkṛte“sapakṣe vṛttau hetvābhāvasatvānupapatteśce“ti paddhatyuktamāha -- dhūmeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4977: nanvastvevaṃ sādhyavaikalyāderdṛṣṭāntadoṣatvaṃ tathāpi dṛṣṭāntadoṣo dvividha ityayuktaṃ tasyānekavidhatvādityata āha-- ubhayeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4984: saṃbhavamātreṇa pṛthagvacane anaikāntikakālātītatvaṃ asiddhakālātītatvamityādyapi hetvābhāsāntaraṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:4986: yā tu“sādhyasya sādhanasya vānanugamo dṛṣṭāntavirodha“iti pramāṇalakṣaṇavyākhyāvasare
GSP29vytrkt3u:4987: ṭīkākārīyā“ubhayorveti grāhya“mityuktiḥ sā yathā mano 'nityaṃ mūrtatvātparamāṇuvat
GSP29vytrkt3u:4988: karmavat ityatra krameṇa sādhyavaikalyaṃ sādhanavaikalyaṃ ca doṣaḥ tathā gaganavadityādau
GSP29vytrkt3u:4992: nanvathāpi dṛṣṭāntarūpāśrayāsiddhivyāptyanabhidhanaviparītavyāptyabhidhānādīnāṃ dṛṣṭāntadoṣāṇāṃ kāṃ gatirityata āha-- āśrayahīnatveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:4998: sudha 1 yobhayavaikalyaṃ na pṛthaggaṇanīyamati 2 pramāṇapaddhatyā ca virodhāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5010: tatkimāśrayāsiddhatvaṃ siddhasādhakatvaṃ vā pakṣīkṛtākāreṇāsatvaṃ vā abhāvāśrayatvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:5011: vā 3 asadāśrayatvaṃ vā asadāśrayakatvaṃ vā ādyatrayaṃ tāvannayuktamiti nirākaroti-- na tāvaditi,
GSP29vytrkt3u:5014: 1.dhāyāṃ -ga.ṭa.rā. 2.pramāṇapadaṃ na -ga.ṭa.rā. 3.asadāśrayatvaṃ vā iti nāsti -ṭha. asadāśrayakatvaṃ vā iti na -ḍa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5017: ghaṭavadityādāviva siddhasādhakatvaṃ tatra sandehagarbhitapakṣatvābhāvena pakṣarūpāśrayābhāvāditi yuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5020: nāpi svarṇamayodriragnimānityādāviva pakṣaviśeṣaṇābhāvena pakṣīkṛtākāreṇāsatvaṃ tasya manmate 'pi bādhāntarbhāveṇa 3 doṣatvāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5021: nāpyatyantābhāvaśraya 4 katvam abhāvasya tucchatvena pratibandhakābhāve 5 kāraṇatvasyevābhāve
GSP29vytrkt3u:5036: abhāvapakṣakatve āśrayāsiddhatvaṃ hetoḥ kuta ityata āha -- abhāvasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5050: kathaṃ tarhi pratibandhakābhāvasya kāraṇatvaṃ netyuktaṃ dvitīyaparicchede ityatastasyāsatvādakāraṇatvaṃ na bhavatītyāha -- pratibandhaketi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5052: atyantābhāvoprāmāṇikaḥ aprāmāṇikapratiyogikatvādityuktirayuktā 3 aprāmāṇikapratiyogikatvādityasyatu 4 prāmāṇikātyantābhāvapratiyogī yaḥ tatpratiyogikatvādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5053: tathā cātyantābhāvopāmāṇika iti yatsādhyaṃ tadabhāvena prāmāṇikatvenāprāmāṇikapratiyogikatvāditiheturvyāpta iti kathaṃ na viruddhahetvābhāsa
GSP29vytrkt3u:5058: evaṃ pakṣatraye niraste paśnapūrvaṃ caturthamavaśeṣayati -- kintviti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5059: 1.apipadaṃ na -ga.ṭa. 2.katvapra -ga.rā. 3.aprāmāṇika ityasya prāmāṇikātyantābhāvapratiyogītyarthaḥ - ṭa. 4.sya prā - ḍa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5064: nādyau/ asati tvaduktayoḥ sādhyasādhanadharmānāśrayatvarūpayoḥ sādhyayornirdhamakatvarūpasya sādhanasya cāsaṃbhavena tavāpi bādhādiprasaṅgāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5065: tvaduktadharmāṇāmabhāvarūpatvāttatra saṃbhe 2 ca tata eva maduktāvaktṛtvācetanatvāderapi saṃbhavāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5082: sādhyadharmādyanāśrayatvasya satvāttava na bādhādiḥ 1 tarhi vaktṛtvābhāvā 2 śrayatvābhāve 'pi vaktṛtvā 3 nāśrayatvasya satvānmamāpi na bādhādi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5099: vaktṛtvamapi na cettarhi avaktṛtvaṃ neti kṛtvā bādha iti tvayocyate tatā tadabhāvarūpavaktṛtvamapi netyabādhopi syādityarthaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5104: api ca tvaduktavaktṛtvāvaktṛtvobhayābhāvarūpaṃ sādhyamasatvarūpaṃ sādhanaṃ ca na syāditi tavāpi bādhādi syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5106: vā asatyeva tajjñānahetubhūtajñānaviṣayatvaviśeṣarūpaṃ nirūpakatvaṃ vā yuktam ātītādau
GSP29vytrkt3u:5110: asadāśrayasthale bādhāsiddhyorudbhāvanaṃ svavyāhataṃ cetyāha-- api ca tvaduktamiti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5118: aprāmāṇikatvādikaṃ prati asat āśraya iti nirūpaktavamasti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5121: keṣāñcidāśrayābhāve asatvameva dṛṣṭamiti kathamāśrayābhāve dharmāṇāṃ satvamityataḥ svabhāva evāya dharmāṇāmiti bhāvena sudhoktamevāha-- vicitrā hītyādinā// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5133: kiṃ ca tvanmate bhūtalaghaṭābhāvayorapi saṃbandho na saṃyogādiḥ nāpyūrdhvādharībhāvādiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5137: nanu vandhyāsatu vaktṛtvābhāvarūpasādhyāsaṃbandho na vandhyāsutasatvaṃ vinopapadyata
GSP29vytrkt3u:5139: tatra saṃmbandha iti dṛṣṭāntapūrvamāha -- kiñca tvanmata iti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:5149: yadvā abhāvasvarūpamevetyatra natvityādinoktasādhyadvaye ca hetumāha -- ghaṭasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5156: manmate 'pi bhūtalaghaṭābhāvayoriva vandhyāsutavaktṛtvābhāvayorapi saṃyogādyanyo 'bhāvamātrāśritaḥ saṃbandho nādhikaraṇasatvāpekṣaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5161: nanvevamapi bhavanmate satvāpekṣaḥ syādityata āha-- manmatepīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5164: evaṃ vandhyāsuto na vaktā acetanatvādityatra bādhadoṣaṃ nirasyāsiddhyādi nirāha-- tadvaditi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5171: derasatvāderasadāśritatvasya vā tannirūpyasvabhāvatvarūpasvarūpasambandhasya vā abhāvamātrāśritasya sambandhāntarasya vāsiddhyādiśabdārthatvānnāsiddhyādi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5172: na tṛtīyaḥ/ pratītyaviṣaya iti pratītiviṣayatvavam sakalavyavahārābhājanamiti vyavahāraviṣayatvavacca na vaktetyādipratītiviṣayatvavyavahārabhājanatvayorapi
GSP29vytrkt3u:5175: na cāprāmāṇikerthe vāvadūkatvādapi mūkatvameva varamiti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5181: pratītyaviṣayatvena vidhiniṣedharūpasakalavyavahārābhājanatvādveti pakṣaṃ nirāha-- na tṛtīya iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5183: asatopi sādhyasādhanadharmāśrayatvādikamastītyetat mithyātvaniruktibhaṅge asataḥ pratiyogitvasamarthanavāde ceti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5185: vandhyāsuto na vaktā acetanatvādityādāvasmābhirukte sati tatra pratyuttaraṃ na 2 śakyaṃ syāditibhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5186: satyamevamavaktṛtvasyāprāmāṇikatve mūkatvameva varamiti bhāṣaṇaṃ na caitadaprāmāṇimityāha -- vandhyāsutasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5193: aprāmāṇikamasadāśrayakatvaṃ niṣeddhuṃ 1 prakamya vyāghātodbhāvane 'pratibhayā madhye mūkībhāvādapi ādāveva mūkūbhāvasya varatvena maduktāsadāśrayatvanirāsāsiddheśca//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5195: asanna pramāṇāṅgaṃ aprāmāṇikatvāditi pramāṇā 2 ṅgatvāt na vaktā acetanatvāditi pramāṇāṅgatvasyāpi sambhavāt// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5200: asataḥ sādhanāśrayatvamiti vā sādhyasādhanayorasadāśrayatvaṃ vā aprāmāṇikamiti niṣeddhumupakramya
GSP29vytrkt3u:5202: kṛte sati pratyuttarāparisphūrtirūpāpratibhayā kathāmadhye mūkībhāvādapi kathopakrama
GSP29vytrkt3u:5204: asatoprāmāṇikatvena pramāṇānaṅgatvādvāsadāśrayatvaṃ doṣa iti pakṣaṃ nirāha--
GSP29vytrkt3u:5206: asadāśratvasyādoṣatve 'tiprasaṅgāditi pakṣaṃ nirāha -- na pañcama iti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5210: bādhādihīnasya vandhyāsuto na vaktetyādeḥ saddhetutvena śaśaśraṅgamasti śṛṅgatvāt vandhyāsuto vaktā
GSP29vytrkt3u:5212: sutatvābhāvepi vandhyāsuto na vaktetyādau pakṣīkaraṇaṃ ca vandhyāsutaśabdena tathā pratītimātreṇa yuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5213: nahi vandhyāsutosanniti niṣedhaprayojanaka prasaktyarthaṃ vandhyāsuta ityuktimātreṇa 1 sutatvasya satvaṃ sidhyati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5221: nanu sutatvābhāvādvandhyāsuta iti pakṣīkaraṇāyogātsopyasaddheturevetyata āha -- sutatvābhāvepīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5225: śaśe viṣāṇaṃ nāstītyādāvapi niṣedhyasya tatra satvāpātāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5226: sāmānādhikaraṇyarūpavyāptyabhāvādasadāśrayatvaṃ doṣa iti pakṣaṃ pratyāha -- na ṣaṣṭha iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5227: sādhyasādhanayorvyāptyabhāve āśrayasyāsatvaṃ na prayojakaṃ vyatirekatonvayataśca vyabhicārāt/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5233: kiñca asadāśrayasya sādhakatvaṃ netyapi kenacilliṅgena sādhanīyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5235: asadāśrayo heturna sādhyasādhakaṃ evaṃ 1 tvādityasadāśrayo heturvā ubhayathāpi saheturasadāśraya eva/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5238: tadabhāve 'sadāśrayayorapi vyāptiravadhārayituṃ śakyata evetiti vyāptyabhāvosiddha ityāha-- asadāśrayatvepītyādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5244: nirasyante“etena kalpitāḥ pakṣāḥ samastā api nirastā“iti bhaktipādīyasudhāvākyamatra
GSP29vytrkt3u:5246: asadāśrayasya sādhakatve netyapi vyāptiṃ vinā kathaṃ nivāryata“iti pramāṇalakṣaṇataṭṭīkayoruktaṃ vivṛṇvānaḥ asadāśrayasādhyasādhanayorvyāptyabhāve bādhakaṃ cāha - kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5247: nanu hetupakṣakaprayoge prāguktahetoḥ kathamasadāśrayatvaṃ yenobhayathāpi heturasadāśraya eveti syādityata āha-- asatīti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5250: tacca liṅgaṃ vyāptyabhāve 'sādhakatvasādhakaṃ na syāditi kathamasadāśrayadharmayorvyāptyabhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5254: tasmāddoṣāntarāsaṅkīrṇodāharaṇābhāvā 1 nniṣedhaṃ prati pakṣatvasya ca pratītimātreṇopapatteḥ nāśrayāsiddhirdeṣa iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5259: tathā cāsanniṣṭhatvena prayuktācetanatvādi 2 rūpadharmopyasati nāstyeveti tatpakṣakopyasadāśraya eveti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5272: evaṃ sādhyāprasiddhirapi na doṣaḥ tathā hi -- tasyā doṣatvaṃ kimatiprasaṅgāt,
GSP29vytrkt3u:5286: bhūḥ śaśaviṣāṇollikhiteti pratijñāvākye śaśaviṣāṇapadārtho na jñātaḥ aprasiddhatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5287: tathā ca tasya tatra śaktigrahāsaṃbhavena 2 tatpadārthasmṛterayogāt pratijñāvākyasya tadanvayābodhakatvaprasaṅgādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5288: sudhānuktaṃ koṭhyantaraṃ tārkikarītimanusṛtya tārkikarītimanusṛtya svayaṃ pakṣāntaraṃ vikalpayati -- kāraṇasyeti/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5293: nādyaḥ / asādhutvena saṃmatasya vimataṃ sadasadvilakṣaṇaṃ bādhyatvādityādeḥ kḷptena
GSP29vytrkt3u:5294: vyāghātādinā doṣāntareṇaiva iyaṃ bhūḥ śaśaśṛṅgavatī etadbhūtvādityāderyogyaśṛṅgasādhakatve
GSP29vytrkt3u:5303: evamasannetyuktyā“dvau nañau prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ gamayata iti satvaṃ labdham/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5306: nanu vyāghātādereva doṣatvamupetya tatra sādhyāprasiddhirdeṣa ityevopeyatāmityata uktam -- kḷpteneti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5308: śṛṅgavatītyatra śṛṅgaśabdena mahatvasamānādhikaraṇodbhūtarūpavān śirassaṃyukto 'vayavaviśeṣobhipre 2 yato 'tha kaścidatīndriyaḥ/ ādya āha --
GSP29vytrkt3u:5318: siddhasādhanādinā ca doṣāntareṇaiva duṣṭatvāt doṣāntararahitatvena saṃmatasya tu jīvaccharīrajātaṃ sātmakaṃ prāṇādimatvādityādeḥ sādhutvātadiprasaṅgābhāvāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5321: vahnerapi mahānasādyasambaddhasya vastugatyā apūrvasyaiva vahnitvena 2 bhaumavahnitvena ca prakāreṇa siddheśca//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5322: nanu -- pakṣadharmatābalalabhyādanyasyāprasiddhasya siddhirna sādhyasya pakṣasaṃbandhādikaṃ tu pakṣadharmatābalalabhyam sārvajñyamapi tathā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5329: sambandhasyāprasiddhasya siddhāvapi na vahneḥ sādhyabhūtasyāprasiddhsaya siddhiriti vadantaṃ pratyāha-- vahnerapīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5330: aprasiddhasādhyakatvamātraṃ na doṣo yenoktātiprasaṅgaḥ syāditi śaṅkate -- nanviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5331: kṣityādikaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvādityatra sārvajñyaṃ kathaṃ pakṣadharmatābalalabhyamityato vyanakti -- vdyaṇukādīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5332: tādṛśapakṣadharmatvaṃ kāryahetoḥ kartuḥ sārvajñyaṃ vinā na yuktamitīti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5336: atha vyāptibalalabhyasya sādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnasyāprasiddhasyā 1 siddhirna kartraikyaṃ tu na vyāptibalalabhyaṃ lāghatarkānugrahalalabhyatvāditi
GSP29vytrkt3u:5348: tathāca tasya doṣatvamupetya sāmānyaprasiddhyarthaṃ nakleśo 'nubhoktavya ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5356: yatsādhyaṃ tadabhāvarūpasya bhāvasyaiva 1 vyāptigrahaḥ tatra cābhāvarūpasādhyātmakapratiyogijñānaṃ nāpekṣitamiti vyāptigrahasaṃbhavāt
GSP29vytrkt3u:5359: sātmakamityatrāpi nirātmakatvābhāva eva sādhya iti suvacatvācca//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5361: pradhānopādanakaṃ veti vipratipattau satyāṃ tadanusāreṇa vimataṃ paramāṇūpādānakaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:5367: nanu tatra pareṇa sādhyāprasiddhāvudbhāvitāyāṃ naiyāyikena vdyaṇukasyāpratyakṣatve
GSP29vytrkt3u:5368: 'pi tryaṇukaṃ sopādānakaṃ kāryadravyatvāditi vdyaṇukaṃ prasādhya vdyaṇukaṃ sopādānakaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:5372: 1.vyatirekagrahaḥ-ka. 2.tvayāpyayaṃ ityādiretāvāngranthaḥ nāsti- ga.ṭa.rā. 3.athetyādina vadataḥ śaṅkāsya -ityārabhya etāvānpranthaḥ nāsti-ṭa.ṭha.ḍa. 4.ṭhāviva -ḍa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5374: -tvānyatarāpādikā tryaṇukopādānatvena vdyaṇukaṃ prasādhya tadupādanatvena paramāṇuḥ sādhyata iti kliṣṭakalpanaivāśrayaṇīyetyatra heturasti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5380: paramāṇūpādānakaṃ pradhānopādānakaṃ veti vipratipattau paramāṇūpādānakatvarūpeṇa sādhyaprasiddhisaṃpādanasyaivānuguṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ --
GSP29vytrkt3u:5386: ityanuvyākhyānasudhoktaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā pariśeṣa ityupalakṣaṇaṃ matvāha-- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5392: api ca yathātmāśrayānyonyāśrayacakrakānavasthāvyāghātādyāpādakeṣu tarkeṣvaprasiddhasyaivātmāśrayāderāpādanaṃ tathāpasiddhasya sādhanamapi kiṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5394: na cāprasiddhamāpādyaṃ na tu sādhyamityatra heturasti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5395: kiñca manmate tarkopyanumānaṃ tvanmatetvananumānarūpopi tarko vyāptisāpekṣa iti kathamanumānaṃ prasiddhisāpekṣaṃ tarkastu tannirapekṣa iti vyavasthā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5396: api cāprasiddhasyā 1 pi siddhau śaśaśṛṅgādikamapi sidhyediti tvāyā'pādyamānāsyāpyatiprasaṅgasyāprasiddhatvātkathamāpādānamiti dik// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5397: guṇaguṇyādau tu nīlo ghaṭaḥ śuklaḥ paṭa ityasti sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayogaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:5398: sa ca tayorbhedābhedau vinā nopapadyata iti tadanyathānupapattirūpārthāpatyetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5404: nanvaprasiddhamapyāpādayituṃ śakyate na tu sādhayitumiti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5412: na tṛtīyaḥ/ ukteṣu paramāṇūpādanakatvādisādhakeṣvanumāneṣvarthāpattisthale ātmāśrayādyāpādatarkarūpānumāneṣu ca sādhyāprasiddhāvapi vyāpteḥ
GSP29vytrkt3u:5417: tāvanmātreṇa tatprasiddhyā 1 pattau pramāṇenaiva prasiddhyā bhāvyamiti nirbandhā 2 pātāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5418: naiyāyikasyāpi kāraṇādādyupadeśena vā svārthānumānena vā paramāṇvādyavagatisaṃbhavena
GSP29vytrkt3u:5423: vyāptivighaṭanādvādoṣatvamiti pakṣaṃ nirāha-- na tṛtīya iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5437: nanu vyatirekiṇyaprasiddhena sādhyena sādhanasya kathamanvayavyāptiriti ce 1 nna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5440: kiñca manmate sādhyaṃ vinā sādhanasyānupapattireva vyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5443: nanu bhūritarabhinnetyādau trayodaśānyonyābhāvānāṃ viśakalitatayā prasiddhatvenaikabuddhyupārūḍhānāṃ teṣāṃ vyatirekavyāptinirūpaṇaṃ suśakam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5449: sādhyāprasiddhau tatsāmānādhikaraṇyasya hetau kvāpyagraheṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyaghaṭitānvayavyāpterasambhavāditi śaṅkate -- nanviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5452: na hi parāṅgaṃ dagdhamiti svāṅgadāhaḥ śāmyadītyataḥ na kevalaṃ pratibandī upapattiścāsmatpakṣe 'stītyāha -- kiñciti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5456: tathāpi na tāvadaprasiddhena sādhyena sādhanasyānanvaya eveti yuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5464: abhedasādhakānumāna ivānumityādinā pakṣasyāpi svaśarīrasya niścitasādhyakatayā dṛṣṭāntatvasyāpi sambhavāt// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5468: tathātve nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāditivat viruddhahetvābhāsaḥ syādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5469: nanvastu sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tanniyamarūpavyāptistu sādhyāprasiddhisthale kathamityata āha -- sādhyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5470: tathā ca sādhyāprasiddhisthale tannirūpitavyāptijñapterabhāvepa'pi niyatasāmānādhikaraṇyarūpavyāpterapratibandhāvdyāptivighaṭanātsādhyāprasiddhirdeṣa iti na yuktamiti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5480: na ca 1 pakṣasya pakṣaikadeśasya vā dṛṣṭāntatve sapakṣatvena 2 vyatirekitvabhaṅgaprasaṅgo vyatirekavādinastaveva tadabhāvavādino mamāpyaniṣṭaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5481: nanu svena gṛhītāpi vyāptiḥ śarīramātre vipratipannaṃ prati kathaṃ darśanīyeti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5485: prāṇādimatvaṃ sātmakatvena vyāptaṃ tadabhāvavyāpakābhāvapratiyogi tattena vyāptaṃ yathā dhūmo vahnineti vyatirekavyāptyā 4 viśeṣyānvayavyāptisādhanasya
GSP29vytrkt3u:5487: nanu prāgvyatirekibhaṅge pakṣaikadeśasya dṛṣṭāntatve vyatirekitvabhaṅgo bhavaddhirevāpāditaḥ sa doṣastarhi syādityāśaṅkyā nirāha-- na ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5488: svārthānumādoṣatvā 5 sambhavepi parārthaprayoge doṣa iti śaṅkate -- nanviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5495: yathā vā dṛṣṭāntānuktāvapi dhūmo vahnivyāpya iti āptavākyena vyāptiḥ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:5497: etena sādhyarūpratiyogyajñānāttadabhāva 1 rūpajñānaṃ na yuktamiti sādhyābhāvasya sādhanābhāvena vyāptijñānaṃ na saṃbhavatīti nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5499: tato 'nyatra sarvatrāpi tadabhāvaṃ ca paśyato vādinaḥ prativādinopi vādivākyāvagatapratiyoginastadabhāvagrahasaṃbhavena
GSP29vytrkt3u:5501: na ca pramāṇenaiva pratiyogī jñātavya iti nayamosti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5505: nanu pramāṇena pratiyogino 'navagatau kvacitsatvābhāvātkathaṃ tanniṣedha ityata āha-- na hyasata iti/ satve sati
GSP29vytrkt3u:5510: kiṃ caivaṃ sati tattadvādināṃ parābhimatasaptama 1 padārthapradhānaparamāṇvādiniṣedho na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5511: na ca tatrāpi pradhānādikaṃ neti na niṣedhaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5512: kiṃ tu jagadupādānaṃ paramāṇvā 2 dikaṃ netyevaṃ 3 tathāca khaṇḍaśaḥ pramitarastīti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5513: pararītyāprasaktasya svarūpeṇaiva niṣedhasaṃbhave svābhimatasya niṣedhapratiyogipramāṇikatvasya nirvāhāyānānubhāvikakḷṣṭakalpane 'nyonyāśrayāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5515: na saptamostīti saptamapadārthasya sāṅkyābhimatapradhānasya ca niṣedho naiyāyikasya na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5525: jagadupādānamiti paramāṇutvenopādāna 8 mabhipratemuta sāṃkhyābhimatapradhānatvenāthobhayānugatopādānatvarūpasāmānyadharmeṇopādanamātramiti vikalpān krameṇa nirāha-- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5536: paramāṇurhi tvanmate prāmāṇikaḥ pradhānamapramāṇikaṃ na hi śaśaviśaṣāṇayorviṣāṇatvasāmānyamiva prāmāṇikāprāmāṇikaparamāṇupradhānarūpobhayagatamupādānatva 2 sāmānyamasti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5541: sādhyasyāprasiddhau tannirūpitānvavyapterapyaprasiddhyā tayā saha liṅgabhūtavyatirekavyāptervyāptigrahāsaṃbhavādityāśaṅkāmanūdya nirāha -- eteneti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5548: yadyadabhāvavyāpakābhāvapratiyogi tattena vyāptaṃ yathā dhūmognineti sāmānyavyāpteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5553: śrayatve bādhakopapannatve sati guṇaḥ sa tadanyāśritaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:5554: yadya 3 dasādhāraṇadharmavat tatto bhidyata iti sāmānyavyāptirvā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5555: kaṇādopadeśādinā śabde gagane ca sādhyasādhane upalabdavataḥ“tadanyatra sarvatra
GSP29vytrkt3u:5556: tadabhāvaṃ ca paśyata“ityādi pūrvoktarītyā vyatirekavyāptyā 4 viśiṣyānvayavyāptirvā
GSP29vytrkt3u:5558: vyatirekyantareṣvapi sudhoktaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā prāguktarītyānvayavyāptiṃ tredhopapādayati -- evamityādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5559: yattu maṇyāditārkikagranthe vyatirekyanugrahārthaṃ sāmānyaprasiddhisaṃpādakaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānaṃ niyamiti tatkathanaṃ tadāśaṅkya nirāha--
GSP29vytrkt3u:5562: nacā 1 trāpi śabdaḥ kvacidāśrito guṇatvādityanumānena sādhyaṃ sāmānyataḥ prasiddhamiti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5568: na cādṛṣṭadravyātiriktadravyāśritatvaprakārikā pratītirvyatirekisādhyā sā ca na sāmānyato dṛṣṭena 3 sidhyati tataḥ prāga 4 nupasthiteriti śaṅkyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5576: kāryatvādyanumānaṃ lāghavatarkānugṛhītaṃ sat kartraikyamapi gṛhṇāti na cetkartṛmātraṃ gṛhṇāti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5577: saṃskārādisahakṛtaṃ cakṣurādi tattāmapi gṛhṇāti na cedidantāmevetyevaṃ darśanādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5578: vyāptibalācca sāmānyasyaiva viśeṣe paryavasānaṃ nyāyyamityāha-- sāmānyasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5580: 1. ca tatrāpi ka. ṭa.rā. 2.jñānetyadhikam ga.rā. 3.nanasi- ga.ṭa.rā. 4.guktarūpasya prakārasyā,
GSP29vytrkt3u:5586: nanu tathāpi kathañcitsādhyaprasiddhirāvaśyakīti tvayāpi svīkṛtatvatkathaṃ tadāvaśyakatvanirāsa iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5587: mama hi parābhipretāyāḥ pakṣādanyatra sādhyatāvacchedakāvacchinnatvena prakāreṇa prativādinaṃ prati sādhyaprasiddherāvaśyakataiva nirasyā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5591: ṭīkākārīyā pareṇa vyatirekiṇi sāmānyenānvayavyāptyādike śaṅkite taṃ prati kliṣṭakalpanatvoktistu vyatirekavādinastavānvayavyāptyuktiḥ - @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5598: pūrvayatredhā vyāptyupapādanaṃ vyatirekiṇi kṛtaṃ tatra bhaktipādīyasudhāvākyavirodhamāśaṅkya tadabhiprāyoktyā nirāha -- ṭīkākārīyetyādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5607: niyatasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptiriti pakṣe 'pi sāmānyato 'nvayavyāptirvā vyatirekavyāptyanumitā viśiṣṭānvayavyāptirvā uktarītyāstyevetyarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5609: uktarītyā svena jñātasya sātmakamityādiśabdārthasya vādināpi prativādinaṃ prati samavāyāntyaviśeṣādiśabdārthasyeva vyutpādane 'viditapadārthakatvābhāvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5617: asti nāstīti vivādarūpakāryeṇaiva tajjñānaṃ vādiprativādinoḥ siddhamiti kathamavidipadārthakatvaṃ pratijñāvākyasyeti bhāvenāha -- tadarthājñāna
GSP29vytrkt3u:5618: kāraṇasya viśeṣaṇajñānasyābhāve kāryasya viśiṣṭajñānasyāyogādvā sādhyāsiddherdeṣatvamiti pakṣaṃ nirāha -- na pañcama iti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5629: nanvevama“nirvacanīyāsiddheraprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣaḥ“iti prakaraṇādau tatratatrāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvasya doṣatvenodbhāvanaṃ virudhyata iti
GSP29vytrkt3u:5630: tasya paramatānusāritvasya tatra ṭīkāyāmeva vyaktatvāditi bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5643: nādyaḥ/ nitya ātmā kākasya kārṣṇyādityādervyāptyabhāvenaiva duṣcatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5644: śabdo nityaḥ ghaṭasya kṛtakatvādityatra tu śabdasya kṛtakatvaṃ svīkṛtaṃ cedghaṭasyetyasya vaiyarthyāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5645: asvīkṛtya ghaṭagatenaiva kṛkatvena śabdānityatvasādhane tu yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatrānityatvamiti
GSP29vytrkt3u:5647: iti bhaktipādīyānuvyākhyānasudhoktarītyā vikalpān doṣāṃśca vyanakti-- kimityādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5651: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatrānityatvamiti vyāptisatvena vyāptyabhāvena tatra duṣṭatāyā vaktumaśakyatve 'pi prakārāntareṇa duṣṭatvaṃ tatreti viśeṣa 4 dyotakastu śabdaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5655: yanna bhavati tena samaṃ tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vyāptiriti maṇyuktasāmānyalakṣaṇapakṣe
GSP29vytrkt3u:5661: kiñca satyāṃ vyaptau 1 vyadhikaraṇatvasya doṣatva evātiprasaṅgaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5670: nanvatrāpyayaṃ kālaḥ sūryodayavān padmavikāsavatkālatvātsammatavat ayaṃ pradeśaḥ
GSP29vytrkt3u:5671: kulālāsattimān bhramaccakrādikaraṇatvāt sammatavat iyaṃ nadīvṛṣṭimadūrdhvadeśe ayaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:5672: dhūmo mūle 4 gnimān dhūma 5 vatvāt sammatavaditi kālaṃ deśādikaṃ vā pakṣīkṛtya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ saṃpādyamiti cet // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5678: kālaṃ deśaṃ vā'dāya sarvatra sāmānādhikaraṇyamāśaṅkate -- nanviti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5684: nādyaḥ/ tvaduktakusṛṣṭimajānatāmapi laukikānāṃ padmādau vikāsādidarśanenaiva sūryodayādau svārthānumiteḥ tadanusāriparārthānumiteśca darśanāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5691: dṛśyate hyadtanasya sūryodayasya śvastanena sūryodayena gamyagamakabhāva iti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5692: lokarītyerevaṃrūpatveṣa'pi bhavadbhiriva mayāpi lokarītyanurodhenaiva paribhāṣā kāryeti kuta ityata āha-- parīkṣakaiśceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5702: dhūmavatvāt vimataḥ kālo deśo vā agnimatparvatasaṃbaddhaḥ dhūmavatparvatasaṃbaddhatvāt
GSP29vytrkt3u:5704: kiṃ caivaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyasya sarvatra susaṃpādatvena vyadhikaraṇāsiddhirniravakāśā syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5708: sāmānādhikaraṇyaniyame siddhe sati tannirvāhāya prayogavipariṇāmakalpanā siddhe coktadiśā prayogavipariṇāme sāmānādhikaraṇyaniyamasiddhirityanyonyāśrayādityarthaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5711: sāmānādhikaraṇyasya suvacatvena vyadhikaraṇāsiddherudāharaṇaṃ na kimapi labhyeteti /
GSP29vytrkt3u:5720: rohiṇyudaya āsannaḥ kṛttikāya uditatvāt ityuktāvapi śrotṛṇāmanumityutpatteḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5722: vyadhikaraṇeṣva 1 pyanyathānupapanneṣu samānādhikaraṇeṣvapyanyathopapanneṣvaliṅgatvasya ca darśanena pakṣadhmatāyā anāvaśyakatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5725: tathā ca puruṣasya payoktṛḥ parābhavepi tatra jāmānānumitiḥ pramārūpaiva syāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5726: nanūktidoṣasthale vacanadvārār'thasyāpi duṣṭatvameva tādṛśasthale 'numite 3 ścānudayādityata āha -- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5727: pakṣadharmatāvighaṭanādveti pakṣaṃ nirāha-- na dvitīya iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5742: ata eva vaiśeṣikairapi asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃbandhyekārthasamavāyi virodhi ceti
GSP29vytrkt3u:5744: pṛthagukte tvanmate patatpatitayoravayavāpacayādinā bhede 'pi patanniṣṭha 1 patanena
GSP29vytrkt3u:5751: viśiṣṭamedhonnatyādervṛṣṭyādyādyaṃ dhūmādervahnyādi dvitīyaṃ saṃyogāddṛṣṭavyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ sarasāderūpādi caturthaṃ dhvaṃsādeḥ pratiyogyādi pañcamamiti
GSP29vytrkt3u:5757: avayavāpacayasthale ca pīlupākaprakriyā āparamāṇu nāśena punardravyotpatteraṅgīkārātpatataḥ
GSP29vytrkt3u:5758: phalasyeva patitatvadaśāyāmanyatvāttatra ca patitaṃ 2 phalamidaṃ gurutva 3 vat patanakriyāvatvātsammatavadityanumānadarśanāt
GSP29vytrkt3u:5762: madiṣṭasādhanatvāt madbhojanavat ityatra siddhapākaniṣṭhatayā jñātena hetunāsiddhapākarūpapakṣaniṣṭhatayā sādhyapramiteruktavācca//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5763: kiñca tvanmate pramātvameva 1 vā niṣkarṣajñānatvameva vā 2 prameyatvaṃ evaṃ kṛtitvecchātvadveṣatvādikameva
GSP29vytrkt3u:5764: kāryatveṣṭatvadviṣṭatvādikaṃ tathā ca śabdobhidheyaḥ prameyatvādityādau kathaṃ pakṣadharmatā /
GSP29vytrkt3u:5771: ato na pakṣadharmatāvighaṭakatvena doṣatvaṃ vyadhikaraṇāsiddheriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5772: sthalāntarepi vyadhikaraṇasya gamakatvaṃ paramate darśayati-- kiṃ ca tvanmata iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5775: astu kiṃ tata ityata āha - tathā ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5783: śabdasya pramāyāḥ svarūpasaṃbandhaḥ pramayā pramātvasya samavāya iti paramparetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5785: lohitaḥsphaṭika“ityādāviva paramparāsaṃbandhenāpi taddharmatvaṃ kalpyaṃ na hi tathā dhīrityāha -- śabda iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5793: na ca pramājātīyaviṣayatvaṃ vā īśvarapramāviṣayatvaṃ vā prameyatvaṃ tacca śabde 'stīti vācyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5796: kiñca vyatirakevyāptiḥ sākṣādaṅgamiti tvanmate vyāptipakṣadharmatayorvaiyadhikaraṇyepi gamatvavat sādhyasādhanayorapi vayaidhikaraṇye 'pi gamyagamakatāstu/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5798: api ca dhūmajātīyasya vahnijātīyaṃ prativyāpyatvātparvatīyo dhūmo mahānasīvayavahniṃ pratyapi vyāpya ititvanmate kathaṃ vyāpyavyāpakayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5800: pratibandyāpi vaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ na doṣāyetyā 1 ha-- kiñca vyatireketi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5808: vyāptivighaṭanādvā doṣatvamiti pakṣaṃ nirāha -- na tṛtīya iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5826: evaṃ nirdeśo pañcatvaparigaṇane ca mūlamāha-- taduktamiti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5829: sādhyasamapadena cāsiddhiḥ atī kālapadena bādha ityuktārthasaṃvāditvaṃ dhyeyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5830: maṇyādyuktadiśā teṣāṃ lakṣaṇānyanuvadati-- tatra teṣumadhya ityādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5832: tadubhayopasthitijanakaṃ yadrūpaṃ sādhāraṇe sapakṣavipakṣavṛttitvena sādhyatadabhāvasāhacaryaṃ asādhāraṇe tadubhayavyāvṛttatvaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:5833: anupasaṃhāriṇi ca tadubhayaśūnyatvena pakṣa eva sādhyatadabhāvasāhacaryamityagre vyaktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5839: anyathā sarvasamabhidheyaṃ vsatutvādityādau kevalānvayisādhyakānupasaṃhāriṇi sādhyābhāvakoṭeraprasiddhera 2 vyāptiḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt3u:5841: kevalānvayisādhyake idamabhidheyaṃ na vetyevaṃ sandehā 3 yoge 'pi abhidheyatvaṃ pakṣavṛttina vetyevaṃ saṃśayasaṃbhavāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5842: vyāptiniścayavirodhisaṃśayaśca sādhyatadabhāvasaṃśayaḥ sādhye pakṣavṛttitvasaṃśayaśca bhavatīti kathanaṃ tattu maṇivākyaviruddham/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5845: vatvaṃ savyabhicāratvaṃ vipratipattivākye satpratipakṣe ca dvayoḥ koṭidvayopasthāpa'katvepi @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5854: śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāditi satpratipakṣe cātivyāptirevetyata
GSP29vytrkt3u:5856: vipratipattistu pratyekaṃ na tatheti pūrvapakṣa 3 maṇyukteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5857: tathāsādhāraṇagranthe satpratikṣeddhau atra tveka eveti cokteriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5858: yadyapi vimataṃ mithyā dṛśyatvāt śuktirajatavat vimataṃ satyaṃ dṛśyatvādbrahmavadityādiprakaraṇasamepyekasyaivobhayopasthāpakatvamasti,
GSP29vytrkt3u:5868: mātrapadena sapakṣavṛttitvaṃ vyāvartyete na tu pakṣavṛttitvamapi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5871: vṛkṣaḥ saṃyogavān dravyatvādityatra dravyatvahetoḥ sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitve 'pi niścitasaṃyogarūpasādhyavalatyapi vṛtterna tatrātivyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5873: yattu maṇau sādhyavyāpakābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ vā vṛttimataḥ sādhyavadavṛttitvaṃ vā viruddhatvamityādi/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5876: niścitasādhyavadavṛttitve sati tadabhāvavadvṛttitvasya cāvyabhicaritasahacārarūpavyāptyabhāvarūpatayā tajjñānas vyāptijñānapratibandhadvārānumitipratibandhya sambhavāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5893: pakṣadharmatāpramitiḥ siddhiḥ tadrahitosiddha iti prācāṃ rītimāśritya lakṣaṇaṭīkoktaṃ niṣkṛṣyāha -- parāmarśeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5895: yattu maṇau parāmarśaviṣayābhāvo nāsiddhaḥ vyarthaviśaṣaṇatvāt kiṃ tu āśrayāsiddhiḥ svarūpāsiddhiḥ vyāpyatvāsiddhiriti pratyekameva doṣa ityuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5917: 1 tanna śabdo nityo meyatvāditi sādhāraṇasya sarvamanityaṃ prameyatvādityanupasaṃhāriṇaśca sādhyatadabhāvasāhacaryaṃ koṭidvayopasthāpakaṃ rūpam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5918: iyāṃstu bhedaḥ sādhāraṇasya pakṣādanyatra tatsāhacaryaṃ anupasaṃhāriṇastu pakṣa eveti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5919: anityaḥ śabdaḥ śabdatvāditya 2 sādhāraṇasya tu sādhyavataḥ tadabhāvavataśca vyāvṛttatvaṃ tadupasthāpakamiti savyabhicāralakṣaṇasya 3 nātivyāptiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5922: yathā sarvamanityaṃ meyatvādityādiprācīnamatāvaṣṭambhena paddhatyādyuktadiśā'ha -- bhedo draṣṭavya iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5924: granthagauravabhayāt prakṛte vakṣyamāṇāntarbhāvānuprayogācca nāsmābhirapi likhyate savyabhicārādilakṣaṇaṃ sādhāraṇāditraye 'siddhitraye ca vyanakti - tatra śabda ityādinā// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5948: tvaduktarītyā pāñcavidhyasambhavepi tena rūpeṇa jñātānāṃ teṣāmanumityapratibandhakatayā
GSP29vytrkt3u:5953: 1.rā kathamapi bodhonumiti -ka. rātatrāpyanu - ṭa. 2.yapramātvena -ga.ṭa.rā. 3. viṣayeti nāsti -ka.ṭa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5956: tadasat yadrūpeṇa hi jñānamanumitipratibandhakaṃ tadrūpeṇaiva doṣaḥ paraṃ pratyudbhāvanīyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5958: yadrūpeṇa ca tatsādhanaṃ tadrūpeṇaiva hetvābhāsādidoṣo vibhajanīyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5971: anyajñānaṃ pratibandhakamanyadudbhāvyaṃ tatonyadasādhakatāsādhākaṃ tadanyasya vibhāga iti vairūpyāpātādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:5975: nanvasādhakatāyāmanupayoginopi sambhavamātreṇa vibhagasyoktau ko doṣa ityata āha -- saṃbhavatopīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5977: tathā ca teṣāmapi parigaṇanāpātena pañcaivetyuktirayukteti bhāvaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5981: na tu bādhatvādinā bādhitatvātprati 2 ruddhatvādityasya hi prabalasamabalapramāṇaviruddhatvādityarthaḥ/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:5983: astvevaṃ yena rūpeṇa jñānamityādinoktaṃ prakṛte kiyityataḥ
GSP29vytrkt3u:5987: kuta ityataḥ 3 vahniranuṣṇaḥ padārthatvādityādau vādinokte prativādinā padārthatvāditi hetuḥ asādhakaḥ
GSP29vytrkt3u:5988: bādhitatvātsatpratipakṣatvādityucyate sati vādinā vyarthaviśeṣaṇatvadūṣaṇaṃ vaktumāpādyata ityāha -- bādhitatvā 4 pratiruddhatvādityasya hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:5990: yadvākye prativādyuktadūṣaṇāvagatiḥ sa nigṛhīta iti samayabandhena kathāpravṛttau
GSP29vytrkt3u:6005: na ca bādhapratirodhayoranyamasaṅkarārthaṃ tadupādānam dūṣakatābījaikyena saṅkarasyaivocitatvāt - @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6006: tasya dūṣaṇasya liṅgatvajñānam pratibandhakatvavadanenāpi tvasambhava ityabhiprāyeṇa vāsādhakatāsādhanamiti maṇāvevoktatvāditi bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6007: durbalapramāṇavirodhasya akiñcitkaratvenāsādhakatvāsādhakatayā tadvyāvṛttaye prabaletyādyarthavadityata āha -- dūrbalasyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6008: durbalaṃ hi hīnabalatvādevāpramāṇatvena nirṇītamiti pramāṇapadaprayoga eva tatra na yukta iti tena tadvyāvṛttirityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6009: nanu kathaṃ tarhi satpratipakṣasthale vastuto hīnabale samabalatayābhimanyāne pramāṇapadaprayoga ityata āha-- pramāṇeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6015: tathā caikamevedaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ syāditi pañceti vibhāgabhaṅga iti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6026: nanu sambhavamātreṇa tathā prayoge ko doṣa ityata āha-- vyāvartyeti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6035: aśaktijñāpanamātreṇa parāpajayasya svajayasya ca saṃbhavena tanmātrasyaivoddeśyenātiśayi 2 tāśaktijñāpanasyānuddeśyatayā tādarthyena sārthakyoktirayuktā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6037: atiśayenāśaktijñāpanasya lābhe kutaḥ parityājya ityata āha-- bādhājñāneti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6038: nanu prabalamapi na jānāmi kimu samabalamityastu kaścitatiśaya iti manvānaṃ pratyāha -- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6043: bhāvenedaṃ prayuktamityapi suvacatvātparasya śaktyatiśaya eva kiṃ na sidhyet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6045: kiñca bādhepi pramāṇapadenaiva prabala 1 tvepi labdhe prabalapadaṃ 2 vyartham/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6056: prabalapadaṃ vyarthamityeva na kintu viruddhārthakatvācca nopadeyamasādhakatvānumāna 4 mityāha -- kiñca bādhepīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6059: nanu samabalavyāvṛtyarthakasya na hānikaratvena viparītaphalatvaṃ bādhasya svapakṣasthāpanāparapakṣapratikṣepalakṣaṇādviruddhirūpatvāt
GSP29vytrkt3u:6065: bandha evoddeśya iti yāvatāpratibandhasiddhistāvadeva vaktavyam/ na tvanyat//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6066: kiñcaivaṃ parasyātitarāmaśaktijñāpanāya bahutvopajīvyatvaniravakāśatvaiḥ prabalapramāṇaviruddhatvāditi bādhitatve sati savyabhicāritvādityādyapi
GSP29vytrkt3u:6068: vāde vādaprakriyayā pravṛtte śāstre cātiheyatvavyutpādanāya bahudoṣoktiryuktā /
GSP29vytrkt3u:6072: nanu kathaṃ tarhi vādakathāyāṃ śāstre cānekadoṣaḥ paroktānumāneṣu pradarśyate tatrāpyādhikyanigrahasthānāpattirityata āha
GSP29vytrkt3u:6075: yāvatsphurati dvayaṃ trayaṃ tato 'dhikaṃ vā tāvatsarvaṃ vācyamiti samayabandhe sati tadanuktau doṣābhāvādityatāha -- samayabandhaṃ vineti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6083: virodhijñānadvayasannipāte ekatra pramātvaniścayasya karaṇaprābalyaniścayaṃ vināpyupapatyā'vaśyakasya prabalapramāṇavirodhasyaiva doṣatvaucityācca//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6084: kiñca pratirodhe kḷptatvena bādhopi karaṇavirodhasyaiva doṣatvaṃ yuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6085: kiṃ ca pratirodha iva bādhe 'pi āvaśyakenāhīnabalatvenaiva pratibandhasaṃbhave kiṃ pramātvaviśeṣaṇena/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6088: tathā ca prabalapramāṇavirodha eva bādho vācyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6094: pratirodhe satpratipakṣe evamapi 2 vaiyarthyamevāsmin pakṣe prabhavatyevetyāha -- kiñca pratirodha
GSP29vytrkt3u:6095: iveti// pratirodhepi samabaletya ya vyarthatvādinā 3 balatvena viśeṣaṇa viśeṣaṇatya prāgupapādānāt pratirodha ivetyuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6098: ahīnabalapramāṇavirodhatvena vā ahīnabalasādhakavirodhatvena vā ahīnabalāvagatasādhyābhāvavatpakṣakatvena vā pratibandhasaṃbhava ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6101: kiñcaivaṃ vahniḥ śītaḥ kṛtakatvādityatra vahniruṣṇa iti pramābādho na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6107: vā bādha ityapi nirvaktuṃ śakyatvādbādho nānā syāt /
GSP29vytrkt3u:6109: pramitasādhyābhāvavatpakṣakatvaṃ bādha iti lakṣaṇe 'vyāptiṃ cāha-- kiñcaivamati//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6116: tathā ca pratipakṣopyevameveti bādhapratipakṣayorekadūṣaṇatvameva praptamiti pañceti vibhāgabhaṅga iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6135: nanūktarūpāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ madhye dvayaṃ liṅgarūpam ekaṃ tu liṅgibhūtam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6136: tatra tābhyāṃ liṅgābhyāmanumitimekaṃ bādhatvena dūṣaṇamastviti cet kiṃ liṅgaṃ kiṃ liṅgīti nirdhārakapramāṇābhāvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6139: sarvaṃ veti pakṣe hetvabhāsādhikyamiti pañcamyodhikahetvābhāsagaṇanāpāta ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6147: pratyakṣaśabdābhyāṃ śabdasya ca samabalābhyāṃ śabdapratyakṣābhyāṃ pratirodhe 'vyāpteḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6149: tasmādbādhapratirodhayoḥ pratijñārthapramāṇavirodhatvenaiva doṣatvaṃ na tu prabalapramāṇavirodhatvādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6150: ata eva bhagavatpādaiḥ pramāṇalakṣaṇe pramāṇaviruddhārthapratijñā pratijñāvirodha iti
GSP29vytrkt3u:6152: doṣatvamuktvā asiddhiravyāptiriti hetuvirodhaḥ sādhyasya sādhanasya vānanugamo dṛṣṭāntavirodha
GSP29vytrkt3u:6154: yā tu paddhatau pramāṇaviradhopi dvedhā prabalapramāṇavirodhaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt3u:6162: pramāṇavi 1 ruddhtavenaikīkaraṇe 3 pramāṇapaddhativirodhamāśaṅkya tadabhiprāyoktyā nirāha-- yā tviti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6166: dvaividhyoktiḥ sā pratyakṣādivirodhabhedena dvāvapi pratyekaṃ trividhāviti traividhyoktiḥ śichaṣyamativaiśadyāya vastusthitipradarśanārthaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:6167: prativādino viśeṣajijñāsāyāṃ sopi vaktavya iti śikṣārthaṃ paroktayoḥ kālātyayāpadiṣṭasatpratipakṣayorvibhajyāntarbhāvoktyarthaṃ vā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6168: ata eva pramāṇalakṣaṇe“pratijñāyāḥ samabalavirodha eva sapratisādhana“ityuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6170: anyathā śiṣyamativaiśadyār 1 thaṃ vyutpādana 2 manumatameveti na svīyavyavahāravirodha iti sudhayā,
GSP29vytrkt3u:6171: na cātra prabalatvādiviśeṣaṇasya prayojanamastītyādisudhayā ca virodhāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6187: atrārucibījaṃ ta asādhakatvajñāpanamātreṇa parasya parājaye kimatyantābhāvasādhakatvajñāpanena/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6189: ata eva sādhyāprasiddheradoṣatve 'pi“anarvacanīyāsiddheraprasiddhaviśeṣaṇaḥ pakṣa“iti pararītyā tatra tatravyavahāra iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6206: sādhāraṇatvādirūpeṇaiva 2 jñātasya pratibandhakatvāt lakṣaṇānurodhena pratyekameva hetvābhāsatvamityuktatvena,
GSP29vytrkt3u:6210: nanu maharṣiṇā svarūpasatā koṭidvayopasthāpakatvenānaikāntikatrayaṃ parāmarśaviṣayābhāvatvena cāsiddhatrayamekīkṛtya
GSP29vytrkt3u:6212: tenaiva rūpeṇa jñātasya pratibandhakatvādityuktatvena lakṣaṇānurodhena pratyekameva hetvābhāsatvamiti coktatvena sādhāraṇatvāsādhāraṇatvānupasaṃhāritvānāṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:6213: tathāsiddhyuktiprastāve 5 āśrayāsiddhiḥ svarūpaṇāsiddhiḥ vyāpyatvāsiddhiḥ pratyekameva doṣaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6217: nanvetadevāśaṅkya maṇau svarūpasatānugatarūpeṇa trayamekīkṛtya maharṣiṇā vibhagakaraṇādityuktamityatastatadāśaṅkyāha -- nanviti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6218: 1.katvam -ṭa. dhanaṃ-ṭa.rā. 2. jñānasya -ṭa.rā. 3.vanācca -ka. vyatvācca -ga.rā. vyācca -ṭa. 4.prathamavibhāga evetyārabhya etāvān granthaḥ nāsti -ga.rā. 5.ke cā-ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6221: tathātve sākṣātpratibandhakatvena bādhapratirodhayorvyāptirahitaliṅgatvena savyabhicāra 1 viruddhayorapyekīkaraṇaṃ syādityādyatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6223: asādhakatāsādhakanādivyavahārānupayogitvena niṣphale vibhāge nirmaryādaṃ pravṛttasya pramāṇaparatantratvena niyantuṃ śakyatvāditi//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6227: nanu maṇāvevamevāśaṅkya svatantrecchāyā niyogaparyanuyogāviṣayatvāditi samāhitamiti bhāvena tadāśaṅkya nirāha -- svantreti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6232: ubhayakoṭyupasthāpakatāvacchedakarūpavatvaṃ ca sādhāraṇatvādi tena rūpeṇa jñātasya pratibandhakatvādi 3 tyādimaṇyādyukterāha -- sādhāraṇetyādineti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6237: tathāhi -- sādhāraṇatvaṃ pakṣatrayavṛttitvaṃ cedvipakṣavṛttitvena 1 śepavaiyarthyam syāt 2/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6244: etenāvyāptiṃ pratyupajīvyatvāvdyabhicāra eva doṣa iti avyāptyajñānadaśāyāṃ vyabhicārajñānenāpyanumitipratibandhadarśanāvdyabhicāropi doṣa iti 3 ca nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6246: etenaiva viruddhasyāpi tatvā 1 jñāne vipakṣavṛttitvajñānadaśāyāṃ sādhāraṇatvaṃ upadheyasaṅkare 'pyupādherasaṅkara iti ca nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6251: nanu maṇau vipakṣavṛttitvenaiva dūṣakatābījamuktamityastadanūdya nirāha -- vipakṣavṛttitvaṃ cediti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6263: tathā ca bādhaprastāvoktanyāyena sarveṣāṃ pratyekaṃ hetvābhāsatvasya vaktavyatayā hetvābhāsādhikyaṃ syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6264: yā tu vyāptijñānahetubhūtasahacārajñānasya sahakāri yo 'bhāvaḥ tatpratiyogibhūtaṃ yajjñānaṃ tadviṣayatvenaikīkaraṇānnādhikyamiti kaścidāha tanna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6266: vyāvartakatattkroḍīkārakopādhimato viśeṣyasya sāṅkaryepi vipakṣavṛttitvaṃ sādhāraṇatvaṃ vipakṣamātravṛttitvaṃ viruddhatvamityupādhyorasaṅkara iti ca nirastamityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6272: prāguktatrividhavipakṣavṛttitvānāṃ jñānasyābhāvaḥ tatpratiyogibhūtaṃ jñānaṃ prāguktānāmeva jñānaṃ tadviṣayatvenetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6278: svarūpasataivoktaviṣayatvenaikīkaraṇe tu na taddhetvābhāsavibhāge tantramityuktatvena hetvābhāvasādhikyatādavasthyam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6282: na ca sahakāryabhāvaśabdena vyabhicārajñānābhāvarūpa eva sahacāribhūtābhāvo vivakṣita iti nopā- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6290: sahacārajñānasahakārībhūtā 3 bhāve saṅkocavivakṣayātivyāptyabhāvaśaṅkāṃ nirāha -- na ca sahakārīti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6295: kiñca samavāyavṛtyā yatra vahnyabhāvaḥ taddṛttitvaṃ dhūmepyastīti vyāptigrahānupraviṣṭasaṃbandhena yatra sādhyaṃ nāsti sa vipakṣa iti vaktavyatayāvaśyakatvenāvyāptireva
GSP29vytrkt3u:6298: sādhāraṇavyabhicāra 1 tvaṃ nānetyukte sādhāraṇavyabhicāra 2 tvaṃ nāma vyāptigrahahetusahacārajñānasahakārībhūto
GSP29vytrkt3u:6305: vyāptiśarīrapraviṣṭasambandhābhāvasyājñāne vipakṣatvāderajñānena tajjñāne 'vaśyaṃbhāvini tadabhāvarūpāvyāptireva doṣostu kiṃ tādṛśasambandhena
GSP29vytrkt3u:6316: yaccoktamasādhāraṇe -- ubhayavyāvṛttatvameva dūṣakatābījaṃ tacca viruddhe 1 nāstīti na dūṣakatābījaikyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6317: asādhāraṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ tu sarvasapakṣavyāvṛttatvaṃ tadevodbhāvyamasādhakatāsādhakaṃ ca/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6325: 3 sapakṣavyāvṛttatvasya dūṣakatve nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt ityādiviruddhasyāpi tathātvādvipakṣavyāvṛttatvamuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6333: sapakṣavipakṣavyāvṛttatvasya dūṣakatva ityādirītyāsti- ṭha. 3.sapakṣetyādi nāsti -ṭa. 4.kṣādvayā - ṭha. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6347: anyasya dūṣakatābījatve tadanyasya nāsādhakatāsādhakatvamityetadarthāntaranyāsena vyanakti -- na hīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6352: “satyapi sapakṣe tatrāvartamānasya kiṃ vyāptireva nastyuta kevalavyatirekivadastīti sandehāvaskandanā“diti paddhatyuktaṃ 1 hṛdi kṛtvā'ha -- yadvāsādhāraṇa iti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6356: yadvāsādhāraṇaḥ sarvasādhyavadvyāvṛtyā sādhyābhāvavyāpto vā sarvasādhyābhāvavadvyāvṛtyā sādhyavyāptoveti sandehenāvyāptāvantar 1 bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6359: yatra 2 nityatvābhāvaḥ tatra śabdatvābhāva iti vyatirekavyāpteryatrānityatvābhāvaḥ tatra śabdatvābhāva iti pratikūlayā vyatirekavyāptyā pratiruddhatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6361: ata eva pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkāyāṃ pakṣa eva vartamānatvena vyāpteragrahaṇādityuktam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6363: vyatirekavyāptisaṃbhavo 'yaṃ na hetvābhāsa iti paddhatyuktaṃ kasya cinmatamapākurvāṇaḥ lakṣaṇaṭīkārītyāntarbhāvamāha -- athaveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6365: vyāptisambhavena taddhīsaṃbhavādityato vyāpteḥ sambhave 'pi pratirodhānna taddhīrityāha -- yatreti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6367: pakṣa eva vyāpteraniścayāt kiṃ tu sandehādityapyarthamupetyāha -- yadveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6371: vyāptaḥ/ dṛṣṭaṃ ca pakṣa eva vyabhicārasandehasya doṣatvam sa śyāmo mitrātanayatvādityādau/

GSP29vytrkt3u:6869: doṣatvaṃ vaktupupakramya pṛthagdoṣatvaṃ dūṣaṇamucyate idamasādhakaṃ anaikāntikatvādviruddhatvāditi tvayā vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt3u:6878: satve cānugatena laghunā sākṣādvyāptidhī 2 virodhidhīviṣayeṇa ca tenaivāsādhakatā sādhyatām/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6887: hetuvirodho dvividhaḥ asiddhiravyāptiriti pramāṇalakṣaṇādau yadvaividhyaṃ hetudoṣasyoktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6899: yaccoktaṃ maṇau -- bādhasyādoṣatve vastuto māhānasīyaḥ prasiddhau vahniḥ parvate vahnitvena sidhyet/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6901: parvate mahānasīyo vahnirnāstīti pratyakṣabādhāttu na sidhyatīti bādhasya vyabhicārāsaṅkara iti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6905: svamate bādhasya vyabhicārāsāṅkaryaṃ 1 tadrītyanusaraṇe tatsāṅkaryameva prāpnoti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6906: tathā ca bādhasya pṛthagdoṣatvahāneḥ 2 pañceti hetvābhāsavibhāgabhaṅga iti bhāvenāha -- yacceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6907: nanu parvatīyadhūmasya mahānasīyavahnyabhāvasāmānādhikaraṇyena vyabhācirānna tena mahānasīyavahniḥ sidhyatītyata āha -- parvata iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6909: tarhi kuto na sidhyatītyata āha -- parvata iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6911: kathaṃ tasya bādhatvena pārthakyamiti bhāvena nirāha -- tannetyādinā// @--------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6914: stīti pratyakṣasya parvate vahnirastīti pratyakṣaśābdabodhau pratīva parvate vahnirityanumitiṃ pratyapi bhinnaviṣayakatvenābādhakatvāt /
GSP29vytrkt3u:6919: evaṃ tarhi mahānasīyavahniviṣayānumitiḥ kuto na jāyate parvatīyavahniviṣayaiva kuto
GSP29vytrkt3u:6920: jāyata ityato na tvaduktabādhadoṣabalāt kiṃ tu liṅgasya vyāptiprakāramapekṣya liṅgijñānajanakatvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:6921: svabhāva iti svabhāvabalādeveti bhāvena dṛṣṭāntapūrvamāha -- yathā hīti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:6924: bādhasyādoṣatve samānaviṣayayatvasyaiva pratyakṣānumityorbādhakabādhyatvābhimatayoḥ syādityataḥ svabhāvakṛtameva bhinnaviṣayatvamityāha -- yathā
GSP29vytrkt3u:6925: tathā ca sāmagryabhāvādeva mahānasīyavahnyasiddhyupapattau kiṃ bādhavaśena tadasiddhikalpanayā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6926: ata eva paddhatau“parvate dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭānto 'pi kathamanyatrā 4 numityanudbhavaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6937: astu vā pratyakṣānumityoḥ samānaviṣayakatvaṃ tathāpi na tanmātraṃ bādhatve tantram/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6939: ghaṭavatyeva gehe ghaṭo nāstīti bhrāmyato 'pi gehe prameyamastīti pramayā tatra sato ghaṭasyāpi prameyatvena grahaṇadarśanāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6940: parvatetaravṛttirvahniḥ parvate nāstīti pramāvato 'pi parvato vahnimāniti bhrāntirūpānumitidarśanācca/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6942: vyadhikaraṇadhūmavahnyorapi vyāpti 1 rastyeveti parvatīyadhūmo mahānasīyavahnijñānajananasvabhāva eveti bhinnaviṣayatvasvabhāvo neti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6945: tuṣyatu durjana ityabhyupetyāpi bādhyabādhakabhāvo na yukta ityāha -- astu veti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6946: mahānasīyavahniḥ parvate nāstīti pratyakṣasya parvato vahnimānityanumite 2 rityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6947: kuta ityarthaḥ samānaviṣayatvaṃ jñānasya bhramarūpajñānasya vā pramārūpajñānasya vā jñānāntarabādhakatve tantram/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6950: yadvā samānaviṣayakatvaṃ jñānasya kiṃ tādṛśapramābādhane tantram/
GSP29vytrkt3u:6954: atyantāsadeva bhrāntāsadeva bhrāntāvaropyata iti siddhānte samānaviṣayaka 3 tyābhāve 'pi maṇikṛnmate tadastītyāha -- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6957: deśāntare sanneva bhrāntiviṣaya iti tvanmate parvatetaravṛttivahnereva bhrāntirūpānumitau parvatavṛttivahnitvena bhānāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6964: kḷptavyabhicārarūpadoṣādeva mahānasīyavahnyasiddhyupapattau na tadarthaṃ bādhasya doṣatetyāha -- kiñceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6966: 'pi śaktimupetya bādharūpadoṣādeva tadabhāvaṃ manyase tadā doṣāntaraṃ cāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt3u:6972: tasmāttadaṃśe vyadhikaraṇadhūmādeḥ śaktireva neti bhinnaviṣayatvena prāguktapratyakṣānumityoḥ na bādhyabādhakābhāva ityeva yuktaḥ panthā iti
GSP29vytrkt3u:6980: nanu sāmagrīsatve 'pi vyabhicārarūpakḷptadoṣādeva tatra gandhāsiddhirityata āha -- gandheti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6986: kathaṃ tarhi tatra bādha ityata āha -- prāgabhāveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:6995: bādhasya ca tvayā tatra doṣatvānaṅgīkārāditi cet gandhaprāgabhāvavati gandhāpādakasāmagryā abhāvā- @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:6998: kiṃ ca prāgabhāvavati kāle gandhāpādanaṃ na tāva 1 tsiṣādhayiṣāmātreṇa/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7001: pakṣatāvacchedakasya hi yatra pṛthivītvaṃ tatra gandha iti daiśikavyāptibalena sādhyasya samānadeśatvākṣepa eva sāmarthyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7003: nāpi yadā pṛthivītvaṃ tadā gandha iti vyāptibalāttatāpādanam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7007: deveti bhāvena kā tatra tava sāmagrī abhimatā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7009: vā yadā pṛthivītvaṃ tadā gandha iti vyāptirvā svāvacchinnadeśakālīnasādhyabodhakasvabhāvo
GSP29vytrkt3u:7010: vā yadā pṛthivītvaṃ tadā gandhaprāgabhāvakālīnagandhavāniti vyāptirvā /
GSP29vytrkt3u:7015: sa tu prakṛte na bādhita iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7021: tathā ca pṛthivītvamapi svāvacchinne gandhaprāgabhāvakāle gandhaṃ bodhayedeva/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7023: yatra yadā yadavacchedena dhūmastatra tadā tadavacchedena vahniriti vyāptireva hi tatrāsti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7024: prakṛte tu 1 yatra yadā yadavacchedena pṛthivītvaṃ tatra 2 tadā tadavacchedena gandha iti vyāptirnāstītyuktam//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7026: kiṃ tu ghaṭaḥ gandhapragabhāvakālīnagandhavāniti sādhyaviśeṣaṇamiti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7029: etena dhūmānumāne daivānupanītakāñcanapayatvasya vahniviśeṣaṇatvena bhāne 'numiterapramātvā 4 dapramātvasya ca doṣādhīnatvādanyasya ca doṣasyābhāvādbādha eva - @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:7033: yadā pṛthivītvaṃ tadā ghaṭīyagandhaprāgabhāvasamānakālīno gandhaḥ ghaṭīya iti vyāpteḥ satve 'pi samānādhikaraṇatādṛśagandhena vyāpterabhimatatvāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7038: 1.yatra iti na- ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 2.tatra iti na- ka.ga.ṭa.rā. 3.gandha ityadhikam -ṭa. 4.tvāttadapra - rā. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:7052: nanu satyapi tatra vyabhicāre tadapratisandhānadaśāyāṃ kāñcanamayo na bhavati vahniriti
GSP29vytrkt3u:7066: 'pi parāmarśe bādhena punarapi parāmarśavighaṭanasyāvaśyakatvenāsiddhi vyabhicārayonanyatarasya satvāt //
GSP29vytrkt3u:7072: doṣāntarasatvānna bādhasya ttara doṣatvaṃ kalpyamiti 1 pariharati-- niṣpanne 'pīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7088: kiṃ tu arthaniścayyaiva svapramātvaniścaye upajīvyateti vaiparītyameveti nirāha -- sādhyābhāveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7096: asmanmate tu bādhasya pratijñādoṣatvena vyabhicāra 1 śaṅkaiva nāstīti prāgevoktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7101: arthaniścayasya prāmāṇyaniścayāyattatva ityatra doṣāntaramāha -- parata iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7102: sādhyābhāvarūpārthaniścayastatprāmāṇyaniścayādhīnaḥ prāmāṇyaniścayasya prāmāṇyagrāhakasya prāmāṇyaniścayādhīna ityevaṃ rūpeṇānavastheti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7108: udayanena tu nibandhe savyabhicārasya koṭidvayopasthāpakatayā sādhyatadabhāvasaṃśayaḥ phalam,
GSP29vytrkt3u:7114: idaṃ hi lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ svarūpasidatyetāvanmātreṇocyate asādhakatāliṅgatvena vā /
GSP29vytrkt3u:7118: maṇyādyuktarītyā pañcānāṃ hetvābhāsānāmasāṅkaryaṃ netyupapādyodayanamate 'pyāpātatosāṅkaryapratītāvapi tadayuktamiti bhāvena taduktamanūdya nirāha -- udayanena tviti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7121: sādhāraṇānaikāntikasya sādhyatadabhāvābhyāṃ sahacāre asādhāraṇānupasaṃhāriṇorubhābhyāṃ sahacārābhāveneti dhyeyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7122: prācāṃ mate 'sādhāraṇānupasaṃhāriṇoranadhyavasitaprabhedatvena pṛthagukteḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntika eva savyabhicāraśabdena grāhyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7136: tatra ca saṃśayajanakaṃ sādhyābhāvabuddhijanakatvaṃ ca kiṃ phalopādhānaṃ vivakṣitaṃ yogyatā vā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7144: yadrūpeṇa hi jñānamanumitipratibdhakamityādinā pañcahetvābhāsa 7 tetyetkhaṇḍanaprastāve uktatvādityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7156: kiṃ tatvamiti jijñasāyā anutpattau asādhakatvahetorasiddhiḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7165: tathā ca dvayoḥ pratijñārthapramāṇaviruddhatvenaikas rūpeṇa prāguktadiśā pratijñādoṣatvameveti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7166: asmin pakṣe 'sādhakatānumānānutthānaṃ pratipakṣe syāditi doṣāntaraṃ cāha -- kiṃ
GSP29vytrkt3u:7168: jijñāsā hi jñānecchā phalādanyatrecchā ceṣṭasādhanatvajñāne sati bhavati/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7171: jijñāsājanana 3 rūpaphalasya tadānīmabhāvena kiṃ tatvamiti jijñāsājanakatvāditi hetorabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7172: yogyatā veti pakṣaṃ nirāha -- nāntya iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7174: 1.ddhyaikaika -ka.ga.ṭa. 2.ṣamevā-ṭa.ṭha.ḍa. 3.jananasvarūpayogyatvaheturabhimata iti yuktam. tasyottīrṇatādaśāyāmapi bhāvāditi bhāvaḥ ityasti - ṭha.ḍa. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:7177: etena yaduktaṃ maṇikaṇṭhe-- sūtroktarītyā hetvābhāsāḥ pañcaiva/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7179: tatra yadyapi viruddha 1 dvaye ca vyāptipramāvyatireko 'sti/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7208: tatra ca vṛttimataḥ sapakṣavyāvṛttavvaṃ sandigdhāvyāptiriti saivodbhāvyā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7211: evaṃ sādhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyamapi yatra hetustatra sādhyamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7217: anyathā parvato 'gnimān 4 pakṣatvādityādau prameyatveneva vṛkṣatvarūpeṇa vā jāte 'pi jñāne sādhyasaṃśayāpatteriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7223: nanucābhāvajñānādbhāpramāvyatirekaḥ sarvatranaitāvatāsādhāraṇa 1 tvaṃ sidhyati 2 yacceha nirūpyata iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7228: pramāvyatirekāviśeṣyavāntarabhedādbhoktau yo 'tiprasaṅga uktaḥ taduddhāramāśaṅkya sāmyena nirāha -- nanvityādinā//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7233: tāvatā hetvābhāsādhikyaṃ kuto netyata āha -- tacceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7234: bhāvapramāvyatirekaṃ prati yadasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadeveha hetvābhāsaprakaraṇe vibhajcamānatvena nirūpyata ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7236: tathā ca sādhyābhāvavyāptarūpaviruddhasyānaikāntikadvayasya cāvyāptitvenaikadūṣaṇatvameva na tu tvaduktaprakāreṇānekahetvābhāsatvamiti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7241: yadi ca satpratikṣasya dvedhā 1 pratibandhakatāsādhāraṇyasādhāraṇī ca tatrāsādhāraṇamanumitipratibandhakatvamādāya
GSP29vytrkt3u:7244: nanvabhāvajñānasya bhāvapramāvyatirekahetutve hetvābhāsatvarūpāsādhāraṇadoṣatvaṃ vyāptyabhāvajñānasya na syādityataḥ pratibandīmukhena samādhātumāha-- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7268: tathāpi vyabhicāriṇi parārthānumāne sarvopasaṃhārapravṛttodāharaṇavākyādupādhyasphuraṇadaśāyāṃ vyāptigrahaṇa 2 sambhavāvdyāptyagraho nodbhāvayituṃ śakya iti vyabhicāra evodbhāvyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7269: viruddhe 3 tu viparītapratibandhe vākyasthe 'ntaraṅge sphurati sati bahiraṅgavyāptyajñānādikaṃ nodbhāvyam/ @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:7270: bādhitasthale hetoḥ sādhyābhāvavadvṛttitvena vyāpterapahāreṇa sandigdhasādhyavadvṛttitvābhāvena pakṣadharmatāpa 4 hāreṇetyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7278: anityaḥ śabhdaḥ 5 prameyatvāt yatra 6 prameyatvaṃ tatrānityatvaṃ ghaṭādāviti vyabhicāriṇītyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7280: pratibandho vyaptiḥ sādhyābhāvena saha hotorvyāptirūpaviparītavyāptau sphurantyāṃ nityaḥ - @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:7284: anadhyavasite tu vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena vyatirekaṇavyāpterdarśitatvānna vyāptyasiddhirudbhāvayituṃ śakyā/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7285: na cānadhyavasite sandigdhasādhyavatpakṣamātravṛttitvena sādhyābhāvasambandhādvyabhicāra evāstviti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7288: tanna/ vyabhicāriṇi tvayā samarthitena vyabhicārasyodbhāvytavenaiva maduktāvyāpterevodbhāvyatvasiddheḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7292: bhūrnityā gandhavatvāt yatra nityatvābhāvaḥ tatra gandhavatvābhāvo 2 jalādāviti sādhyābhāvahetvabhāvayorvipakṣavṛttitmukhena
GSP29vytrkt3u:7304: na cānityatvasādhakasya meyatvādergaganādau vyāptibhaṅge svena pramite 'pyanāptavādi 1 vākyādudāharaṇādeva vyāptisiddhiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7307: kiñca yadi vyabhicāriṇi śakyodbhāvanatvādvyabhicāramādāya vyaptyapramitestyāgastarhi tata evāsiddherapi pakṣe hetva 2 satvamādāya pakṣe hetusatvāpramitirūpāsiddhirapi tyāgaḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7317: svasya hetu 5 tvābhāvaniścaye satyapi vādivākyāddhetusatvaniścayasya saṃbhavāditi bhāvenāha -- śabda iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7320: anudbhāvanaṃ tata eva śakyodbhāvanatvādevāstu ko doṣa ityata āha -- tataśceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7322: tvayā vyāptipakṣadharmatāvatvenāniścito heturasiddha iti tvayoktatvena tadapekṣayā hetvasatvamātraṃ hetvābhāsāntaraṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7329: hetvasatvaṃ hetusatvānupalambhanirvāhyaṃ cet vyāptyabhāvarūpo vyabhicāro 'pi vyāptyanupalambhanirvāhya iti samam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7334: anyathopādhiḥ siddhasādhanaṃ ca saralatayā hetvābhāsāntaraṃ syāt//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7339: tathā cānupalambha eva doṣo 3 tu hetvasatvamityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7347: parābhimatānadhyavasitapakṣe hetvābhāvasatvameva durghacaṃ kutontarbhāvacinteti bhāvenāha -- anadhyavasitepīti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7350: yadapyanadhyavasite vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena vyatirekavyāpterdarśitatvānna vyāptyasiddhirudbhāvayituṃ śakyeti tatrāha -- api ceti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7351: tataścāvyāptireva doṣatvena kḷptatvādudbhāvyeti bhāvenāha -- kḷptaṃ ceti// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:7361: nanūktarūpānadhyavasitasyāvyāptijñānaṃ pratyupajīvyatvādayameva tatra doṣa iti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7364: kiṃ ca sapakṣavipakṣayorliṅgajñānasya svayamajñāyamānatvena jñāyamānatayā pratibandhakībhūtāvyāptereva hetvābhāsatvena
GSP29vytrkt3u:7366: api cānukūlatarkāvatāradaśāyāmapi sapakṣavipakṣayorliṅga 3 jñānasya satvena tadāpyanumitipratibandhakatayā doṣatvāpātādityabhipretyāha -- iti
GSP29vytrkt3u:7389: nanu viruddha 3 vyabhicārītyapi kaści 4 ddhetvābhāsa ityāha -- sa eveti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7391: pakṣavṛttitvaṃ sapakṣe satvaṃ vipakṣādvyāvṛttatvamityevaṃ rūpeṇa trirūpa ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7418: vyāptivirahahetubhūtā veti hṛdi nidhāya krameṇāha -- na tāvadityādinā// @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt3u:7430: kiṃ ca savyabhicāraviruddhānadhyavasiteṣu na tāvadavyāptirnāstīti yuktam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7432: nāpyavyāpteḥ satve 'pi tadajñā 2 ne 'pi anyajñānādevānumānaṃ duṣṭamiti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt3u:7438: nanvastvito 'nya 5 traiva kaścana prakāra ityata āha -- na ca hetvābhāsa 6 tva iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7447: etadevābhipretyoktaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇe -- asiddhiravyāpti 1 śca hetuvirodha iti//
GSP29vytrkt3u:7449: oṃ iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmadbrahmaṇyatīrtathapūjyapādānāṃ śiṣyeṇa śrīmavdyāsayatinā viracite śrīmattarkatāṇḍave anumānaprapañcanaṃ
